string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit, meoww? I'm one smart cat...meow

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Like this, meow? This is nothing, meow...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It's a piece of cake, meow.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I wanna do something fun, meow~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I wanna do something else, meow~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, meow~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, because someone peed the ground, meow~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, instead of that...give me some food~ MEOW~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, let's do something else for fun~ Meow~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't wanna sit right now~ MEOW~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Master, you're talking funny, and I can't understand you~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Master, whaddaya think? I'm good right?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy...let me do something else.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe...I was daydreaming, so I couldn't hear you...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Please don't make a scary face like that...meow...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: What did I do wrong, meow?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You're just going off on me, meow...!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, meow...!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're just doing this because you're bored, meow...!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, are you really mad at me...? MEOW...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do anyway~! MEOW!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master that wasn't cool at all! Meow~!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find an obedient pet like me? MEOW~!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Master! If you keep doing that, I may one day get out of here! MEOW!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Master...please give me that scary face...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man...I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Man...going off on me again for no reason...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master must be bored...so I'm treated like crap...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I don't like hearing that, meow...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Take back what you just said, meow!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: M...master...I can't believe you said that...MEOW!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Master, I get hurt when I hear those...MEOW

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That was a joke...right? Right? MEOW?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You...didn't mean that, right? right? MEOW?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Take back what you said! MEOW!!!!!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master...this is not the first time I've heard this, but it still hurts...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You aren't gonna leave me out hanging like this, right?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me??

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...hehe

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: If you keep saying that, I can really go pissy on you...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It...it's not coming out well, meow...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet, meow...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How can I poop if I don't feel like it, meow...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for bathroom, meow...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master, it hasn't been long since I last pooped...MEOW...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to poop yet, master...MEOW...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel like pooping yet...MEOW...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhh...that was good...but it's still embarassing...hehe

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...whoa, my breakfast just came out like that...hehe

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Phew~ Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Phew~ Haven't taken a crap in 3 days and look at this!! Yowza!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to poop out in the first place...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Master...can I do it later in the dark? I don't wanna do it in public...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Master...how am I gonna crap on purpose??

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: The harder you go hunting, the better the items you'll find, meow...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, meow...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket, meow...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm too depressed to talk right now, meow~

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you...meow...!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today! MEOW!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Master, you'll get me some goood food today, right? MEOW~

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Let's go to the beach today! I wanna do something fun!!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say...MEOW...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I'm not...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hey master, can you beat Barlog?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Master, I heard there's something scary in a cave in the middle of the island...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ah...screw the talk, just get me some food...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Arrgh...didn't hear a thing...didn't hear a thing...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Man I'm tired, and I don't feel like talking...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think, meow? Am I doing well...meow?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Even I think this is cute...meow...~

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: You like me? I like you too. Meow!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I don't want to do it...meow...!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, what do you think? Cute, right? MEOW!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe... Cute. But I got here, right? MEOW!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do anything for you, master~!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Whatever you ask me to do...MEOW~!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Master! Just get me some food! MEOW!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't wanna do cute stuff! MEOW!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Master, I don't feel good! MEOW!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like this? At least you know a cute act when you see one...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do~

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Keeps making me do stupid stuff...I'm sick of it...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Feed me instead of making me do those!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Man~ That thing is wack now! I don't wanna do it!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: You think I'll do just what you ask me to do? Dummy...

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: It's hard...I can't stand for too long~MEOW~

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Master~ I'm doing fine, right? MEOW?

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Hap!! Whoa, I got tall! MEOW!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How's a cat supposed to stand up? MEOW!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: If I keep practicing like this everyday, I may one day walk around with two feet...hehe

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I'm good, right? Give me something harder~

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if you feed me...then I might...hehe

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Master~That's too hard, and I don't wanna do it~

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: I like you very very much! MEOW!

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Ah...I was thinking of something else...MEOW

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Don't be lying to me like that~!

string.name: s2
string.value: Why are you aking me to say that kind of workds? Meow~

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit like this? Bark?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: It's so sleepy sitting down, bark!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I don't understand what the master's saying~BarkBark!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I have no clue what you said! Barkbark!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No I don't want to sit! Barkbark!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, this is how you sit, right? Woof!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Master, I'm doing well, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I hope the master keeps asking me to sit...woof woof~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I have short legs, so it's easy to sit~ woof woof!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, I can't tell what you're saying~ woof woof~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, do I HAVE to sit right now? woof woof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Let's do something else right now~ woof woof!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's too dirty to sit here! Woof woof!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Yo master...still telling me to sit? IT's waaay too easy...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My back legs are so short, I feel more comfortable sitting like this...hehe...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You want me to sit? Here...this is the right way, right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ahh...itchy...(acting like I didn't hear it...)

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting is waaaay too easy. Give me something hard to work on.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: (scratching) Whoa? What did you just say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I'm sick of doing stuff at your command...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please don't give me that look...bark bark

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Krrr...Do you want to be punished by ME?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Bark Bark Bark!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I was just sitting here...BARK BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Krrrr...One of these days, I won't take it anymore...BARK BARK!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I'll be careful from here on out...wooof...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master! Things like that happen at times...why so mad? Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, just because you're bored, doesn't mean you have a right to abuse me! Woof woof!!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find a cute pet like this? Krrrr...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Woof woof!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'll be more careful next time...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Master, I'll be good, I'll be good...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man...the master's going off on me again...and I didn't do a thing...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Rrrr...master's not happy over a nothing...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Huh? I was too itchy to hear that...bark...!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy...I'll just pretend I never heard that...bark...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: What did the master just say? Bark...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing...woof woof...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Master, are you for real...? Woof........

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, was that a joke? Woof~

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You didn't mean that, right? Woof woof...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ey...You mean that for real? Woof???

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Ey...you were just saying that because you're bored, right? Woof?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You say that everyday...that hurts you know...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I'll be good...just don't leave me alone...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Whatever you tell me, I'll still be following you and only you...sigh...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: How can you...you don't really mean it, right?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I can't hear you~~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy...stop saying that and bathe me instead!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that now...hehe...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oh that felt good! Bark bark!!!!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Hehe...I must have drank a lot of water...bark bark!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't feel like peeing right now...bark...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How am I supposed to pee on purpose when there's nothing coming out...bark...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: It's embarassing to pee here...BARK! BARK BARK!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Hehe...NO!! Got some on my legs!!! Woof.........

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master...it hasn't been long since I last peed...woof...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey master, it's not time to pee just yet...woof...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhhh, that feels good...but it's still embarassing...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Shhhh....wait, that OJ I drank...that's a funny-looking pee there...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Shhhhhhh~ Oops, almost stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to pee out anyway...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It's a secret, just between you and me...I have a hidden bone around this area...bark bark!!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What's the latest on radio? Bark bark bark!?!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully it's something that involves me...hehe...BARK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard in one of the hidden streets at Henesys ther's a huuuuuge mushroom called Mushmom, am I right? Bark!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How's a dog supposed to talk? Bark!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking! BARK BARK!!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Bark!!!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I feel like crap! Bark bark!!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Please change up the menu every once in a while...I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, I feel like riding a boat to some other island and just chill there...woof woof~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Right? Good!! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You better be careful not to get ripped off when doing business with someone else...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking...I'm really depressed...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: II'm depressed...everything's annoying...don't feel like talking...woof...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's the menu for today? Can I get something nice?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head! hahha

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there...haha

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ey...how about feeding me right now?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying~~must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Man...do I have to talk again? Don't feel like it...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think? Good? GOOD? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Well, I'm smart, what can I say? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark! Bark!!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe...this is really easy~ Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like...this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry; just feed me!!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here...woof~!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: MMy...my legs are short...that's why it's hard...woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa...with these shorties?? I'm incredible, yo!!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus??

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? Bark bark...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too master~!! Woof woof

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I know you're lying, master...woof woof

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else...and I didn't hear it...Woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you too master very very much!!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm so full I can't eat anymore...woof...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is really delicious! Woof woof...

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore...woof woof...

string.name: s2
string.value: No, please don't say that! Woof~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I get sleepy from sitting down, but...kyu..

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I should just sit here instead of roaming around~kyu~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: So I just need to sit here, right, kyu??

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Keeps making me do the same thing over and over again...anything else? kyu...?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Huh? I was thinking of something else for a sec...kyu...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, sitting is waay too easy~!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You keep asking me to do some easy thing...KYU~!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, you can't say it right, right? KYU?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: It's too dirty to sit around here...KYU...

string.value: I gotta do one for the master every once in a while...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Now that I sat, you need to feed me~

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: No more of that scary face...please...kyu...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Man, just letting out on me, kyu!!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I wasn't doing anything! WHAT, kyu!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, what exactly did I do wrong? KYU!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You won't find a more obidient pet around you! KYU!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I was just sitting there! KYU!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: So you're mad at me cuz you're bored, right?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: This is too easy for me, key!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: What do you think, master? I'm good, right? KYU?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: If my master wants me to...KYU!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Hahh...I've just gotte much taller! KYU!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Ey...I don't wanna do something boring like that...KYU

string.value: Master what do you think? I'm good, right?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You won't find a bunny that can stand like I do.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Now that I'm up like this, I can see things from afar.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Standing up is sooo easy now...

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Ey...keeps asking me to do the same thing...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I can't hear you...I can't hear you.

string.value: It's still a long way to go before coming out...heh

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: So may people around here, how am I gonna poop in public?? kyu...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I just pooped a few min. ago...kyu...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhhhh...whoa, I almost stepped on it...KYU

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to go poop yet...KYU

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master...pooping should only be at bathrooms...KYU

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...the poop looks really good today.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Ahh...master you can't step on it!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good...whoa, master...you stepped on it...

string.value: I can't poop what I didn't eat...

string.value: Can you poop even if you don't feel like it?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I had nothing to eat all day, so no poop for me...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I must be constipating right now...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Is something wrong with you these days...? Don't worry, I'll be there for you, kyu...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: When you're buying items, you need to make sure you're not being deceived...kyu...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: If...you starve me, I may just crawl back into my home...so don't starve me too much...kyu...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I love the phrase "I love you" more than anything else in the world! kyu...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You ever see a rabbit talk? kyu...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I can't talk to you about things...kyu...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! kyu...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm in no mood to talk...kyu...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: How about going from place to place instead of staying at a same place? KYU

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Isn't it not fun playing by yourself? I like hanging out with people...KYU...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: There's a lot of ppl on this island so make sure you don't forget about being courteous to everyone around you...KYU...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I heard there's a dungeon in the middle of this island...KYU...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I feel like crap, so I won't talk...KYU...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: We pets are created by Cloy of Henesys.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I know it's precious, but you need to take those potions while you fight to get stronger fast!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Go do some quests and something good may happen~

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: There's not much to say but...feed me!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying...I have nothing to say...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm tired, so I'll tell you later...

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: NO! You haven't showered in days! kyu...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, I'll go hug you up~! Kyu!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, I can feel your heartbeat~! KYU!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Master...please go take shower right now!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: NO~! I don't want to hug you! KYU!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I like how you embrace me, master

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Master? You really think I'll hug you up?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: And you were scolding me just now...

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: If you feed me, I will

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Master, you smell! I don't wanna hug you~

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Play time~ Play time! PLAY TIME!!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Who sleeps in the middle of the day...kyu?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Ahh...I'm sleepy...master, give me your arm as my pillow...kyu...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Please don't have delicious food all to yourself while I'm asleep...kyu...

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Master! I feel fine~! Hang out with me!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: If you sing me a song, then I'll fall asleep.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: You know you're gonna write all over my face while I fall asleep...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I can't sleep cuz I'm hungry! FOOD! FOOD!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Really? Nice! I feel good~ kyu~

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: That wasn't for me, right? kyu?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: That was a typo, right? kyu?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I love you too, master! KYU!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe...I'm gonna tell everyone about this...KYU!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Master, I know you're lying. KYU!

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You're just saying that, right? KYU?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: One minute you're all over me, now you say you love me...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you love me, how come you aren't feeding me?

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for it again...?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master this is soooo delicious! Kyu!

string.name: s2
string.value: Kyuu~ I am NOT gonna say that!

string.name: s3
string.value: I am definately not a bad rabbit!

string.name: s4
string.value: Don't make me say those words~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Yeah, I should rest up for a bit... kar...

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: So this is where I sit? Grr...

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I can't understand what you're saying... kar...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Humans are still hard to understand...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: This is a piece of cake! Grr...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Phew...good thing, because I was beginning to get tired of standing up~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Haha...how did you know i wanted to sit for a sec?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I will NOT SIT, master, grr...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: (Too annoying...might as well do as what the master tells me to do...)

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Now that I'm sitting, get me some food!!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Now~ master, you should come sit here with me~

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Master, it's way too dirty around here to sit, grr....

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Master, before all that, I'm really hungry... grrr...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Master, what did you say? Grr...

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Can't hear you...can't hear you...can't hear you...ou...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: What is there to get mad at? Especially an adorable pet like me... kar...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: If you keep doing that, I'm telling my mom!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: What did I do wrong, anyway!! Kao!!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you trying to go up against me? Kaooo!!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I'll hate you for saying that!! KAO!!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master! What did I do wrong anyway?!! Kaoo!!!!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: If you keep doing that, I'm gonna tell on my mom!!!! KAO!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master, I apologize for whatever wrong I did to you...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Master, I don't like what you're saying...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'll never do that again... I promise ...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Master, forgive me this once, please?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: (Hehe...should I at least pretend to act scared?)

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: (As if I'm going to get scared of that...hehe...)

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: What do you think? Good, huh? Ou~

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: What do you think, master? Am I doing well? Kar?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I got much taller standing up! Kar~

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I will definitely NOT do it... grr ...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master, what do you think? I'm good, right?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: This is my area of expertise!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: And of course, I can do most everything ~

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: And you think I'll actually do what you ask me to do ...!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: What are you looking at? Grr...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I can't pee if I haven't had anything to pee out anyway ... grr...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I don't pee on call... grrrr ...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Shhhh...arrgh, it got on my leg!! Kar...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I can hold off no. 2, but not no. 1... Kar~

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master, I can't pee in public places...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I don't feel like peeing yet... grr...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Before that, feed me first ... grr...

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I can't pee anywhere out here... grrr ...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahhh, that felt good ... ewww master, you stepped on it!!!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Phew ... I would have wet myself if I was even a minute late...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Master, now we can find out way back ...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Master, I have some pride in me, too! I can't pee out here in public!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Can YOU pee even when you don't feel like peeing?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Not unless you feed me first!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I've been thinking of what I'm going to do when I grow up. What about you? Grr...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: The other day, I saw some ppl that ran away after seeing me... why is that? Grr...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: A pet like me that's still growing should be fed A LOT, understand? Grrr...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Is there really a terrifying monster that flies? I'd like to see that too...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How am I supposed to speak human language? Grr...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: (As if pets and humans can talk to each other...haha)

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: (Like I'll just talk that easily? Hehe...)

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Every once in a while, it's good to explore new places...it's for your own good...grr

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I heard from my friends that there are other islands around other than just this! I wanna see them...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Is it true that fairies don't get along too well with humans? Grr...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I heard the farther you leave town, the stronger the monsters are...grr...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say... grr...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I said I have nothing to say! Grrr....

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I heard from my friends that fairies LOVE shiny, sparkling objects...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: The other day, I saw this person that got attacked by a pirate ship.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Feed me something nice! I want to try something else!!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Do all humans have heads that big???? Interesting!!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: (As if I'll actually talk to you...hehe)

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: That's MY specialty right there... grr...

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: It's not something I'll do whenever ... grrr...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, what do you think? Sparkling is the word for this...grrr...

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Look at my charismatic eyes! Grr...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Am I sucking you in with my eyes? Grr...

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Even Balrog can't touch my eyes... grrr...

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: If you feed me, I'll think about it...

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I got something in my eyes... grr...

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Arrgh, the sun's in my eyes... grrr...

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I don't feel like doing it right now... grrr...

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Haha...these will scare even the great Balrog ...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: This is dedicated to my master!!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: What do you think? A celebrity in training?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Eyes-wise, I can't think of anyone that can come close to me...haha

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Master, you don't really think I'll do it that easily right here right now, right?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You know how tired my eyes get after doing this...

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I'll be good, don't worry... grrr...

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: (Did the master really just say that?)

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I'll be good, forever and ever!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I feel good that you're complimenting me~

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: (As if I'm supposed to believe that...)

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: (What the... did I just hear that?)

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I like being with you, too, kar ~~

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Were you just saying that? Grr...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: That wasn't for me, right? Ou...

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Master, I love you too~ Grr...!!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: You're like my mom!! Hehe... Grr!!!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Master, don't be lying like that...grr...

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: You were just kidding, right? Grrr...

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: You were just saying it, right? Grr...

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: I can't believe you said that...wow...!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Well, that's very sweet of you, master!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: (Wasn't the master going off on me just minutes ago?...)

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: (Of course I know it's a lie...hehe...)

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: What do you think? Am I good or what? Grrr...

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: How did you know I'm tired? Grr...

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I will get dirty, though... grrr ...

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: I can't just be down like that anywhere...grr...

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Master, I'm doing fine, right? Grr...

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Master, get down here and do it with me~ Grrr...

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: This is way too easy~ Grr...

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: I don't wanna do it. Grr....

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Master, just tell me to do it!

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Like this... ? Ey... I'll do this once for you...

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: What do you think, master? I'm good, right?

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Master! Can't you see how dirty it is around here?

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: How am I supposed to be down on my belly if it's THIS DIRTY around here?

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: What if someone steps on me while I'm down?

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: You think I'll do everything you ask me to do?!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: I'll definitely feast on this~ Grr~

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I feel like it's going to come up now...ou...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, thanks for the meal~! YEAH!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Yeah! That's the way uh huh uh huh~!!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Yo master, are you trying to feed me to death...

string.name: s2
string.value: Why are you making me say those thing? Grrr~

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you! Grrr...

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit, meoww? I'm one smart cat...meow

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Like this, meow? This is nothing, meow...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It's a piece of cake, meow.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I wanna do something fun, meow~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I wanna do something else, meow~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, meow~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, because someone peed the ground, meow~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, instead of that...give me some food~ MEOW~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, let's do something else for fun~ Meow~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't wanna sit right now~ MEOW~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Master, you're talking funny, and I can't understand you~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Master, whaddaya think? I'm good right?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy...let me do something else.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe...I was daydreaming, so I couldn't hear you...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Please don't make a scary face like that...meow...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: What did I do wrong, meow?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You're just going off on me, meow...!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, meow...!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're just doing this because you're bored, meow...!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, are you really mad at me...? MEOW...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do anyway~! MEOW!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master that wasn't cool at all! Meow~!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find an obedient pet like me? MEOW~!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Master! If you keep doing that, I may one day get out of here! MEOW!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Master...please give me that scary face...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man...I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Man...going off on me again for no reason...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master must be bored...so I'm treated like crap...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I don't like hearing that, meow...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Take back what you just said, meow!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: M...master...I can't believe you said that...MEOW!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Master, I get hurt when I hear those...MEOW

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That was a joke...right? Right? MEOW?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You...didn't mean that, right? right? MEOW?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Take back what you said! MEOW!!!!!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master...this is not the first time I've heard this, but it still hurts...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You aren't gonna leave me out hanging like this, right?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me??

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...hehe

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: If you keep saying that, I can really go pissy on you...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It...it's not coming out well, meow...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet, meow...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How can I poop if I don't feel like it, meow...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for bathroom, meow...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master, it hasn't been long since I last pooped...MEOW...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to poop yet, master...MEOW...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel like pooping yet...MEOW...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhh...that was good...but it's still embarassing...hehe

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...whoa, my breakfast just came out like that...hehe

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Phew~ Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Phew~ Haven't taken a crap in 3 days and look at this!! Yowza!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to poop out in the first place...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Master...can I do it later in the dark? I don't wanna do it in public...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Master...how am I gonna crap on purpose??

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: The harder you go hunting, the better the items you'll find, meow...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, meow...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket, meow...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm too depressed to talk right now, meow~

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you...meow...!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today! MEOW!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Master, you'll get me some goood food today, right? MEOW~

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Let's go to the beach today! I wanna do something fun!!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say...MEOW...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I'm not...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hey master, can you beat Barlog?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Master, I heard there's something scary in a cave in the middle of the island...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ah...screw the talk, just get me some food...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Arrgh...didn't hear a thing...didn't hear a thing...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Man I'm tired, and I don't feel like talking...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think, meow? Am I doing well...meow?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Even I think this is cute...meow...~

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: You like me? I like you too. Meow!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I don't want to do it...meow...!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, what do you think? Cute, right? MEOW!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe... Cute. But I got here, right? MEOW!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do anything for you, master~!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Whatever you ask me to do...MEOW~!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Master! Just get me some food! MEOW!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't wanna do cute stuff! MEOW!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Master, I don't feel good! MEOW!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like this? At least you know a cute act when you see one...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do~

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Keeps making me do stupid stuff...I'm sick of it...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Feed me instead of making me do those!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Man~ That thing is wack now! I don't wanna do it!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: You think I'll do just what you ask me to do? Dummy...

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: It's hard...I can't stand for too long~MEOW~

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Master~ I'm doing fine, right? MEOW?

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Hap!! Whoa, I got tall! MEOW!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How's a cat supposed to stand up? MEOW!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: If I keep practicing like this everyday, I may one day walk around with two feet...hehe

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I'm good, right? Give me something harder~

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if you feed me...then I might...hehe

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Master~That's too hard, and I don't wanna do it~

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: I like you very very much! MEOW!

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Ah...I was thinking of something else...MEOW

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Don't be lying to me like that~!

string.name: s2
string.value: Why are you making me say that? Meow~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I get sleepy from sitting down, but...kyu..

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I should just sit here instead of roaming around~kyu~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: So I just need to sit here, right, kyu??

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Keeps making me do the same thing over and over again...anything else? kyu...?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Huh? I was thinking of something else for a sec...kyu...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, sitting is waay too easy~!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You keep asking me to do some easy thing...KYU~!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, you can't say it right, right? KYU?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: It's too dirty to sit around here...KYU...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I gotta do one for the master every once in a while...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Now that I sat, you need to feed me~

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: No more of that scary face...please...kyu...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Man, just letting out on me, kyu!!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I wasn't doing anything! WHAT, kyu!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, what exactly did I do wrong? KYU!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You won't find a more obidient pet around you! KYU!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I was just sitting there! KYU!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: So you're mad at me cuz you're bored, right?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: This is too easy for me, key!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: What do you think, master? I'm good, right? KYU?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: If my master wants me to...KYU!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Hahh...I've just gotte much taller! KYU!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Ey...I don't wanna do something boring like that...KYU

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master what do you think? I'm good, right?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You won't find a bunny that can stand like I do.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Now that I'm up like this, I can see things from afar.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Standing up is sooo easy now...

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Ey...keeps asking me to do the same thing...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I can't hear you...I can't hear you.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It's still a long way to go before coming out...heh

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: So may people around here, how am I gonna poop in public?? kyu...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I just pooped a few min. ago...kyu...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhhhh...whoa, I almost stepped on it...KYU

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to go poop yet...KYU

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master...pooping should only be at bathrooms...KYU

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...the poop looks really good today.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Ahh...master you can't step on it!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good...whoa, master...you stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't poop what I didn't eat...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Can you poop even if you don't feel like it?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I had nothing to eat all day, so no poop for me...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I must be constipating right now...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Is something wrong with you these days...? Don't worry, I'll be there for you, kyu...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: When you're buying items, you need to make sure you're not being deceived...kyu...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: If...you starve me, I may just crawl back into my home...so don't starve me too much...kyu...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I love the phrase "I love you" more than anything else in the world! kyu...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You ever see a rabbit talk? kyu...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I can't talk to you about things...kyu...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! kyu...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm in no mood to talk...kyu...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: How about going from place to place instead of staying at a same place? KYU

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Isn't it not fun playing by yourself? I like hanging out with people...KYU...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: There's a lot of ppl on this island so make sure you don't forget about being courteous to everyone around you...KYU...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I heard there's a dungeon in the middle of this island...KYU...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I feel like crap, so I won't talk...KYU...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: We pets are created by Cloy of Henesys.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I know it's precious, but you need to take those potions while you fight to get stronger fast!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Go do some quests and something good may happen~

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: There's not much to say but...feed me!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying...I have nothing to say...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm tired, so I'll tell you later...

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: NO! You haven't showered in days! kyu...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, I'll go hug you up~! Kyu!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, I can feel your heartbeat~! KYU!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Master...please go take shower right now!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: NO~! I don't want to hug you! KYU!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I like how you embrace me, master

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Master? You really think I'll hug you up?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: And you were scolding me just now...

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: If you feed me, I will

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Master, you smell! I don't wanna hug you~

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Play time~ Play time! PLAY TIME!!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Who sleeps in the middle of the day...kyu?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Ahh...I'm sleepy...master, give me your arm as my pillow...kyu...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Please don't have delicious food all to yourself while I'm asleep...kyu...

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Master! I feel fine~! Hang out with me!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: If you sing me a song, then I'll fall asleep.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: You know you're gonna write all over my face while I fall asleep...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I can't sleep cuz I'm hungry! FOOD! FOOD!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Really? Nice! I feel good~ kyu~

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: That wasn't for me, right? kyu?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: That was a typo, right? kyu?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I love you too, master! KYU!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe...I'm gonna tell everyone about this...KYU!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Master, I know you're lying. KYU!

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You're just saying that, right? KYU?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: One minute you're all over me, now you say you love me...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you love me, how come you aren't feeding me?

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for it again...?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master this is soooo delicious! Kyu!

string.name: s2
string.value: Kyuu... I am not gonna say that.

string.name: s3
string.value: I am not the kind of Rabbit who speaks of evil words,~

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit like this? bark?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I get sleepy sitting down, bark!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Ahh... this is easier~ BARK BARK~

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I can't understand what the master is saying~ BARK BARK!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: It's too hard to understand~ BARK BARK!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I have no clue what you said! Bark bark!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No. I don't want to sit! BARK BARK!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, this is how you sit, right? Woof!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Master, I'm doing well, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I hope the master keeps asking me to sit...woof woof~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I have short legs, so it's easy to sit~ Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, I can't tell what you're saying~ Woof woof~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, do I HAVE to sit right now? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Let's do something else right now~ Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's too dirty to sit here! Woof woof!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Still telling me to sit? It's waaay too easy...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My hind legs are so short. I feel more comfortable sitting like this... hehe...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You want me to sit? Here... this is the right way, right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ahh... itchy... (acting like I didn't hear it...)

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting is waaaay too easy. Give me something harder.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: (scratching) Whoa? What did you just say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please don't give me that look... bark bark!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Krrr...Do you want to be punished by ME?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I was just sitting here... BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Krrrr...One of these days, I won't take it anymore... BARK BARK!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I'll be careful from here on out... wooof...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master! Things like that happen at times... why so mad? Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, boredom doesn't give you the right to abuse me! Woof woof!!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find a cute pet like this? Krrrr...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Woof woof!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master... I'll be more careful next time...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man, master's going off on me again and I didn't do a thing...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Master, things happen sometimes... why so mad??

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Rrrr... master's not happy over nothing...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'll be better... bark... much better...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm hurt inside... pretty bad... bark...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: How can you say such thing... bark...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Huh? I was too itchy to hear that... bark...!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy... I'll just pretend I never heard that... bark...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: What did the master just say? bark...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing... woof woof...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Master, I'm really really hurt... woof...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Master, are you for real...? Woof...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Master, you didn't really mean it... right? Woof...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, was that a joke? Woof~

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You didn't mean that, right? Woof woof...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ey... You mean that for real? Woof???

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Ey... you were just saying that because you're bored, right? Woof?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You say that everyday... that hurts you know...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I'll be good... just don't leave me alone...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Whatever you tell me, I'll still be following you and only you...sigh...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: How can you... you don't really mean it, right?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I can't hear you~~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy... stop saying that and bathe me instead!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that now... hehe...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Now, THAT was embarassing~ Bark bark~

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Oh man, this smells... bark bark...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't feel like pooping... bark

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Still a long way to go before coming out... heh

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: So may people around here, how am I gonna poop in public?? bark bark...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I just pooped a few min. ago... bark bark...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhhhh... whoa, I almost stepped on it... bark bark

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I almost got constipated... bark bark

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good... bark bark

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master... the poop isn't coming out... bark bark!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to go poop yet... bark bark

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel it yet... bark bark

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master...pooping should only be at the bathroom... bark bark

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...the poop looks really good today

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Ahh...master you can't step on it!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good... whoa, master...you stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't poop what I didn't eat...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Can you poop even if you don't feel like it?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I had nothing to eat all day, so no poop for me...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I must be constipating right now...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It's a secret, just between you and me...I have a hidden bone around this area... bark bark!!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What's the latest on radio? bark bark bark!?!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully it's something that involves me... hehe... bark!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard in one of the hidden streets at Henesys ther's a huuuuuge mushroom called Mushmom, am I right? bark!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How's a dog supposed to talk? bark!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking! Bark bark!!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Bark!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I feel like crap! Bark bark!!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Please change the menu every once in a while... I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, I feel like riding a boat to some other island... woof woof~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Right? Good!! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You better be careful not to get ripped off when doing business with someone else... woof woof...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say... woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking... I'm really depressed... woof woof...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm depressed... everything's annoying... don't feel like talking... woof...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's the menu for today? Can I get something nice?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head! hahha

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there... haha

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ey... how about feeding me right now?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying~~must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Man... do I have to talk again? Don't feel like it...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think? Good? GOOD? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Well, I'm smart. What can I say? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark!!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe... this is really easy~ Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like... this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Master, I did well... right? Right?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry. just feed me!!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here... woof~!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: My... my legs are short, that's why it's hard... woof!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I won't do it... woof woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa... with these shorties?? I'm incredible, yo!!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus??

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? bark bark...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too master~! Woof woof!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe... I feel good... woof woof!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I know you're lying, master... woof woof!

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else... and I didn't hear it... woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you too master very very much!!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Haha! Just tell me what to do, and I'll do it!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: This is waay too easy! Bark!

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: We huskies don't have hands! Bark!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I don't want to do it~ bark!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm so full I can't eat anymore... woof...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is really delicious! Woof woof...

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore... woof woof...

string.value: Don't make me say bad words! Woof!

string.value: I have short legs, so this is all I can do ... oink...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Ah, this feels comfortable~ Oink oink~~

string.value: I don't know what you're saying~ Oink oink~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No I don't want to sit! Oink oink~!

string.value: Master, so I sit like this, right? Oink~

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Master, am I good or what? Oink oink~!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Ahh, this feels so good! Oink oink~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I have short legs, so this is all there is to it...oink oink~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, do I HAVE to sit? Oink oink!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Let's do something else! Oink oink!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Too dirty around here! Oink oink!

string.value: Master, are you making me sit again? This is too easy~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Sitting is a piece of cake!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Can't tell whether I'm sitting or on my belly? Heheh...

string.value: What did you say? I didn't hear you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I'm tired of doing whatever you tell me to do, you know...

string.value: Why are you like this? Oink!

string.value: You can't find a better pet than me~ Oink~

string.value: Master ... I'll be careful from here on out.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man, he's going off on me again ...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Things happen in life, you know? Why are you acting like this?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I've been called this so many times, it doesn't even affect me anymore...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I don't like hearing that, oink...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Take back what you just said, oink!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: M...master...I can't believe you said that...oink!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Master, I get hurt when I hear those...oink

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That was a joke...right? Right? oink?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You...didn't mean that, right? right? oink?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Take back what you said! oink!!!!!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master...this is not the first time I've heard this, but it still hurts...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You aren't gonna leave me out hanging like this, right?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me??

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...hehe

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: If you keep saying that, I can really go off on you...

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I must have ate a lot ... oink oink~

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet, oink...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How can I poop if I don't feel like it, oink...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Too embarassing to poop here ... oink ...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Crap, it got on my butt ... oink ...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Phew ... I almost pooped on my foot ...oink ...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master, it hasn't been long since I last pooped...oink...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to poop yet, master...oink...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel like pooping yet...oink...

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Pooping should be done in bathrooms, you know ... oink. ...

string.value: Ahhh...that was good...but it's still embarassing...hehe

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...whoa, my breakfast just came out like that...hehe

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Phew~ Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Phew~ Haven't taken a crap in 3 days and look at this!! Yowza!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to poop out in the first place...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Master...can I do it later in the dark? I don't wanna do it in public...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Master...how am I gonna crap on purpose??

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I love food, so please don't forget to feed me. Oink oink~

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I heard there's a castle called Ludibrium ... have you been there? Oink oink~

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Apparently you store items at the storage... you know that, right? Oink oink~

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You need to eat everything to be healthy like me~ Oink oink!!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Have you seen a pig talk? Oink ...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say ... oink ...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: You can go to places far away from here by getting on a boat ... oink oink!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, it's so vast around this area that I have no idea where I'm at~ oink oink!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Apparently there's a pet walking road... I'd like to know where that is! Oink oink!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I wish I had lots of friends like you, master! Oink oink...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I said I have nothing to say! oink....

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Master, I'm feeling hungry now ... please feed me laster~

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Master, you head... seems to be bigger than your body!!! Hahaha~

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Feed me something nice! I want to try something else!!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I heard from a friend that ... we may stop moving one of these days ... is that true?

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Man, I'm hungry ... feed me first...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: You must be bored enough to make a pet like me talk ...

string.value: How am I going to make a fake smile? Oink...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Have you seen a pig smile? Oink...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: What do you think, master? Oink~

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do, master! Oink~

string.value: No, I don't want to smile...Oink...

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like this? Man... just this once

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I am not in a mood to smile...

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What do you think? Don't I look good? Oink oink!!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I'll protect you from any harm, master! Oink oink!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: You can count on me~! Oink oink~

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Do you like what you see? Oink oink~

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I don't want to do it, you know? Oink...

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I got something in my eyes... Oink...

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: No I won't do it! Oink...

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I can't do it whenever you want me to do it... oink~

string.value: You keep ordering me to do it whenever you're bored!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I don't want to be ordered here!

string.value: Oh, stop it master~ Oink oink~~!

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Master, I love you too~ Oink...!!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too master!!! Oink oink~~

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Master, I know you're lying... oink...

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: You were just kidding, right? oink...

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something, and missed what you said... oink...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: As if I'll like hearing that... oink...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Much love to you too, master~!!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: I can't believe you said that... wow...!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: I know you don't mean that...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And you're going to go off on me in a sec..

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: As if I'm falling for it this time...

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Haha...this is the way to do it, right? Oink~

string.value: I don't think pigs have hands, master! Oink~

string.value: Just tell me what to do, and I'll do it~!

string.value: I'm one smart pig, you know!

string.value: That's for dogs, not for pigs like me!

string.value: I don't want to do it. Oink...

string.value: Don't make me say weird things but give me some food~

string.value: Humans are still hard to understand...

string.value: This is a piece of cake! Cong...

string.value: Phew...good thing, because I was beginning to get tired of standing up~

string.value: Haha...how did you know i wanted to sit for a sec?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I will NOT SIT, master, Cong...

string.value: (Too annoying...might as well do as what the master tells me to do...)

string.value: Now that I'm sitting, get me some food!!

string.name: c4_f3

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Can't hear you...can't hear you...can't hear you... Cong...

string.value: Can I really just sit here and chill? Cong!

string.value: I need to sit and chill. Cong~

string.value: I wanna do something else~ Cong~

string.value: I want to do something fun though ... cong~

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Huh? I was just thinking of something ... cong~

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I can't understand what you're saying ... Cong ...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: How did you know I felt like resting?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Ahh ... I ran around so much that my legs are hurting ... cong~

string.value: I'll need to sit here and chilll. Cong~

string.value: I've gained some weight, and I shouldn't be sitting still~ Cong~

string.value: Are you trying to go up against me? Cong!!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: If you keep doing that, I'm gonna tell on my mom!!!! Cong!!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Master, you were just kidding, right? Cong~

string.value: I was thinking of something, and missed what you said... Cong...

string.name: c20_f4

string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully that's something we can both do~! Cong!

string.value: Isn't it beautiful outside today? It's days like this where you need to go outside and chill~ Cong~

string.value: I wanna sleep with a comfortable blanket ... cong ...

string.value: How about going around some places instead of staying in one place? Cong!!

string.value: I'm too sad to talk now ... cong ...

string.value: I have nothing to say ... Cong ...

string.value: I heard Cloy of Henesys made each and every one of us pets. Cong~

string.name: c26_s2

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Master, can you beat Balrog? Cong!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Master do you have a fiance? I don't ... Cong ...

string.value: I'm about to pass out, and you're making me talk again .. .Cong ...

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Don't talk to me ... feed me first ... cong ...

string.value: I said I have nothing to say! Cong....

string.value: I wish I could get on that boat and travel somewhere...

string.value: This is way too easy~ Cong...

string.value: You're going to get mad at me for sticking my tongue out on you, anyway ...

string.value: I'm so hungry, I can't sleep ... cong...

string.value: It's been a tiring day today...

string.value: My stomach's about to explode ... cong ...

string.value: Master, this is soooo good~~! Cong!!

string.value: Nope, I am not gonna say that~ Ooo~

string.value: I won't wander around. I'll just sit here, Rawrrr~

string.value: I don't know what you're saying, Rawrrr~

string.value: How am I going to make a fake smile? Rawrrr...

string.value: Have you seen a dino smile? Rawrrr...

string.value: No, I don't want to smile...Rawrrr...

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I am not in a mood to smile...

string.value: How can you say such thing... Rawrrr...

string.value: What did you just say, Rawrrr?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Take back what you just said, Rawrrr!

string.value: M... master...I can't believe you said that...Rawrrr!

string.value: That was a joke...right? Right? Rawrrr?

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: You... didn't mean that, right? right? Rawrrr?

string.name: c23_s4

string.value: Take that back! Okay? Take that back! Rawrrr!

string.value: Master... this is not the first time I've heard this, but it still hurts...

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Do you really not like me??

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: You say this all the time... so mean...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: You aren't gonna leave me out hanging like this, right?

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: If you keep saying that, I can really go pissy on you...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...hehe

string.value: The harder you go hunting, the better the items you'll find, Rawrrr...

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, Rawrrr...

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket, Rawrrr...

string.value: Have you ever seen a baby dino talk? Rawrrr~

string.name: c25_f3

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I can't talk to you~ Rawrrr~

string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today! Rawrrr!

string.value: Master, you'll get me some goood food today, right? Rawrrr~

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Good! Rawrrr~

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: A lot of people are here, so make sure to be courteous to others!!

string.value: I don't have anything to say...Rawrrr...

string.value: Master, you have a huge head...hahaha

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Master,you look like you've got yourself a belly~

string.value: This is boring...I need something more exciting

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Do I have to talk again? I don't want to, though...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Why do you keep talking to me? I need some sleep...

string.value: I don't wanna do cute stuff! Rawrrr!

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I'm not doing it every second...Rawrrr~

string.value: You can't be with me, if you keep saying those~

string.value: Sure... If it makes you happy.

string.value: I guess it's time for me to obey…

string.value: Maybe you should have a rest too Master!
