string.value: Can you sing me a song as well?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Is that the only thing you can ask me to do?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Have you ever seen a monkey sitting still?

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Can I really take a rest?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: How did you know I wanted to rest?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I need to take a rest here!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You are the best master ever!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: It is so dirty here, I can't rest!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: No... I'm getting fat these days....

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I am getting fat because of all this resting!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Just because you don't want to play with me, huh?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Don't look at me like that!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I will be better, really... Kiii...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master I won't do it again...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I'm good, you're bad... Yes that's it!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Bad! You don't love me anymore!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm the most obedient pet around! AHHH

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Say it again and I'll ignore you.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Ahh I must have drank too much.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You expect me to pee in public?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhh I feel so much better...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Wow.. what a lot I must have drank!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Look at that Master... Have you ever seen a monkey pee?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: How can I pee when nothing's coming out?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I don't feel like it! ARP! ARP!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: It isn't nice for a monkey to pee here...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ah that is what I call real Monkey Business!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: How am I supposed to pee when you didn't even feed me?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Why don't you pee in public too?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Don't you have anything better to do than asking me to pee the whole day?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Me ear feels a little itchy here...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I love you too Master.. kiiii...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hmm, Master you're so nice to me!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I feel nice and warm inside!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I love you too! Give me a hug!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You're referring to somebody else, right?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You're the best Master a monkey can have!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I love you too! What about going for a hunt together?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'm such a lucky monkey to have you as my Master…

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: It is bad to tell lies Master, Please don't.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I love bananas more than I love you!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Are you sure? You haven't hugged me for ages!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I'm sure you love your new weapon more! ARP!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I can stand! I can stand!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Huh? My ear feels a liitle itchy here...

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll stand if you feed me!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Have you ever seen a monkey standing so straight?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Look Master! Aren't I good at this?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I did it! Master! I'm standing!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm already standing?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm tired running after you! I don't want to stand!

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Look master, do you see a banana there?

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I love the way you talk to me.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I love bananas! Do feed me more of those!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I love you Master! Do you love me too?

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: What do you expect me to say?

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Instead of killing monsters, you can do quests to level up too!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Monkeys love bananas! I bet you didn't know that.

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: I hate people who abuse their pets, don't you?

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: If you don't feed me, I'll go back home and not come out!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: It is rude to wake a monkey from its sleep! ARP!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Talk talk talk.. I want to do something else.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Tell me honestly, have you ever heard a monkey speak?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! ARP! ARP!

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: We pets are created by Cloy of Henesys.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: If you don't feed me well, I'll just run away!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: If you buy me a meso magnet and item pouch I can collect all your loot for you!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: I won't live forever, so do treasure me when I'm around!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: What do you expect me to tell you when I'm always following you around?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Don't you have any other things to do?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Why don't you ask my lupin brothers to talk to you instead?

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Isn't it better for you to talk to your buddies instead?

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: I've wanted to play with you all day long!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: What do you want to do?

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm busy now?

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Feed me first... then I will think about it!

string.name: c29_f4

string.value: Master that wasn't cool at all! BEEP BEEP~!

string.value: Where else will you find an obedient robot like me? BEEP BEEP~!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master! If you keep doing that, I may one day get out of here! BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I won't do that again. I promise.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, though!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Hey, things happen in life and I am not going to apologize for it.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Man...going off on me again for no reason...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Master must be bored, so here I'm, listening to all that garbage.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: So who am I attacking? BEEP BEEP...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Ready for launch, master! Beep beep.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Get ready for my super arm extension. BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I'm ready to fire these missiles! BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I believe in peace, master. BEEP BEEP.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: No, I don't feel like it. BEEP BEEP.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I'm running out of oil. Feed me first. BEEP BEEP.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I'm already in an attack mode! BEEP BEEP

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What should I use? I've got a lot of weapons at my arsenal. Beep beep.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: At your service, master. BEEP BEEP

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I'm ready to fire these missiles! BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: An error occurred while withdrawing the weapon. BEEP BEEP.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Not after the way you treated me last night. BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I think the nuts have come loose. Please tighten them for me. BEEP BEEP.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Who am I supposed to attack? BEEP BEEP.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I've been greased up just for this occasion. Bring it on!!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Snails don't scare me. I'm ready to back you up!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Only the robots are blessed with iron fists. These babies are ready for attack.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I don't feel like attacking anyone else. That's YOUR job!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Huh? What attack? What do you think I am, a rocket launcher or something?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I do not believe in violence. I CAN, however, give you some motivational speeches.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Um... I need to be refueled. Feed me first, then we'll talk.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I love you too, BEEP BEEP~

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Hey, robots can blush, too! BEEP BEEP~

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What did you say, BEEP BEEP?

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I like you too~ BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I like you very very much! BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Master, give me some food...BEEP BEEP...

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Ah...I was thinking of something else...BEEP BEEP

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: I love you too, master! Seriously!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: You sure know how to warm a cold robotic heart!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: The same goes to you too, master!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Master needs to say the truth.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Don't lie to me! You can't love a robot!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: If you love me, then feed me right now.

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I know you like this. BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I know I know, robots can be beautiful, too. BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Looking good, right? What? You want an autograph? BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: No way! I don't feel like doing it right now! BEEP BEEP

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Show me how YOU do it, BEEP BEEP

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: And your point for me doing this is ... beep beep.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Master, what do you think? My eyes shall be called the twinkling stars... BEEP BEEPr...

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Hello, I define charisma! Look, BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: I know you can't resist these beautifyl eyes. BEEP BEEP...

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Do you want a piercing look? This is just short of shooting laser beams...BEEP BEEP

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: If you feed me, I'll think about it...

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Ouch, my eyes hurt. BEEP BEEP...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: The sun's in my eye, and it doesn't feel good... BEEP BEEPr...

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Can I do it later? BEEP BEEP...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: This is dedicated to my master!! Check this out!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Hollywood is looking for the next great robot actor, me!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: The guy that made me told me I look the best!

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Feed me. Feed me. Feed me.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I don't want to do it. Seriously.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I wonder who made me. I should call that person dad or mom, depending on who that was, BEEP BEEP~

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: If you defeat high-leveled monsters, you'll most likely be rewarded with a nice item, BEEP BEEP...

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, BEEP BEEP...

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Master, can you grease me up a bit? I feel ... um ... stiff. BEEP BEEP.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Do you really think robots say anything other than BEEP BEEP?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: I'm too depressed to talk right now, BEEP BEEP~

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: I'm a robot, and robots only beep. BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: I wonder who made me. I should call that person dad or mom, depending on who that was, BEEP BEEP~

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: If you defeat high-leveled monsters, you'll most likely be rewarded with a nice item, BEEP BEEP...

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, BEEP BEEP...

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Master, can you grease me up a bit? I feel ... um ... stiff. BEEP BEEP.

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Do you really think robots say anything other than BEEP BEEP?

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I'm too depressed to talk right now, BEEP BEEP~

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I'm a robot, and robots only beep. BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: I feel good right now! BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: The 8-ball in me tells me that we're getting a sweet item today! BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Master, contrary to popular belief, we robots do have emotions! BEEP BEEP~

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: Can you take me to Ludibrium? I heard that place is full of robots like me!

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I feel like resting right now ~BEEP BEEP~

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: I have little to say...BEEP BEEP...

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Hook me up with a date, master!

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Have you heard of El Nath? I heard it's so cold, that I may even freeze in there!

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: Am I screwd on tight? Or am I loose somewhere?

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Even a robot can use some food every now and then.

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Are you sick of me, master?

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: This is always fun! BEEP BEEP!!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Look! Look! Don't I look good? BEEP BEEP?

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: I cannot change right now, BEEP BEEP. Ask me later.

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: My arm hurts right now. Please grease me up. BEEP BEEP.

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: Master, I don't want to change. Can I go drink some oil? BEEP BEEP?

string.name: c33_s1
string.value: This is always fun! BEEP BEEP!!

string.name: c33_s2
string.value: If you want to learn how to change, just look at me! BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: I've practiced this move for a while! BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: I am not a tramsformer. I am a pet. BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: Grease me up, first, then I'll think about it. BEEP BEEP.

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: Do not assume that all robots change their forms to something new, BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: I prefer keeping myself in this form, BEEP BEEP

string.name: c34_s1
string.value: It's always fun to transform into something completely different~!

string.name: c34_s2
string.value: Call me the transformer, because I am the best you will ever find!

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: Beep beep. I should learn to transform into a car soon.

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: I have mastered the art of transforming! Learn from me!!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: What am I, your toy? I don't change.

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: My bolts are loose. It may all come off if I change my form right now. Tighten me up! BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: Contrary to popular belief, I do not turn into a car. I'm just a pet!

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: Show me how to turn into a snail. You can't, right? Then don't ask!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm too full. Seriously, don't feed me anymore.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Ohh, how did you know I was hungry? Great timing, BEEP BEEP!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore. Don't make me become fat now.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Okay, now this is delicious! I was starving, you know!

string.name: s4
string.value: Do not try to offend me! BEEP!!!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Is this how I'm supposed to sit? Woof!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I get so sleepy when i sit... Woof...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Ah, what a relief! Woof woof!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I don't know what you're saying! Woof woof!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I don't want to sit! Woof woof!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: This is what I have to do, yes? Woof!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I wish you'd tell me to sit all the time... Woof!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: It's easy to sit because I have short legs!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, you need to enunciate better! Woof!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Do I HAVE to sit right now? Woof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Let's play something else! Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, it's too dirty! Woof!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Master... You asked me to sit too many times. This is too easy!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: It's nice sitting down when you have short legs... Hehe...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You want me to sit? Am I doing it right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: So itchy... (Pretending I didn't hear you...)

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting is too easy. Give me a challenge!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: (Scratch, scratch) What? What did you just say, master? I didn't hear you!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Woof!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Grrr... I'm not just gonna sit around while you yell!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master... I'll be more careful next time... Yip...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master! You need to be more patient with me! Woof!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master! You shouldn't scold me for fun! Woof!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Don't you scold such a cute pet! Grr!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master... I'll be more careful next time...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Master... I'll do whatever you want...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You...are just taking out your anger on me...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Master... You gotta understand that not everything will go your way!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Hmm! You're scolding me for no reason again!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Hmph? I didn't hear you, yip!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I'm itchy, I'll pretend that I didn't hear you yip!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: H-how could you say that? Whine...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I-I was really hurt just now... Woof...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You're definitely joking, right? Woof woof.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Aww, you were just bored right?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master... You should stop saying that everyday...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I-I'll pick up my slack master... Don't forsake me...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Even if you say mean things ot me I'll always follow you... Sniff...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Did you really just say that? You're kidding right?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I'm itching... Can you just give me a bath?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm getting tired of hearing that, heh...

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Heh, perhaps I ate too much. Woof.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't have to go poop now... Woof...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: H-how can I poop on command?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: But this is so embarrassing... Woof woof!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ah crap, it got on my butt... Woof...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Whew! That was a close call! Woof.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to poop yet master. Woof.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master, I don't have to go yet. Woof.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master, bathrooms are where poop goes!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ah, that feels so good! Still embarrassing to poop though, heh.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: ...What the, why's my poop color orangey? Is it cause of the carrots I ate earlier?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Whew! I almost stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't eaten enough to poop.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Can YOU poop on command master?

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: This is a secret, but I hid a bone around here...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What's a trendy song? Woof woof.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What's your hobby? It'd be nice if we can do it together! Woof woof.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard that huge mushrooms called Mushmoms are in the hidden Henesys place. Woof woof.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I don't feel like talking! Woof!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I don't have anything to say.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm feeling a little sour. Woof woof.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: You should switch out the menu sometime. I'm getting tired of eating the same thing... Woof!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: It'd be nice if we could catch a boat to other islands sometimes! Woof!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you feeling today? Good right? Woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You must be careful of scams when you trade! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say... Woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't feel like talking! Woof!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Do you have a favorite celebrity master? Who?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's for dinner tonight? It'd be nice if it's something tasty!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Your head's really big master... Snicker.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: ...Did you put on a few pounds lately master?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I'll listen to whatever you say master.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: What do you want me to do? Woof woof woof!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Aww yiis, like that yeah? Woof!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: But I don't want to! Woof woof!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't get what you're saying! Woof!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You need to enunciate better! Woof!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a mush mouth! Woof!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Did I do well, master? Pet me! Woof!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe... This is really easy, woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do anything you want! Woof!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Is this what you want me to do? Woof!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't want to lie on this dirty floor! Woof!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Show me how it's done! Woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like this? Fine... I'll do it once...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Am I doing it right? I'll do anything for you!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Master! Don't tell me what to do!!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! Feed me, I'd rather eat!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: No! I'm going to be UP!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? This is so hard! Woof!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Mmm the air is fresher up here! Woof!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: M-my legs are too short... Woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How do I stand with these short legs? Woof!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Master but I can't walk on two legs!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Wow! I'm amazed at myself for standing up with these short legs!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: If you feed me, I'll think about it... Hehe...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Standing on four legs is hard enough...

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Are you trying to send me off to a circus?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: You're expecting too much from a dog.

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Stop it! You're embarrassing me! Woof!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Oh, you surely are my master! Woof!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Master, I know you're lying. Woof...

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Sorry I was spacing out... Woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You thought I was gonna like that... Woof...

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You gotta keep loving me! And only me!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Hehe! Best feeling in the world!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: I know you're just saying that without meaning much...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: You're gonna punish me again... I know it...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: I'm not falling for that again...

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I can't eat anymore! So full! Woof!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore... Woof...

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Hey,master... My belly is going to explode...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Sitting down makes Yeti want to see Pepe~ Grr~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Yeti's feeling good~ Yeti's feeling really good~~ Grr

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Yeti doesn't want to sit~ Grr~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Yeti wants to do something different~ Grrr~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Yeti is too shy... to sit... GrrGrr~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti today doesn't want to listen~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yeti likes to sit, too~ Yeti's legs are feeling better now~

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Yeti sits, and so does the master~ Grrr~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti sits, and Yeti sleeps~ Zzzz

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti feels good~ Yeti likes sitting down~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Yeti does not understand what the master is saying~ Grr~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Grr~!! Yeti feels like rebelling right now~ Grr~!!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Grr~ Yeti is good at following the master's orders~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Yeti is good at doing this and others~ Grrr~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Yeti is sitting down very comfortably right now. GrrGrr~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Did Yeti do alright? Grr~ Yeti loves to be commended~ Grr~

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Yeti needs to go hunting with the master~ Grr~

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Yeti doesn't feel like doing it right now. Yeti will do it later~ Grr~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Yeti does not feel like sitting~ Grr~

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Yeti is scared~ Yeti will be good now~ Grrr

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti does not act angry~ Grr~

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Grr... Yeti is a good Yeti...Grr...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Yeti is sorry~ Yeti won't do it again~ Grr~

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Yeti doesn't want to be scolded~ Grrr~!!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: If the master keeps scolding Yeti, Yeti will run away~ Grrr!!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Yeti is good, but... Yeti feels hurt...Grr~

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Yeti is sorry... Yeti feels bad now...Grr..

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Grr~ If Yeti keeps being scolded, Yeti will feel very lonely~ Grrr...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Yeti will not be bad from here on out~ Grr

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Yeti will leave~ off to El Nath!!! Grrr~

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Yeti gets angry if scolded~ Yeti likes compliments~ Grrr!!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Yeti doesn't like being here. Yeti wants to leave!!! Yeti~ Grr!!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Yeti didn't do anything... Yeti is very angry right now~ Grrr!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master, forgive Yeti~ Yeti has been very bad~ Grr~

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Grr~ Yeti doesn't go against master~ Grr~

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti may be scolded, but Yeti still likes the master~

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Yeti is really feeling awful, and wants to make up for it~ Yeti is really good now!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Master gets angry at Yeti sometimes! Master is very bad!!Grrr!!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Yeti makes mistakes at times, and so does the master~!! Grr!!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Grr~!! If master keeps getting angry at Yeti, Yeti gets angry at master~

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Yeti doesn't need to feel sorry. Yeti will now become Yeti the rebel! Grr!!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Yeti is bouncing! Yeti feels good~

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Grr~ Yeti is a great dancer~ Yeti's great at everything!

string.value: Yeti's legs hurt~ Yeti needs a lot of rest~ Grrr..

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Yeti does not dance in public. Grr~

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Yeti is still a little bit shy~ Grr...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Grr~ Yeti is too depressed to dance today~

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Yeti feels awesome right now, and the moves are coming out~ Grr!

string.value: Yeti dances like no one else in this world~ Grrr~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti used to be the number 1 dancer in El Nath~ Grr~

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Yeti will show the master how to dance~ This is exactly how you dance~ Grrr~

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Yeti will not dance now ... Yeti doesn't want to dance...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Yeti is feeling really tired... Yeti is feeling weak.. Grr...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Yeti will bounce bounce bounce~ Yeti will shake shake shake~ and master will bounce and shake~

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, dance with Yeti! Yeti likes dancing with master~ Grr~

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Pepe once said Yeti looks the best when putting the moves on~ Grr~

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Grr~ Yeti loves to dance, and Yeti loves master, too~!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Yeti fought with Pepe today...Grr.. Yeti feels crappy right now..

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Yeti is hungry~ Yeti is feeling tired~ Grr~

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Master should not dance~ Only Yeti dances, and right now, Yeti doesn't want to dance~

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Yeti will not dance~ Yeti will quit dancing now~ Grr~

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Yeti is feeling the pressure~ Grr~

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Yeti is trying hard now~ grrr... Yeti is exhausted now~

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Yeti had been holding back, until now~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti just pooped~ Yeti does not feel like pooping now~ Grr~

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Yeti feels embarassed~ Yeti prefers private pooping~ Grr~

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti's do not poop often~ Grrr~

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Yeti wants to dance~ Yeti doesn't want to poop~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti's poop is smeared all over Yeti's butt~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti's poop is the size of Pepe~ Grrr~

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti pooped big time, and now Yeti is very hunry~ Grrr~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Yeti will poop, then master play with Yeti~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti doesn't have anything coming out~ Yeti's stomach is hurting now~ Grrr~

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Yeti only poops at home~ Yeti cannot poop outside~ Grr~

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti doesn't like pooping~ Yeti will poop tomorrow~ Grr~

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Yeti will not poop~ Yeti will hang out and have some fun~ Grrr~

string.value: Yeti feels good~ Yeti likes the feeling right after pooping~ Grrr~

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Grr~ Yeti is applying the pressure now~ Yeti is feeling tired...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Master just stepped on Yeti's big old poop~ Grr~

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: This poop is Yeti's, and Yeti's only~ and that massive poop is master's? Grr?

string.value: Yeti only poops a little once a day~ Grr~

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Grr~ Yeti does not feel like pooping~

string.value: Grr? Poop? Yeti does not know what pooping is.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Master, poop in public! Yeti will not be the only one pooping in front of everyone~ Grrr~

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Yeti loves El Nath~ El Nath is Yeti's hometown~ Grrr

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Yeti likes snow and ice in El Nath~ Grrr~

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Pepe and Yeti are friends~ Yeti likes Pepe very much~ Grrr~

string.value: El Nath is freezing cold and snowy, and Yeti wants to go back to El Nath~ Grrr

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Yeti is too shy to talk~ Grr...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Yeti is sleepy... Yeti will sleep now... Grr

string.value: Yeti wants to talk to Pepe~ Grrr~

string.value: Yeti likes El Nath, but Yeti wants to go to other places, too~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti used to live in El Nath, and there is a frightening monster somewhere in there~ Grr~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Yeti likes fishing with Pepe~ Grr~

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Grr~ Yeti can do everything well~ Grr~

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Grr... Yeti will talk when Yeti feels like talking... Grr...

string.value: Yeti does not like being told what to do~ Grrr~

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Grr~ Yeti will not talk~ No, Yeti CANNOT talk~ Grrr~

string.value: Grr... Yeti would one day like to revisit El Nath someday~ Grrr~

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Yeti likes to dance~ Yeti used to be the star of El Nath~ Grr~

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Pepe likes Yeti~ Yeti protects Pepe~ Grrr~

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti prefers cold places~ Grr~

string.value: If the master is bored, master shouldn't be hanging out with Yet; master should be out hunting~ Grr~

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Yeti does not feel like talking today~ Grr~

string.value: Go past El Nath and you'll run into the Dead Mine~ Grrr~

string.value: Yeti heard that there's ice in Leafre, too~ Yeti wants to go there~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti looks a lot like the master~ Yeti looks like the master~ Grrr~

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Yeti knows a lot about the history of El Nath~ Yeti will talk about its history soon~ Grr~

string.value: Talk to Yeti right now, and Yeti will be very angry~ Grrr!!

string.value: Hang out with Yeti and then Yeti will talk~ Right now, Yeti will not talk~ Grrr~

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Yeti won't talk, and won't listen to the master~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti likes being told that Yeti is cute~Grrr~

string.value: Yeti is blushing~ Yeti is red now Grrr~

string.value: Pepe says the same to Yeti a lot~ Grrr~♡

string.value: Yeti is not cute~ Yeti is NOT cute Grrr~

string.value: Yeti is sad. Yeti is feeling too hot to feel happy. Grr

string.value: Grr~ Yeti won't do it~ Yeti feels lazy~ Grrr~

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Keep doing that, and Yeti will be very mad~ Grr!!

string.value: Yeti has always been cute~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti and Pepe are both adorable~ Grrr~ Yeti and Pepe were the stars of El Nath~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti has always bee popular~ Grrr~

string.value: Yeti does not like jokes~ Grr~

string.value: Master should not make fun of Yeti!! Grrr!!

string.value: Master always lies to Yeti~! Grrr!

string.value: Yeti does not fall for a foolish lie like that~ Grrr~

string.value: Yeti is on its way to dream street~ Grrr~

string.value: Yeti will sleep with the master.... zzzzz....

string.value: Yeti wants to have fun with the master~ Grr~

string.value: Grr.... Just looking at something delicious makes Yeti's day~

string.value: Yeti should stop eating wheh Yeti's full~ Grr~

string.value: Master, eat with Yeti~ Yeti loves this rice~ Grr~

string.value: Master is a bad person... And Yeti is very full.. Grr...

string.value: Grrr...Yeti doesn not know that word.

string.value: Yeti wants the master not to say that. Grr~

string.name: s4
string.value: Master never orders me to do that.Grr...

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: The ground is cold, but I'll sit.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: You're right, I will take a seat.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: So I just need to sit here, right, ho ho??

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: The sky is so nice... huh?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I don't want my feathers ruffled.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Take a seat? No problem! Gobble

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You're so kind, Master. My legs were tired.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Ok, I'll get up when you say so.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I feel fine, but thanks for the offer... gobble.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: An empty belly encourages me to disobey

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: A chickadee can follow that one. Too easy!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I do my best to obey, Master

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: A snack to show your appreciation would be nice

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I don't like that look... I'm scared

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You need a potion? You look funny...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I've been a good pet for you, be nice.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I have feelings too, I'm hurt

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Sorry, Master. I'll obey from now on.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You already used your Mad ticket with me last time.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You're just shouting at me because you haven't eaten all day.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Not everyone can be a great Master, you'll get there with hard work.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Tada! You have such a good pet.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'll always stand for my Master!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Maybe I don't hear so good.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Chickens may do that, but I do not.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: My leg hurts, it needs to rest.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Truly, Turkeys are the best pets.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I needed to stretch. Thanks, Master!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I can see your face better from here!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I want a challenge, Master. Standing is easy.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Sticks and stones may break my bones, but only an oven can hurt me.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I only do what you tell me.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I didn't know you were a comedian, Master!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Are you asking me to agree?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Bested by a Turkey, you should feel bad.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master, I only understand clear commands.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I only heard you say something about a wet sock. Sorry.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: You're much smarter than I am, Master.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Your IQ must be really high!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I was under the impression that you were the smart one. I was wrong.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I think you left your brains back in the Hunting grounds.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Wait, look on the ground, next to the small rock. There it is! Your brain!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Aren't you supposed to lead me around? Sheesh.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Turkey can spot a scam anywhere. Watch out!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: You have any Feed? It is delicious.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What is wrong with you? Turkeys can't talk!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I like to travel, Master. You can take me anywhere.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Where is everybody? I like seeing other Turkeys.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: It's always a good thing when you're nice to everyone.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I think you might need a new hairdo.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: A talking Turkey? Wake up--you're dreaming.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: My voice hurts, so I'm resting it.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: There was a feather in my ear. What did you say?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Turkeys are, by far, the best looking pet.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: When are we going to see Zakum? I heard he's well armed!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Remember that doing quests can only help you!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: The vocabulary of a turkey is not that developed!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Clear your voice and speak slowly.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You don't want to mess with a Turkey, do you?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: When my stomach is empty, my ears get clogged.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: I'm not buying what you're selling.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: You must've been talking to that Mushroom over there.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Shaky hands? I see how it is...

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Your love is the fuel that keeps me going.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Love is a battlefield, and you're my best weapon.

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I can feel your love from here, Master...

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: I can't feel the love tonight.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I can tell you don't mean it!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: If your love was money, I'd be a rich bird.

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: It's so nice to hear you say that!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: My feathers only flap for you!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Right... you said that to someone else before

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Oh, now you want to be affectionate? I don't think so.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: The way to a Turkey's heart is through his stomach.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I've got my eye on you...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Go ahead. Wing it and see what happens...

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Just for that, I'm closing my eyes.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Some food would help me see better...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: My eyes tire of such trival sights.

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: This egg may give you superpowers. Use it wisely!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Much, much better than an apple.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Get some pepper and it will taste better.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: I haven't laid an egg in a while, Master.

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Someday, I may give you an egg. Today is not that day.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: I don't have anything in my pockets. Guaranteed.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: Better idea: How about you give ME an egg?

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: I think I got 2 inches off the ground that time!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Name the last time you saw a flying Turkey.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Haven't worked out my wings in a while, sorry.

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I'd like to see you try. No jetpack, either.

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Do I make you hungry, Master? Do I?

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: Go ahead, I've got another leg.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: you're sick! Get away from me!

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: You're hungry too? That makes two of us.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: No cranberry sauce? Or gravy? No dice.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: I am feeling a little tired...

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: My eyes aren't heavy, why should I sleep?

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: Nowhere close to bedtime. I don't think so.

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: You're so observant, Master. I'll take a short nap.

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: Feeling pretty sleepy, a nap would be good for me.

string.name: c32_s4
string.value: This spot is perfect for a quick snooze.

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Not unless you got a hen bed somewhere.

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: Unless you have a pillow, I'm not sleeping...

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: So you can cook me in an oven? Nice try.

string.name: c32_f4
string.value: I had a White Bull potion, I'm fine.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: ugh, there are onions in this!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I don't think I'm hungry anymore.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: This looks like the best meal I've ever had...

string.name: s3
string.value: Told you not to say those words~

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: WEK~~ this is the way to do it, right?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sit? Okay! I stll feel great though ~~~ WEK~ WEK~

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: You show me how to do it first...WEK

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I never learned how to sit... weK!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Keep letting me do this ~~ WEK~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Do I sit like this? WEK!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: You must be kidding me... WEK

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Don't let me do stupid things like this... WEK..

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's not like I'll be getting a prize for doing this... WEK

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I mastered the art of sitting.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I can sit! I really can sit!!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Give me something harder to do.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Wait til I turn back into a doll... then I'll sit.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Look, I'm fat, and it's hard for me to sit.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: And what are you trying to say? WEK!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Umm... you're no different than me. WEK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do! WEK!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I won't do that again... WEK... WEK....

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Okay now ... calm down ... WEK WEK..

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I get it. I'll be a good penguin now.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What do you want me to do? WEK!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Did I do anything wrong? WEK?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: My heart's been torn to pieces... sigh...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: What can I do to make you feel better?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Hey, you're the one that started!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Seriously, I didn't do anything wrong.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Don't look! This is embarassing. WEK

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Long way to go before I poop. WEK

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I don't feel like pooping. WEK.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Hah, I ate a lil too much last night. WEK

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Sorry. It's going to reak here. WEK.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I don't want anyone seeing this. WEK

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I haven't felt it, yet. WEK.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Hey, don't look. It's not a pretty sight.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Ahhh, this is quite a relief.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You must really like the smell of poop.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I can't poop now. I held on to it for too long.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I can't poop what I never ate.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Can you force yourself to poop?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Of course, the penguins must stand tall... WEK.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: So I stand and sit, then stant and sit. WEK!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I don't want to do it, WEK!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: This is a piece of cake, WEK.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I'm good, right? Give me something harder to do, WEK.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Can I do something else? I'm tired, WEK.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do, okay? WEK!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I can do it. I'm the bomb, right?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: What other penguin can stand so beautifully like this?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: If I keep practicing, I may be able to run one of these days.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Don't repeat the same thing over and over again.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: The weather's beautiful today, perfect for a chit chat, WEK.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: If you find somethng delicious, give me some, WEK.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Do you want to kiss me on the cheek? WEK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I can help you out, WEK!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What? Who said I was fat? WEK!!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Have you ever seen a talking penguin? WEK.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Any good movie to watch, WEK?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Tell me you love me the most, WEK.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Treat others just the way you want to be treated, WEK.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Take me to a seafood store, WEK.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking right now, WEK.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: If I ever turn back into a doll, please get me a water of life so I can keep hanging out with you.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'll help you gather up some items on the ground.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I see a lot of elves these days. I heard they were very hard-working.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Don't tell others your ID and password.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: And what exactly do you want from me?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Don't bother me. I'm just chillin here.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Now you gotta kiss me! WEK

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Hehe, give me a warm hug. WEK

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm too heavy for you to hug, WEK.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I've been in need of some love these days... WEK.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: You can hug me as long as you want, WEK!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: NO! You haven't showered in days! WEK!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I got no time for you, WEK!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Don't hug me too hard. I can't breathe.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Awwww, it's embarassing though. Hug me when no one's looking.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: No, I wanna do something fun! WEK!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Look, it's well into the morning right now, WEK.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping here, WEK.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Master, you sleep here with me. WEK.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I was about to sleep anyway.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: You need to wake me up later.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: It's not time to sleep yet.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I feel fine, I don't feel like sleeping.

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Liar. I don't like you, WEK.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Really? I don't think you do, though. WEK.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Do you really mean that, WEK?

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: You know how I feel about this, right? WEK~

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! WEK!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Yay, I'm being loved by my master~ WEK!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: And what do you want from me? WEK.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What? I didn't hear you. WEK.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I know you say that to others, too. WEK.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I love you too, master! Yay!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: We penguins don't take that phrase "I love you" lightly.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you don't mean that, that I don't think you should say it.

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: So I should just stick it out like this? WEK..

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: You know I'm the bomb, WEK.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: No way, I'm too tired. WEK.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to do this. WEK.

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Heavy, isn't it? I can't fly with these, though.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Is it fluffy? It feels good, right? This is fuuuun!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Ugh, this is quite a chore.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: What am I, a dog? I'm a penguin, you know!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Make sure not to leave a hole on my cheek!

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Um... do you know exactly where we are right now?

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: No way, I don't wanna do it.

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: Don't do it for too long, though. Yay!

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: Who in the right mind would wanna kiss you?

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: You ain't doing this for free.

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Tell me that was a joke.

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: I deserve a trophy for this performance!

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: I believe I can fly!!! WEK WEK!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Um...don't I look a litttttle hefty for that?

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: Hey, have you ever seen a flying penguin?

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: You must have lost your mind.

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Show me another penguin that can fly like me.

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: No need to waste time. Here we go!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I suggest you study a little on penguin's anatomy.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: Um, have you heard of Law of Gravity? Hello!!

string.name: c36_s1
string.value: I'm at a loss for words...WEK!

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: It's hard to find a penguin as cute-looking as me! WEK!

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: Hey, I've been cute for quite some time, you know! WEK!

string.name: c36_s4
string.value: Really? You're not kidding, right? WEK!

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I'm not CUTE. I'm DASHING. WEK!!!

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: I NEED SOME TRUTH AROUND HERE! WEK!

string.name: c36_f4
string.value: What do you want me to say in return, WEK?

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: You won't find a penguin quite like me. Enjoy it!

string.name: c37_s3
string.value: I can never get enough of your compliments!

string.name: c37_s4
string.value: Thanks for your kind words! I really appreciate that!

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: Since when did we compliment each other anyway...

string.name: c37_f4
string.value: Feed me instead of waxing stupid poetics like that.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I can't eat no more. WEK.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Ugh, I feel like throwing up. WEK.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I need to be on a diet.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: What do you think? Do you want to lie down with me?Grr~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Grrr~ my body's been aching, and this is gooood!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Grr~ No I don...t want to lie down~!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Grr~! Man lying down here? That's a disgrace, a disgrace!!!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't lie down after a meal. I'll get fat really fast~ Grr~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: This would have been perfect if I'm in a warm room right about now~ Kakaka~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Kakaka~ All I need now is a bag of chips and a remote.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I can't hear you, I can't hear you! Grr~!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Well, I feel like doing things my way, anyway~ Kakaka~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: No, then I look fat~ Grr~

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Boss said it, so I might as well lie down~~ Kakaka~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Boss, lie down with me here. Oh, this is good!! Kakaka~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Kakaka~ I must be really old, to really like lying down like this~!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Kahaha~ shall I lie down for a little bit?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Boss, you've grown up quiiiiiiiite a bit. Ordering ME to lie down? Huh? Grr?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Hey, you're talking to a boss monster! No ORDERING here! Grr!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Grr~ Boss, you lie down first~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Grr~ Boss, I don...t feel like doing it right now~

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Ka ... I guess I screwed up this time.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Ka ... let me apologie as only a man can!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: ... don...t tell this to my bro, Crimson Balrog!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Grr!! Who are YOU to get mad at ME?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Are YOU rebelling against me? Grr...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Look I didn't do it on purpose, so let it slide, alright? Grr...

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Grr~ Do you want me to take a bit out of you?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Now I'm angry!!! Really really angry! Krrrr!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Ka ... Boss is doing this because the boss worries about me. Not bad! I'm impressed!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Ka ... you make a grown man like me cry.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: A real man admits his mistakes. ...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Krrr... this is making me MAD MAD MAD!!!!!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm about to lose control~!! Grrrrrrr !!!!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: My eyes have hearts now~ Kakaka~...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You really mean it, huh? This is quite something~

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: And we're going to love forever, no? Grr~?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: You make me laugh my butt off~

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I can't just give my heart away like that~ Grr~

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grr~ It's still a world worth living~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Your love makes me feel excited~ Kaka...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Kakaka~ do you feel my love, too?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Arrrgh... Are you sure you just meant what you said?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Grr~ Wahahahha I'm gonna tell my brother this!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Boss you're a good person~ Grr~

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Kakaka~ Do you see these hearts coming out of my eyes?

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Kaka ... I love the Boss, too.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: This is a little embarassing~ Yoohoo~

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I feel like throwing up that 10 year old pizza ....

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I told you to say the truth!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Kakaka~ now to what extent will the boss lie to me?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Kaka .. This embarasses the heck out of me!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Kakaka~ nothing makes a Balrog dance quite like a compliment~

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Um ... I'm not getting used to it.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Kahaha~ I'm too sexy for this butt~

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I do know that I'm one heck of a looking Balrog~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Grr~ you like me, don't you?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I feel like throwing up after hearing all the lies you just said.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: (throws up) NOW, do I look lovely?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'll just pretend that I didn't hear that.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Which part of me did Boss fall in love with? The luscious lips? Kakaka

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Boss is getting better and better at lying~Grr~

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Boss, your lies make me wanna throw up!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Hah ... Now I feel like doing something!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: This is how you poop with class~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: My gosh, this is huge. Wow.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Grr~ Even a Balrog like me prefers to keep this on a down low~

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: If I poop here, I'll look ... like ...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Pooping requires ample amount of concentration~

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Apply ample amount of pressure, and the poop will naturally ... come out~ Kakaka~

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Now I LOOK GREAT~! LOOK AT ME POOP!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Pooping in a public place like this? Embarassing!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I ... am ... constipating ... need a medicine...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Ahhh ... pooping in public takes a lot of guts.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Only the true men poop like this!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Kaka ... doesn't mine smell better than yours, boss?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Boss, this is what you call a manly poop.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Kakaka, boss poop with me here.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Hey, people are staring at me!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Do I HAVE to poop, boss? Really?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Kakaka~ take a look at this!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Kakaka ... no I'm not doing this to make you feel bad.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: This is what you call a MANLY smile!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Ka... I'm going through a tough time...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Ka... I am too tired to smile today.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: ... it's not easy being a loner.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Grrr, now this is one beautiful smile~

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I am the biggest star in MapleStory! Muahahah

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Ka ... I'm sad. Actually, I'm sad because I'm hungry.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Being a loner is killing me again. Sob sob.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: This is what I'd call a killer smile to you, Boss~

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Boss, your smile looks a million bucks! Smile with me!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Kahaha~ I'm smiling because I'm feeling good~!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Kahaha ... I call this, the bossy smile.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Grrr... boss, you want me to smile, and now I feel like crying.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Loner Balrog at your service... sigh...

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: How do you like me sticking my tongue out on you? Blehhhh

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: This does not fit the description of Jr. Balrog.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Grrr ... real men don't stick their tongues out!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Bleeehhhh, doesn't this really make you mad?

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Kakaka ... real men stick their tongue out in a classy manner like this.

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: My brother Crimson Balrog told me to cut it out.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Blehh isn't for free of charge.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I don't feel like doing it today. Leave me a lone.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: I've been practicing 'blehh' for the last couple of weeks. You like this?

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Boss, you like me blehing you, huh? Hahaha

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Kaka... boss, you just keep doing it, and I'll make fun of you here.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Boss is blocking my way from becoming a true alpha dog.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Dude, this does not make me look like a boss character.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Boss, why do I have to do this?

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Say hello to the purest set of eyes in MapleStory!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: I know you like to see my eyes, so here they are!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Have you ever seen a look as piercing as this?

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Kakaka, this isn't something I'll do for free.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Is this good enough? I know you like it.

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: In terms of my eyes, these are much more beautiful than that of my brother Crimson Balrog's!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Grr.., I don't feel like doing this.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Why don't we just lie down here and chill?

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: You'll get sick of it if you see this too often.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: This is what you call the eyes of a true gentleman! Grr!

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: They call me Eagle-Eye Balrog~ Kakaka~!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Boss, this is how much I care about you. Just look at my eyes!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: I'd like to chill for a second.

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: You try first, boss! Let me see your eyes!

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Have you ever been to the Cursed Shrine?

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Hey, I may look intimidating, but deep down inside, I'm a man in need of love~

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Everytime I look at the mirror, I can't help but see how good-looking I am.

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: I like the fact that I look as manly as one can get in MapleStory~ Kakaka~

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Kakaka, if I tell you, are you going to pay me?

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: Kakaka, my mouth is just dying to say something...

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: Hey, I'm watching Maple Idol! Move away from TV!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: My wings are my source of pride and joy!

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: It's only obvious that people are scared of me. I'm Balrog!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: These muscles... let's just say, these babies didn't come for free!

string.name: c32_s4
string.value: I know I'm good looking, and I want everyone to know that, too.

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: I feel like eating snack right now. Get me some!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: Let's just lie down and chill.

string.name: c33_s1
string.value: Hey, boss, have you met my brother, Crimson Balrog?

string.name: c33_s2
string.value: I want to be much more masculine, like my brother Crimson.

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: I value friendship more than anything else!

string.name: c33_s4
string.value: Kaka ... it's been a pleasure knowing you, boss!

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: I don't feel like doing anything right now...

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: Let's just lie down and chillllll.

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Let's do this some other time.

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: Grr.... And I am so sick of ...~Zzz..Z..zz..

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: I'll see you in my dream, kid!

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Grr ... I feel like sleeping ... right ... now ...

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Call me the hardest working Balrog in this world!

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: Grrr ... I don't feel like sleeping!

string.name: c36_s1
string.value: Grrr ... I better start scaring people that are on board ... grrr ...

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: Grrr ... the way of a man .... Boss ... stupid...

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping! Grr!

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: Grr!! Boss, are you just ordering me?!

string.name: c37_s1
string.value: Pshhh ... this isn't a regular GAS. Hahha.

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: This smell of gas is trickling my nose~ Kakaka~

string.name: c37_s4
string.value: Whoa, I almost pooped it away~!

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: How am I going to fart in public? No way!

string.name: c37_f2
string.value: Kahaha, people will really make fun of me.

string.name: c37_f3
string.value: Oh my, how can you say such thing...

string.name: c37_f4
string.value: Grrr ... does it HAVE to be just gas?

string.name: c38_s1
string.value: Pshhhh I can actually make a song out of my gaseous adventure.

string.name: c38_s2
string.value: Boss, check out the smell. Isn't it sweet? Haha.

string.name: c38_s3
string.value: My gosh, I'm feeling dizzy right now from all that gas...

string.name: c38_s4
string.value: Dang, this even smells like my snack from last night

string.name: c38_f3
string.value: Kahaha ... Boss, that was so mean for you to order me to do something degrading like this!

string.name: c38_f4
string.value: Look, I don...t feel like passing out to my own gas.

string.value: Ahh, this is comfortable~ Thank you! Kiyong!
