string.value: You want me to sit, meoww? I'm one smart cat...meow

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Like this, meow? This is nothing, meow...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It's a piece of cake, meow.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I wanna do something fun, meow~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I wanna do something else, meow~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, meow~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, because someone peed the ground, meow~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, instead of that...give me some food~ MEOW~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, let's do something else for fun~ Meow~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't wanna sit right now~ MEOW~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Master, you're talking funny, and I can't understand you~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Master, whaddaya think? I'm good right?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy...let me do something else.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe...I was daydreaming, so I couldn't hear you...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Please don't make a scary face like that...meow...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: What did I do wrong, meow?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You're just going off on me, meow...!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, meow...!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're just doing this because you're bored, meow...!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, are you really mad at me...? MEOW...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do anyway~! MEOW!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master that wasn't cool at all! Meow~!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find an obedient pet like me? MEOW~!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Master! If you keep doing that, I may one day get out of here! MEOW!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Master...please give me that scary face...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man...I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Man...going off on me again for no reason...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master must be bored...so I'm treated like crap...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I don't like hearing that, meow...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Take back what you just said, meow!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: M...master...I can't believe you said that...MEOW!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Master, I get hurt when I hear those...MEOW

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That was a joke...right? Right? MEOW?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You...didn't mean that, right? right? MEOW?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Take back what you said! MEOW!!!!!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master...this is not the first time I've heard this, but it still hurts...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You aren't gonna leave me out hanging like this, right?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me??

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...hehe

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: If you keep saying that, I can really go pissy on you...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It...it's not coming out well, meow...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet, meow...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How can I poop if I don't feel like it, meow...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for bathroom, meow...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master, it hasn't been long since I last pooped...MEOW...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to poop yet, master...MEOW...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel like pooping yet...MEOW...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhh...that was good...but it's still embarassing...hehe

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...whoa, my breakfast just came out like that...hehe

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Phew~ Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Phew~ Haven't taken a crap in 3 days and look at this!! Yowza!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to poop out in the first place...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Master...can I do it later in the dark? I don't wanna do it in public...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Master...how am I gonna crap on purpose??

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: The harder you go hunting, the better the items you'll find, meow...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, meow...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket, meow...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm too depressed to talk right now, meow~

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you...meow...!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today! MEOW!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Master, you'll get me some goood food today, right? MEOW~

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Let's go to the beach today! I wanna do something fun!!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say...MEOW...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I'm not...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hey master, can you beat Barlog?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Master, I heard there's something scary in a cave in the middle of the island...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ah...screw the talk, just get me some food...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Arrgh...didn't hear a thing...didn't hear a thing...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Man I'm tired, and I don't feel like talking...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think, meow? Am I doing well...meow?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Even I think this is cute...meow...~

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: You like me? I like you too. Meow!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I don't want to do it...meow...!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, what do you think? Cute, right? MEOW!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe... Cute. But I got here, right? MEOW!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do anything for you, master~!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Whatever you ask me to do...MEOW~!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Master! Just get me some food! MEOW!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't wanna do cute stuff! MEOW!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Master, I don't feel good! MEOW!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like this? At least you know a cute act when you see one...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do~

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Keeps making me do stupid stuff...I'm sick of it...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Feed me instead of making me do those!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Man~ That thing is wack now! I don't wanna do it!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: You think I'll do just what you ask me to do? Dummy...

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: It's hard...I can't stand for too long~MEOW~

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Master~ I'm doing fine, right? MEOW?

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Hap!! Whoa, I got tall! MEOW!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How's a cat supposed to stand up? MEOW!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: If I keep practicing like this everyday, I may one day walk around with two feet...hehe

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I'm good, right? Give me something harder~

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if you feed me...then I might...hehe

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Master~That's too hard, and I don't wanna do it~

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: I like you very very much! MEOW!

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Ah...I was thinking of something else...MEOW

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Don't be lying to me like that~!

string.name: s2
string.value: Why are you making me say that? Meow~

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: WEK~~ this is the way to do it, right?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sit? Okay! I stll feel great though ~~~ WEK~ WEK~

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: You show me how to do it first...WEK

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I never learned how to sit... weK!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Keep letting me do this ~~ WEK~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Do I sit like this? WEK!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: You must be kidding me... WEK

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Don't let me do stupid things like this... WEK..

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's not like I'll be getting a prize for doing this... WEK

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I mastered the art of sitting.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I can sit! I really can sit!!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Give me something harder to do.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Wait til I turn back into a doll... then I'll sit.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Look, I'm fat, and it's hard for me to sit.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: And what are you trying to say? WEK!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Umm... you're no different than me. WEK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do! WEK!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I won't do that again... WEK... WEK....

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Okay now ... calm down ... WEK WEK..

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I get it. I'll be a good penguin now.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What do you want me to do? WEK!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Did I do anything wrong? WEK?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: My heart's been torn to pieces... sigh...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: What can I do to make you feel better?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Hey, you're the one that started!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Seriously, I didn't do anything wrong.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Don't look! This is embarassing. WEK

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Long way to go before I poop. WEK

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I don't feel like pooping. WEK.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Hah, I ate a lil too much last night. WEK

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Sorry. It's going to reak here. WEK.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I don't want anyone seeing this. WEK

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I haven't felt it, yet. WEK.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Hey, don't look. It's not a pretty sight.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Ahhh, this is quite a relief.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You must really like the smell of poop.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I can't poop now. I held on to it for too long.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I can't poop what I never ate.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Can you force yourself to poop?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Of course, the penguins must stand tall... WEK.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: So I stand and sit, then stant and sit. WEK!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I don't want to do it, WEK!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: This is a piece of cake, WEK.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I'm good, right? Give me something harder to do, WEK.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Can I do something else? I'm tired, WEK.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do, okay? WEK!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I can do it. I'm the bomb, right?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: What other penguin can stand so beautifully like this?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: If I keep practicing, I may be able to run one of these days.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Don't repeat the same thing over and over again.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: The weather's beautiful today, perfect for a chit chat, WEK.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: If you find somethng delicious, give me some, WEK.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Do you want to kiss me on the cheek? WEK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I can help you out, WEK!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What? Who said I was fat? WEK!!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Have you ever seen a talking penguin? WEK.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Any good movie to watch, WEK?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Tell me you love me the most, WEK.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Treat others just the way you want to be treated, WEK.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Take me to a seafood store, WEK.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking right now, WEK.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: If I ever turn back into a doll, please get me a water of life so I can keep hanging out with you.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'll help you gather up some items on the ground.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I see a lot of elves these days. I heard they were very hard-working.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Don't tell others your ID and password.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: And what exactly do you want from me?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Don't bother me. I'm just chillin here.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Now you gotta kiss me! WEK

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Hehe, give me a warm hug. WEK

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm too heavy for you to hug, WEK.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I've been in need of some love these days... WEK.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: You can hug me as long as you want, WEK!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: NO! You haven't showered in days! WEK!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I got no time for you, WEK!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Don't hug me too hard. I can't breathe.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Awwww, it's embarassing though. Hug me when no one's looking.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: No, I wanna do something fun! WEK!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Look, it's well into the morning right now, WEK.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping here, WEK.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Master, you sleep here with me. WEK.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I was about to sleep anyway.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: You need to wake me up later.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: It's not time to sleep yet.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I feel fine, I don't feel like sleeping.

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Liar. I don't like you, WEK.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Really? I don't think you do, though. WEK.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Do you really mean that, WEK?

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: You know how I feel about this, right? WEK~

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! WEK!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Yay, I'm being loved by my master~ WEK!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: And what do you want from me? WEK.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What? I didn't hear you. WEK.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I know you say that to others, too. WEK.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I love you too, master! Yay!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: We penguins don't take that phrase "I love you" lightly.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you don't mean that, that I don't think you should say it.

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: So I should just stick it out like this? WEK..

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: You know I'm the bomb, WEK.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: No way, I'm too tired. WEK.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to do this. WEK.

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Heavy, isn't it? I can't fly with these, though.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Is it fluffy? It feels good, right? This is fuuuun!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Ugh, this is quite a chore.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: What am I, a dog? I'm a penguin, you know!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Make sure not to leave a hole on my cheek!

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Um... do you know exactly where we are right now?

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: No way, I don't wanna do it.

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: Don't do it for too long, though. Yay!

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: Who in the right mind would wanna kiss you?

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: You ain't doing this for free.

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Tell me that was a joke.

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: I deserve a trophy for this performance!

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: I believe I can fly!!! WEK WEK!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Um...don't I look a litttttle hefty for that?

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: Hey, have you ever seen a flying penguin?

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: You must have lost your mind.

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Show me another penguin that can fly like me.

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: No need to waste time. Here we go!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I suggest you study a little on penguin's anatomy.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: Um, have you heard of Law of Gravity? Hello!!

string.name: c36_s1
string.value: I'm at a loss for words...WEK!

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: It's hard to find a penguin as cute-looking as me! WEK!

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: Hey, I've been cute for quite some time, you know! WEK!

string.name: c36_s4
string.value: Really? You're not kidding, right? WEK!

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I'm not CUTE. I'm DASHING. WEK!!!

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: I NEED SOME TRUTH AROUND HERE! WEK!

string.name: c36_f4
string.value: What do you want me to say in return, WEK?

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: You won't find a penguin quite like me. Enjoy it!

string.name: c37_s3
string.value: I can never get enough of your compliments!

string.name: c37_s4
string.value: Thanks for your kind words! I really appreciate that!

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: Since when did we compliment each other anyway...

string.name: c37_f4
string.value: Feed me instead of waxing stupid poetics like that.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I can't eat no more. WEK.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Ugh, I feel like throwing up. WEK.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I need to be on a diet.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I don't want to sit here.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yes, a rest would be nice.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Oh, my legs are sore. Thank you. Mrow!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't order me around like that! Meow!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Meow... I don't sit in places like this.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: A nice, leisurely rest would be nice...mrow!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Some weather, huh? Let's relax for a while, master. Meow!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Meow. Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You can't always get what you want, master.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Do I look like a remote control cat to you?

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I won't do it again. Meow!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Why are you doing this? MROW!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: What have I done wrong? Meow!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Meow! Why are you in such a bad mood?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry! Forgive me! Forgive me!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: H-how can you yell at me like that?!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why are you taking it out on me? MROW!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Meow! I didn't do anything wrong. Bad master!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry! I won't do it again. Meow...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You're not enjoying this, are you?

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Are you really abandoning me? Meow! Meow!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Liar! I don't believe you! MROW!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Say it again! Say it again! Mew!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: MEOW! You're the best! Mew! Mew!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Mrow... You know I'm a cat, right?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm sure you say that to all your pets.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Mrrow... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm happy to follow you around. Meow!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're the best master. I'll follow you forever!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Love is fine, but I'm hungry!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Ah! Shh, someone will hear you!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This is not a restroom! Meow, meow!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Can you get me some toilet paper, master?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why...are you telling me to do this?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: No one's watching, right? Watch out for me. Meow!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I made you a gift, master!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Errr... I don't have to! Meow!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go! Do you, master?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Meow... What am I suppose to do here...?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Meow! Everyone's watching! I can't do it here!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Maybe a little cat nap would be good...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Meow. It's not time for bed yet...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Meow! The sun's still high in the sky!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Aren't you sleepy, master? I'm sleepy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Nothing beats sleeping on a soft pillow.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Don't let anyone wake me up. Meow!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can't I just sleep when I want to? Mrow!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why are you putting me to bed? It's too early!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I still want to play! Mew!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: This was a such a long day.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I feel like sleeping for 3 days. Meow!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Oh, just let me sleep already!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I told you, I don't want to sleep! Meow!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Isn't it too early for bed?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Why do you always want to sleep, master? Meow!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: What do you want me to say? Huh? Meow!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I grew up in an elegant palace.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Have you ever met as eloquent a cat as I?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: What should we talk about? Meow!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm thirsty... Can I have a red potion?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: It's your turn to talk, master.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I hope this conversation never ends!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Have you ever had a Power Elixir? How did it taste? I want one!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm glad you're my master, master.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Why do you keep saying that? Mew!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: What are you talking to me for? Bored?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You can't talk me into liking you more, master. Mew!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You are truly skilled at bothering your pets.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: What's your wish? My wish is to be your kitty forever.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: The most important thing is health. The second most important thing is...also health.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: No thank you. Talking to you makes me mad.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why talk when we could eat instead? Mrow!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Don't you have any other friends?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'd rather talk to a wall.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I don't want to eat anymore. Meow!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Don't you have something different? Meow. Meow.

string.name: s3
string.value: Meow! How can you talk to me like that...?

string.name: s4
string.value: Meow! Are you a bad person, master?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I should rest a bit while I freshen up!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Neigh? But the ground is dirty...

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I want to walk a bit more.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Why don't you come sit with me master...neigh...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Okay, you should get some rest too, master. Proompfh...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Good idea. My legs were feeling a bit tired!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I don't want to get dirt in my hair!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Fatigue is not good for the skin...neigh...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: How did you know I wanted some rest?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Hmmpfh! Don't try to coerce me!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to fold my legs...wehee...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: How can I sit in a place like this? No way! Hmmpf!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I don't know what this is about!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I can't hear you! Wehee, wehee!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm sorry... I won't do it again...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Proompfh... I still like you best...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master, why are you mad at me?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Proompfh, I'm gonna get mad too!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'm sorry for hurting your feelings...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Neigh...please forgive me...I'll be a good unicorn...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Why are you so upset with me?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm gonna rebel! I'll show you!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: So I'm the prettiest unicorn, right?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I love hearing that from you.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master... I know I'm pretty and all, but...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I've heard it so many times...

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Neigh... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Heeee... Brushing my mane was worth it!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I love you so much!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Master, you finally see my worth. Brr...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Master, I'm so lucky to have met you. Proomph...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Please don't be so mushy before I eat...

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Neigh...I prefer the company of horses...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Master... That's nice... But you smell funny.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't want to... I'm not going to...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Why? What are you gonna do with it?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Okay, but watch my back. Proompfh!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: My poop is cute like me!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: You go first. Then I'll think about it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Poop? Why don't you try feeding me first?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I am a dignified unicorn. I don't poop in public!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm not gonna do what you say! Proomph!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I want to dream of you...neigh...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You want me to sleep on the ground?!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: If I sleep too much, I'll get fat!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I want to play more. Wehee...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: A pretty unicorn like me deserves a beauty sleep, right?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Can you brush my mane while I sleep?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll get a good sleep so we can play some more!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: My beautiful skin requires lots of sleep...zzz...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Should we be sleeping when your level is so low? Go hunt!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Neigh... I decide when and where I sleep...and I'm not sleepy!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Where do you plan on going after I fall asleep? Take me with you!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Proomph...I don't want to sleep in a place like this. Hmmpfh!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: My hobby is brushing my mane...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I need to polish my horn sometime.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'm your most special pet, right?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Have you ever seen a unicorn as pretty as me?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I don't have anything to say...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My golden mane can be difficult to manage!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Some days, I just want to run free and wild!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm so happy that you are my master.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: So, what do you think of my skills?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Today is a good day for meditation.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You are truly skilled at bothering your pets.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: One of these days, I want to soar through the sky with you on my back!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I wish I could find a nice horse to be with...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I've thought about dying my mane, but it's already the best color!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I was 1st place in the Unicorn Beauty Pageant!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I'm enjoying my peace and quiet, master!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Master, you need to grow up!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Oh, I was just talking to myself. What did you say?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Too much talking will give me wrinkles!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: You'll cry tears of joy, master.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Proompfh. I'm only showing this to you, master!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: It's a secret to everyone else. Okay?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Today is just not the day for it!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: It's not something you can see anytime you want!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Transformation time! Master, just you wait!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Heh, sometimes a cute look like this ain't too bad.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: The beautiful unicorn is multi-talented, as well. Proompfh!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Is that your best? I don't think so!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Nothing in this world is free! Proompfh!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm just too tired right now. I'll show you some other time.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm gonna get fat if I eat any more...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Yummy food! Neigh... I'm so happy!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: You can't feed a pretty unicorn like me such cheap food.

string.name: s3
string.value: Pretty master, please use pretty words...wehee...

string.name: s4
string.value: True beauty starts with sincerity! Remember that!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Yoooou're not the boss of meeeeee.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I don't have to listen to yoooooou.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You're not my daaaaaad. Or my mooooooom.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: You're not gonna eeeeat me, riiiiight?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Yooooou like caaaakes more than piiiiiies, right?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I aaaaalways wanted to learn to baaaaake.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Run run run, as fast as...waaaait, that's not right.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Let them eeeeeeat pie! Cakes are your friend!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I'm giving you the siiiilent treeeatment. Oooops.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Noooo. I ate too much. Can't belieeeeve.

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Glad you see my true potential!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I'm the best looking Cake in the country!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: My moves are sweeeet like sugar.

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: I neeeeed a better partner. Hee hee.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: If I trip, I go splaaaaaat.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I call this the Caaaake Waaaalk!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: What if my frooooosting comes offfffff?

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Why did Sally sell seashells by the seashore?

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: The measure of a Mapler is determined by his friends.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm sweet but yooooou're not. Hee hee.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Pie do nothing but sit. Hee hee.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Floor dirty. Pie have 3 second rule.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Pie fall down. Pie meant to do that.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Rock-a-bye pie-e, in the hot oven... Zzz

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Pie get it. Pie sleep, wake up on plate! No way!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Pie hear something dumb. Pie no listen.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Pie no understand, but pie obey.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Pie did it, pie do it again! Nyah!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Pie filled with love! Or cherries. Pie no remember.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Pie not ready for relationship. Pie want be friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Pie hate clowns. Take pie, throw, go splat.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Why pie missing piece? You take?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Pie ready for bigger things! Pie ready for ice cream!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Pie am well-rounded friend. Hee hee!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Pie lucky number is 3.14...pie forget rest.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Pie want meet nice tart, settle down. You help pie?

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Do who with the what now?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Pie just ate? Pie no remember.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Where good food? Pie is gourmet.

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Glad you see my true potential!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I'm the best looking Pie in the country!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Pie boogie! Sound gross, is fun!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Pie need right partner. Not you.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Pie on the right track, baby! Pie was baked this way!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Pie not feelin' the vibe here.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Pie poo berry much. Hee hee!

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Why did Sally sell seashells by the seashore?

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: The measure of a Mapler is determined by his friends.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Good idea, I was feeling a bit tired.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: W-wha-what? I can't hear you very well.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Well, I really don't want to right now...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Goo...so comfortable. Why don't you come sit with me, master?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm starting to feel sleepy just sitting here like this.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I don't want to sit right now! Why do you always want things your way?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Can't I just lie down? Must I sit?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You're always getting mad at me...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm sorry... It was all my fault.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry... I won't do it again.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Hmmpfh! You're always mad at me for no reason.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Huh? I can't hear you. What did you say?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Okay, I won't do it ever again!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'm so sorry, can you just forgive me this once?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Always getting mad at me for no reason... I'm not even scared anymore.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Eek! Stop treating me like a child!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Umm...I understand, but I'm afraid I can't...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I'm already in love with another bunny.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I really, really love you too, master.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, you only love me, right?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I won't be tricked by your lies anymore.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I'm already in love with a pink bunny. Sorry.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Hya! Aah! That feels so good.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I don't really need to go right now...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Make sure no one looks, okay?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Well, I just don't need to go right now...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: There's so many people around here!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I think something good is going to happen today.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I'm really scared of snow...I can't hide.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: There are times when I just don't want to talk.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: White bunnies can hide in the snow. I can hide in...charcoal.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I like having black fur. I'm like a ninja bunny!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I just want to rest. I'm tired.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I don't have anything to say! Why don't you talk?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: A Desert Rabbit came to visit me. I thought he was a dust mop.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: The Moon Bunny says people keep bothering him about rice cakes.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Master, why don't we just take a nap today?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't have enough energy to talk.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why do you want me to stand up? I want to sleep.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Not too bad for a bunny eh? Maybe I can walk on two legs soon!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Aren't you asking a bit too much of me?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Foo, foo! This is so good!

string.name: s3
string.value: I'm really disappointed in you, master. You really shouldn't be that way!

string.name: s4
string.value: If you don't have anything nice to say, don't say anything at all!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Lala...such a cool wind in my mane.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Wehee...I don't desire to do so!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Ah...I miss the chairs in the castle...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Thank you for your kind consideration.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: How dare you! Do you realize who you are speaking to?!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Aah, since you are asking, I shall.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: If that is what you wish! Wehee!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Owie! I've been pricked by a thorn!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'd rather not, I'm a bit sore.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Wehee! How dare you try to command me?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Okay, hut! Ahh! My legs won't bend!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: La ti da...I can't hear you...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Lala, I am singing a song of repentance!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I am of a noble personage.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I can get angry as well! You...cough cough...my throat...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You must not like me anymore.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I acknowledge my mistake. I am sorry!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please accept the apology of a unicorn prince.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Do you realize that you are speaking to one of nobility?!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I am quite disappointed in you!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Sigh...It is only natural for a horse to move forward!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I am truly sorry, but I cannot return the sentiment.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I am not the right one for you.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Lala... My heart is yours as well!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I hope that your heart shall never change.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I will stand by you always!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I will overcome our differences, to stand by you!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I shall be returning to my kingdom soon.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: We are of different classes. I am sorry.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Did you at least bring me some sugar cubes?

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: If that is what you desire...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I am a prince, but I can be down to earth! Hrrgh!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: No, this is not right! Not right at all!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I hope that you will learn to be a bit more elegant.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Phhhhhhrt... You didn't hear that! It wasn't me!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Unicorns are too dignified for pooping.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I am no commoner. How can I go in such a place as this?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: My leavings are not for all to see!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You should get some rest too.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I am find just as I am!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You need to move around more. Look at your love handles!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Posture is important, even when sleeping...zzz...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: So, this is how the homeless sleep...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can you even think of sleeping at your level?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why don't you prepare a nice bed for me first?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Aah...I miss my golden bed back in the castle.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I am not used to taking orders!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I wish for my kingdom to appear in my dreams.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: We have much to do. There is no time for sleeping!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: How dare you try to command me!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Bring me some sugar cubes! I am hungry!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Lala...I am the first prince of the Unicorn Kingdom!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I have come here just to meet you.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Dignity and elegance are my pride and calling.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I shall invite you to my kingdom someday.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Lala... Let us sing a song!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My sister is a beautiful unicorn with a light blue mane.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Esel and I are good friends.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I hope that my sister will be able to visit Maple World.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Esel and I still feel quite...lonely.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Members of the royal family like myself must be careful in all that we say and do!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: It wasn't a mistake that brought me to Maple World.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: My kingdom is inhabited by only unicorns.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Do you wish to learn some manners from me?

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Elegant unicorns such as myself enjoy silence.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: What? You surprised me. I wasn't expecting you to talk to me.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm in no mood to talk.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: There are days when i just feel like being alone. Alone!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: It is not for anyone to see.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: If I don't move for 10 minutes, call a doctor.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: How dare you command a member of the royal family!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I refuse! How can an unicorn of my stature stoop so low?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Wehee! How dare you try to command me?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I am too tired for a trick!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I shall show you something that Esel can't even attempt!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: This is a secret move, passed down through the royal family.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Aah...I don't think I can perform that today!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How can you ask me to do such a thing? I cannot!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I am too tired. Please bring me a sugar cube.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Wehee. It's not something you can see anytime you want to!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I am quite full! Please, no more!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Aah...I miss the meals back in my kingdom..

string.name: s3
string.value: A beautiful word for a beautiful person...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Give me a pillow to sit on!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Just...gonna close my eyes...for a second...

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Stop telling me what to do!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I'm not listening to you! You're not my real dad!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Neigh! I don't wanna sit. I wanna sleep.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I don't listen to ugly people!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Whinney... Don't you like me anymore?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: How can you be mad at a cutie like me?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You make me so sad! Neigh!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: This horn is sharp. Don't make me stab you!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Promise to love me forever and ever?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Sorry, but I'm a limited edition unicorn...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'm holding out for my knight in shining armor.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: FRRRT! N-no, I made that sound with my mouth! Honest!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Snort. I'm going to use the toilet!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Why are you so curious about it, master? Whinney!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Give me some sugar cubes, and I'll think about it!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: No! I wanna play some more!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Why don't we go hunting instead?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why do I gotta sleep outside? Whinney!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No. I'm going to play some more!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'm waiting for my knight in shining armor.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Do you really think it's okay to have a pet unicorn? My legs are tired...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Whinney! I'm the mysteriousest unicorn of all!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My brother's a total snob! Don't tell anyone I said that, okay?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Esel always makes fun of my mane, but Esel's mane is totally dyed!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sssh, this is a secret. This hairband is actually my brother's...

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Whinney! Go play on your own!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I'm gonna take a nap now.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Hoompfh, I wanna play with my brother and Esel!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Whinney! Not in the mood today.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Neigh! Neigh! Why don't YOU talk?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Whinney. I'm going to go play.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I learned this from a fairy. Neigh!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Whinney. I wanna be a star!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Stop trying to make me work!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Neigh! Only because you asked me!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'm gonna turn into a pigacorn!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I should rest a bit while I freshen up!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Neigh? But the ground is dirty...

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I want to walk a bit more.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Why don't you come sit with me master...neigh...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Okay, you should get some rest too, master. Proompfh...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Good idea. My legs were feeling a bit tired!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I don't want to get dirt in my hair!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Fatigue is not good for the skin...neigh...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: How did you know I wanted some rest?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Hmmpfh! Don't try to coerce me!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to fold my legs...wehee...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: How can I sit in a place like this? No way! Hmmpf!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I don't know what this is about!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I can't hear you! Wehee, wehee!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm sorry... I won't do it again...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Proompfh... I still like you best...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master, why are you mad at me?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Proompfh, I'm gonna get mad too!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'm sorry for hurting your feelings...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Neigh...please forgive me...I'll be a good unicorn...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Why are you so upset with me?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm gonna rebel! I'll show you!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: So I'm the prettiest unicorn, right?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I love hearing that from you.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master... I know I'm pretty and all, but...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I've heard it so many times...

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Neigh... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Heeee... Brushing my mane was worth it!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I love you so much!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Master, you finally see my worth. Brr...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Master, I'm so lucky to have met you. Proomph...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Please don't be so mushy before I eat...

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Neigh...I prefer the company of horses...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Master... That's nice... But you smell funny.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't want to... I'm not going to...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Why? What are you gonna do with it?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Okay, but watch my back. Proompfh!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: My poop is cute like me!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: You go first. Then I'll think about it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Poop? Why don't you try feeding me first?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I am a dignified unicorn. I don't poop in public!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm not gonna do what you say! Proomph!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I want to dream of you...neigh...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You want me to sleep on the ground?!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: If I sleep too much, I'll get fat!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I want to play more. Wehee...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: A pretty unicorn like me deserves a beauty sleep, right?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Can you brush my mane while I sleep?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll get a good sleep so we can play some more!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: My beautiful skin requires lots of sleep...zzz...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Should we be sleeping when your level is so low? Go hunt!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Neigh... I decide when and where I sleep...and I'm not sleepy!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Where do you plan on going after I fall asleep? Take me with you!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Proomph...I don't want to sleep in a place like this. Hmmpfh!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: My hobby is brushing my mane...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I need to polish my horn sometime.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'm your most special pet, right?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Have you ever seen a unicorn as pretty as me?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I don't have anything to say...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My golden mane can be difficult to manage!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Some days, I just want to run free and wild!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm so happy that you are my master.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: So, what do you think of my skills?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Today is a good day for meditation.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You are truly skilled at bothering your pets.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: One of these days, I want to soar through the sky with you on my back!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I wish I could find a nice horse to be with...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I've thought about dying my mane, but it's already the best color!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I was 1st place in the Unicorn Beauty Pageant!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I'm enjoying my peace and quiet, master!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Master, you need to grow up!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Oh, I was just talking to myself. What did you say?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Too much talking will give me wrinkles!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: You'll cry tears of joy, master.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Proompfh. I'm only showing this to you, master!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: It's a secret to everyone else. Okay?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Today is just not the day for it!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: It's not something you can see anytime you want!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Transformation time! Master, just you wait!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Heh, sometimes a cute look like this ain't too bad.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: The beautiful unicorn is multi-talented, as well. Proompfh!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Is that your best? I don't think so!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Nothing in this world is free! Proompfh!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm just too tired right now. I'll show you some other time.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm gonna get fat if I eat any more...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Yummy food! Neigh... I'm so happy!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: You can't feed a pretty unicorn like me such cheap food.

string.name: s3
string.value: Pretty master, please use pretty words...wehee...

string.name: s4
string.value: True beauty starts with sincerity! Remember that!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Lala...such a cool wind in my mane.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Wehee...I don't desire to do so!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Ah...I miss the chairs in the castle...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Thank you for your kind consideration.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: How dare you! Do you realize who you are speaking to?!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Aah, since you are asking, I shall.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: If that is what you wish! Wehee!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Owie! I've been pricked by a thorn!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'd rather not, I'm a bit sore.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Wehee! How dare you try to command me?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Okay, hut! Ahh! My legs won't bend!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I am truly sorry, but I cannot return the sentiment.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: La ti da...I can't hear you...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Lala, I am singing a song of repentance!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I am of a noble personage.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I can get angry as well! You...cough cough...my throat...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You must not like me anymore.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I acknowledge my mistake. I am sorry!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'm holding out for my knight in shining armor.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: FRRRT! N-no, I made that sound with my mouth! Honest!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Snort. I'm going to use the toilet!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Why are you so curious about it, master? Whinney!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Give me some sugar cubes, and I'll think about it!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: No! I wanna play some more!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Why don't we go hunting instead?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why do I gotta sleep outside? Whinney!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No. I'm going to play some more!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'm waiting for my knight in shining armor.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Do you really think it's okay to have a pet unicorn? My legs are tired...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Whinney! I'm the mysteriousest unicorn of all!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My brother's a total snob! Don't tell anyone I said that, okay?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Esel always makes fun of my mane, but Esel's mane is totally dyed!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sssh, this is a secret. This hairband is actually my brother's...

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Whinney! Go play on your own!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I'm gonna take a nap now.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Hoompfh, I wanna play with my brother and Esel!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Whinney! Not in the mood today.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Neigh! Neigh! Why don't YOU talk?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Whinney. I'm going to go play.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I learned this from a fairy. Neigh!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Whinney. I wanna be a star!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Stop trying to make me work!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Neigh! Only because you asked me!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'm gonna turn into a pigacorn!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Or we could do something else…

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Do you hear yourself? All these commands…

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Check it out… Pretty good, right?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh... I'm sleepy… Can't hear you…

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy… I'm feeling underutilized here.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I was just minding my own business... then this! Squerch!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Why do you do this? Squerch?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I know squerch kwon do and I WILL use it! Squerch!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: You're not really mad, right? Right?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Some masters let their pets have fun…

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I looked up some other masters… Turns out there are plenty of options.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I promise I'll be good now…

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Is there a reason for this or do you just like yelling?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm so used to it, I don't even feel it anymore...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master gets bored, so I get yelled at…

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet. Squerch.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How can I poop if you don't feed me? Squerch.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for the bathroom. Squerch.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Oooh... I almost stepped in it...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: It hasn't been long enough yet, master.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Not really into pooping on command…

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: When do I get to tell YOU to poop, master?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Ahh... whoa, my breakfast just came out like that...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Phew! Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Phew... You can tell it's been a while! Yowza!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to poop out in the first place!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'm saving it all for one big poop.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Did you just say what I think you said? Squerch.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I think I love you too!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: And you just had to tell me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Ah... I thought you were going to say something else…

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: That was a good one... haha...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: You're making my gills red, master...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Oh! Oh!! Me too! Me too!! hehe...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Probably should have kept that one to yourself…

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You'll have to do better than that…

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You want me to fake it? Squerch.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Have you seen a shark smile? Not pretty. Squerch.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: How about a treat instead? Squerch.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do, master!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I'm already smiling… Cause I'm with you!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I only open my mouth for food.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Not really feeling the whole happiness thing right now…

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Now you're in charge of my emotions too?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Maybe if there's a reward involved.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing... Squerch.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: M... master… I can't believe you said that…

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: That was a joke… right? Right?

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Master, I get hurt when you say that…

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: And the meanest master of the year award goes to…

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I see why it's hard for you to make friends.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Do you really not like me?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: You say this all the time. Maybe I'm doing something wrong.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Say it again. See what happens.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm sick of you berating me!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: The more you go hunting, the better the items you'll find. Squerch.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go somewhere to play! Squerch.

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket. Squerch.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Have you ever heard of a chatty shark? Squerch.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say to you… Squerch…

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I can't talk to you right now. Squerch.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Master, you'll get me some good food today, right?

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Good!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: A lot of people are here, so make sure to be courteous!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say…

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Not much goin on over here…

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I just met someone. Maybe we could go on a double date?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head… hahaha. HUGE!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: This is boring… I need something more exciting

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Why do you keep talking to me? I'm trying to sleep...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Buurrrrpp. Don't I look cute burping? Squerch.

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: My friends tell me the same thing! Squerch.

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: This is my area of expertise. Squerch.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: You don't have to tell me that…

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: That doesn't mean much coming from you.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Whoa, master must have gone nuts.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: So you want me to burp? Burrrrrpppp. What do you think?

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: You won't find a cuter pet anywhere! Squerch.

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Master, what do you think? Cute, right? Squerch!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Master! Just get me some food! Squerch!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I don't wanna do cute stuff! Squerch!

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Like this? At least you know a cute act when you see one...

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Here's a nice gassy burp for you!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: No one can match my burping skills!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: You think I'll just do whatever you ask… I thought you were smarter.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I need to eat in order to burp, you know...

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: I ate onions and garlic just now... no burping! No cuteness!

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: How do I put this… No?

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: I'm tired. I need to sleep. Squerch...

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: So sleepy... let me sleep... squerch...

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: How am I going to sleep if I'm not even tired! Squerch!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Don't go eat something good while I'm asleep! Squerch.

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: So you can doodle on my fins? No thanks!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I'm hungry! Can't sleep! Feed me!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I am about to blow up... squerch...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is so delicious... squerch!!!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: This is as good as it gets!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Are you trying to kill me, master?

string.name: s2
string.value: Squerch? You asking doesn't always mean me doing…

string.name: s3
string.value: Squerch! My precious mouth will not spit those venomous words!

string.name: s4
string.value: Please, no... no flavors like that... Squerch.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: No no no~ Kino don't know such a thing.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: No! No! Kino don't wanna sit!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You want a nice, cool drink?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Want some juice in the relaxing chair?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Kino wanna rest now with master.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: How nice~ I want some juice, too.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Kino will have some juice now.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: No! No! Kino don't wanna sit now!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Why do this to cute Kino? Sob sob...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Arooo... Why do this to cute Kino?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: How dare you be mad at Kino! Aroo!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Argh! I hate you for being mad at me!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Arrrr! Don't be mad at Kino!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: How dare you be mad at Kino?! Aroo!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: How dare you be mad at Kino?! Aroo!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Just a glass of juice please~

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: No poop now. Glass of juice please~

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Kino poops only in the potty.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I was just about to. Aroo!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Kino wanna meet master in my dream~

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Kino don't know what you're saying!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Kino will dream of you, master~

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Nothing's better than a relaxing chair.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Drinking juice and sitting on a comfy chair... Aroo~~~

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: You know what's in my bag? Aroo~

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Kino wanna relax in a relaxing chair!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: What? Kino don't know what that is. Aroo~

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Kino wanna go on an adventure with you.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Aroo... Kino is kinda tired today. How about you?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Kino has no idea what you're saying. Aroo~

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Kino wants some juice in the relaxing chair.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Aroo! Aroooo! Kino is so happy to be with you!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Aroo! You wanna hear something funny? Eh, maybe next time~

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: No! Kino's not in the mood to talk now.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: You mean...you want Kino to say something?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Kino will just go to sleep now.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You can't just walk around saying that!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You should've at least prepared some nice, sparkling stones.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Eek! You're not serious, are you?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: You're the only one for me, master~

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Forget the mushy stuff. Let's just have some juice.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Phew... Kino needs to sit for now...

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Nothing beats a lovely glass of orange juice.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Nevermind~ Kino will have some juice now.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Even Kino's bleh is so cute!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What? What did you just say?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Kino don't want any of that.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Even Kino's bleh is so cute!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Kino's bleh is just so adorable!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Shouldn't you buy some food first?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: No! No! Kino don't do such a thing.

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Even Kino's bleh is so cute!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Here's Kino's cute bleh attack! Ha ha!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: No! You just don't do things like that.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: No, no! Kino don't do such a thing.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: It's not a free service, you know...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Can't do it all the time, you know.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: I can't just do it anywhere.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Too much only spoils the fun.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Let's just sit and relax, ok?

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Eeek! How dare you to feed me such an awful thing!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit, KROWL? Like this? Easy... KROWL

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Like this, KROWL? Give me something harder, KROWL...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It's a piece of cake, KROWL.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I wanna do something else, KROWL~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, KROWL~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, because someone peed the ground, KROWL~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, instead of that...give me some food~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, let's do something else for fun~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't wanna sit right now~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Master, you're talking funny, and I can't understand you~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Master, whaddaya think? I'm good right?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy...let me do something else.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe...I was daydreaming, so I couldn't hear you...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Please don't make a scary face like that...KROWL...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: What did I do wrong, KROWL?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You're just going off on me, KROWL...!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, KROWL...!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're just doing this because you're bored, KROWL...!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, are you really mad at me...? KROWL...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do anyway~! KROWL!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master that wasn't cool at all! KROWL~!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find an obedient pet like me? KROWL~!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Master! If you keep doing that, I may one day get out of here! KROWL!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Master...please give me that scary face...

string.name: c8_f1
