string.value: Yip! Sorry master, but I can't!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Yip! My legs are numb. I can't move...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Yip! There's nothing I can't do if I'm with you, master!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I practice every day, just for you!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Master! Master! Look at me! Yip!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Am I doing good, master? Am I? Yip!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can't, my butt hurts!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: This is boring. Let's try something harder! Yip!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I can't. Why? I don't know... Yip...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Yip. I'll do what you tell me...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Yip! I didn't do anything bad!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Yip! I thought you liked me!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Sorry. I'll be good! Yip yip!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I didn't know any better. Forgive me! Yip!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: It was a mistake! Forgive me! Yip!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Yip! It was just one mistake!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: It's just a tiny mistake. Yip!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I don't wanna be in trouble. Yip!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Yip! I am too a smart doggy!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Yip! Takes one to know one!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Yip! I am smart! I am!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: But you still like me, right? Right?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I still like you, master. Yip!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Yip! I'm tired of this joke.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I know you don't mean it. Yip!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Let's talk about something else. Yip!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Well, I think you're the bee's knees! Yip!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Is this a new game? Yip! Idiot! Mutt! Bad master!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I know you don't mean it. Yip!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: No! Yip! I'm a big strong doggy!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I thought I was constipated, but...nope! Yip!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Yip! But I already did! Yip!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Yip! I need a bag for my poop!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Yip! This one looks just like me! Yip!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Yip! Yip! Okay, now clean it up!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Watch out! I pooped there! Yip!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I can't just poop all day, you know? Yip!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Yip... I think I'm constipated... Grr...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'm trying, but there's nothing to poo.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Yip! It doesn't smell bad, does it?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! Be careful! I dumped it right next to you.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I can't go right now. Yip yip!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I like waking up early! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: You're my favorite! If anyone else likes you, I'll bite 'em! Yip!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Yip! Let's do a quest! Wanna do a quest? Let's do a quest!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: When I look into your eyes, it's like I can read your mind. Yip!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I wanna be quiet right now. Yip yip yip yip yip!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: *Whimper* It's so cloudy today. I wish the sun was out.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I got nothing special to say. Yip!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Admins never ask for your password! Yip! What's a password?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I could look at you all day. Yip yip!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Is there really a scary dragon living in Leafre? Yip!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Yip! What do you like most about me, master? Yip yip!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Yip! Woah, I'm so out of it right now.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I tried to look up my horoscope, but I can't read. Yip!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Yip! Yip yip! My back ITCHES!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can read your miiiind!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Thanks to all the treats, I got a tummy! Yip!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'm not scared of no monsters! Just gimme potions. Yip!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You look JUST like me, master. Yip!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tail's wagging! Look at it go!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'm hungry. Gimme a snack. Yip!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Let's get on a boat! Yip!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Yip. What do you want me to say?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Yip yip yip! Tell me a joke!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Don't I look cool? Yip! Yip!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I can do this all by myself! Yip!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tummy's on the ground.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Yip! Does this make my butt look big?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Gimme more time to practice. Yip! Yip!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Aren't I good? Gimme a treat! Yip!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Yip! I can do ANYTHING! Yip yip!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Ugh, my stomach. It hurts to crawl. Yip yip!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm still working on it. Teach me to do it better! Yip.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I could do this with my eyes closed. Yip!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I'm a good boy, right! Gimme a treat! Gimme a treat! Yip!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'd even get you the stars from the sky if you ask me, master. Yip!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Sitting down is more comfy. Yip!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: *Whimper*My back huuurts. Someone hit me yesterday!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! This is too hard.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Wow, I can do it too! Yip!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Yip! Yip! My back was sore, but now it feels better.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: That was hard, but I did it! Yip yip!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: This makes my legs look even shorter! Yip!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm too out of shape... Yip! Yip!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Yip! Yip! Now I need to learn how to walk like this!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Yip yip yip! You're still taller than me.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I'm doing it! I'm doing it! I'm the best dog EVER!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Don't wanna. Feed me first! Yip!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: It's scary! I might fall! Yip!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: You're mean! I don't wanna! Yip!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Yip yip yip! I'm so happy!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: You're not talking to me, right? I am a dog. Yip!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I pooped in your slippers this morning. Yip!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: I'll write this down in my diary! Yip! Can I have a diary?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Yip? Of course you do! I'm adorable!

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Don't you have someone better to say that to? Yip!

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you SO much! Yip yip!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: If you tell that to another pet, I'll bite you! Yip!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: How did you know I'm hungry? Yip?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is so good! SO GOOD!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master... You're fattening me up... Yip!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Yip yip! It's SO good. Gimme more!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I-I don't wanna turn into a pig. I'm a dog! Yip yip!

string.name: s3
string.value: Don't put icky words in my mouth!

string.name: s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! Bad word is bad!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I don't want to sit here.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yes, a rest would be nice.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Oh, my legs are sore. Thank you. Mrow!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't order me around like that! Meow!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Meow... I don't sit in places like this.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: A nice, leisurely rest would be nice...mrow!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Some weather, huh? Let's relax for a while, master. Meow!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Meow. Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You can't always get what you want, master.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Do I look like a remote control cat to you?

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I won't do it again. Meow!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Why are you doing this? MROW!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: What have I done wrong? Meow!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Meow! Why are you in such a bad mood?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry! Forgive me! Forgive me!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: H-how can you yell at me like that?!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why are you taking it out on me? MROW!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Meow! I didn't do anything wrong. Bad master!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry! I won't do it again. Meow...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You're not enjoying this, are you?

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Are you really abandoning me? Meow! Meow!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Liar! I don't believe you! MROW!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Say it again! Say it again! Mew!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: MEOW! You're the best! Mew! Mew!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Mrow... You know I'm a cat, right?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm sure you say that to all your pets.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Mrrow... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm happy to follow you around. Meow!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're the best master. I'll follow you forever!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Love is fine, but I'm hungry!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Ah! Shh, someone will hear you!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This is not a restroom! Meow, meow!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Can you get me some toilet paper, master?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why...are you telling me to do this?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: No one's watching, right? Watch out for me. Meow!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I made you a gift, master!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Errr... I don't have to! Meow!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go! Do you, master?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Meow... What am I suppose to do here...?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Meow! Everyone's watching! I can't do it here!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Maybe a little cat nap would be good...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Meow. It's not time for bed yet...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Meow! The sun's still high in the sky!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Aren't you sleepy, master? I'm sleepy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Nothing beats sleeping on a soft pillow.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Don't let anyone wake me up. Meow!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can't I just sleep when I want to? Mrow!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why are you putting me to bed? It's too early!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I still want to play! Mew!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: This was a such a long day.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I feel like sleeping for 3 days. Meow!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Oh, just let me sleep already!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I told you, I don't want to sleep! Meow!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Isn't it too early for bed?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Why do you always want to sleep, master? Meow!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: What do you want me to say? Huh? Meow!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I grew up in an elegant palace.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Have you ever met as eloquent a cat as I?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: What should we talk about? Meow!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm thirsty... Can I have a red potion?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: It's your turn to talk, master.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I hope this conversation never ends!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Have you ever had a Power Elixir? How did it taste? I want one!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm glad you're my master, master.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Why do you keep saying that? Mew!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: What are you talking to me for? Bored?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You can't talk me into liking you more, master. Mew!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You are truly skilled at bothering your pets.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: What's your wish? My wish is to be your kitty forever.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: The most important thing is health. The second most important thing is...also health.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: No thank you. Talking to you makes me mad.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why talk when we could eat instead? Mrow!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Don't you have any other friends?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'd rather talk to a wall.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I don't want to eat anymore. Meow!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Don't you have something different? Meow. Meow.

string.name: s3
string.value: Meow! How can you talk to me like that...?

string.name: s4
string.value: Meow! Are you a bad person, master?

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Awesome. I don't even need a chair!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: How did you know I needed some rest?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Not a Husky, dude. Try again.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: The ground is a bit cold...perfect!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Time to kick my feet up and chill.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: My feet are going to be nothing but bones--wait. Never mind.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Let me know how that works out for you.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: You want to play "let's count sand'? No thanks.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: These feet were made for stalkin'!

string.value: The ground is a bit cold...perfect!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Time to kick my feet up and chill.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: My feet are going to be nothing but bones--wait. Never mind.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Let me know how that works out for you.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: You want to play "let's count sand'? No thanks.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: These feet were made for stalkin'!

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: So, how will you fix this?

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: I thought I taught you better...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: You got me there. I apologize.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: There's no way to pin this on me!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: But all the cool kids are doing it!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Did you say something? I didn't think so.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: How about you sit down for a change?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Are you talking to me? ARE YOU TALKING TO ME?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Finish yapping and let's get out of here.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: But all the cool kids are doing it!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Did you say something? I didn't think so.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: How about you sit down for a change?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Are you talking to me? ARE YOU TALKING TO ME?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Finish yapping and let's get out of here.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: I'm positive I've played this before...

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Are you sure you want to play this game?

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Give me a challenge, if you can think of one.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'd be more careful if I were you...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: The person behind you is next.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: A tad out of touch, I see.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: To think I woke up this morning for this...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Take out "play" and you have a deal.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Let me show you how to "kill-steal" someone...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I see what you did there.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I'll let you think about that for a moment.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: The time for jokes has ended.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Keep joking and see what happens.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Let me show you how to "kill-steal" someone...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I see what you did there.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I'll let you think about that for a moment.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: The time for jokes has ended.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Keep joking and see what happens.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I can honestly say mine doesn't stink. Much.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: All stuffed up and no place to go...

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Time to drop the kids off!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Behold the power of bran muffins.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: No, I don't feel like it.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It's been a long time since I've had to do that.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: And they say the dead don't have dignity...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Why are you looking at me?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I guess there are some things even the dead have to do.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Oops, I almost stepped on it!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: If I did, you might go blind.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey, look at that...it's...just gas. Sorry.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: And they say I'M the crazy one.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I guess there are some things even the dead have to do.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Oops, I almost stepped on it!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: If I did, you might go blind.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Hey, look at that...it's...just gas. Sorry.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: And they say I'M the crazy one.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: What would you ask of me?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: No lips, but I talk anyway. AMAZING!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: You should pay a visit to the Haunted House!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I can tell that you like...no, never mind.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I don't feel like talking to you~

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why would I want to talk to you?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Don't you have a quest to do or something?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I've had more intelligent conversations with snails.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: So, this guy walks into a potion shop...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'd really like a Prendergast toy~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: For some reason, I feel right at home in the Vanished Village.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I don't just talk, I chatter!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: They say it's better to say nothing if you have nothing nice to say.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Next guy to say "mesos pl0x" gets a scythe to the face.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Next guy to say "mesos pl0x" gets a scythe to the face.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I don't know what to say...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I can feel it in my bones!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Ok, ok. I'll give this a shot.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't think you know the meaning of love.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: You won't be saying that for long.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Love? Love is for the living. ~ MUH HA HA

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Oh~ stop it! Your making me blush.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: We'll be together till the end. ~ MUH HA HA

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: You won't be able to resist me in the end.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I think I'm gonna be sick...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'm not ready for that kind of commitment.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I'm going to stick with you till the end!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I guess you can't help it.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: HAHA! My plan is working... I mean--I love you too.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Your life is very precious to me.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What's love got to do with it?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I don't know the meaning of love~

string.name: c23_f3

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hand over wallet, Mr'kuma. You go crazy in your mind.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I come back when you not trying to eat me.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find demon friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I could go for a little power nap on some hot coals.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't destroy any villages without me, okay, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You can go to sleep if you want. I promise not to chew on your nose.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hand over wallet, Mr'kuma. You go crazy in your mind.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I come back when you not trying to eat me.

string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I am great and wise man-demon!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of death like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid death, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Only the guilty have to fear death. Are you guilty?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can stand in the face of death, we can be partners in destruction.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of jealousy like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you felt jealousy of another, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid jealousy, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You will see the firey hand of jealousy!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can make me jealous, we can have a real relationship.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: I see no purpose in sitting.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Why are you mortals always so frivolous with your wishes?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Does this please you, oh temporary master?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Have you decided your real wishes yet?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: May I do something else? Grawr?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Does this make me look more regal?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Wouldn't you rather I eat someone?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I just place my bottom upon the ground?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Sitting with you is quite relaxing.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I am able to conjure the powers of the heavens as well, you know?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I will, should you bring me a loaf of the meat variety.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Seven hundred thousand years of magical power and you ask me to sit.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Ask me for riches like a normal person!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I am seated already, mortal. Are you blinded with awe?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Speak to me when you have discovered respect.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: I will attempt to be better.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: That may be a slight overreaction.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Well, if you put it that way...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Do not blame me for being myself!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Perhaps it is YOU who are at fault, mortal!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I have done nothing to earn your scorn!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: A bolt of lightning might change your attitude.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I understand, you are under a lot of stress.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I am above your mortal emotions.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Was I so wrong? It was only a squirrel!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I will not be sad! I will not be sad!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: One of these days, I'm going to drop this marble on your head.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Is this how you mortals treat one another?!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I will watch you fry one day.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I haven't felt this bad since I ate that priest.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I find you strangely terrifying, mortal.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I have shamed a thousand generations of my ancestors.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: But I have done everything you asked!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You are the most fickle mortal I've ever met.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You are adorable when you are angry.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Find something else to yell at!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I hope you do not come to harm.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Aren't you supposed to be trembling in fear?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I will not be talked down to!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You are making my scales itch.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why do my cheeks feel warm? WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME?!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: My heart thumps when you say these measly words!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I believe you mortals would say, "ditto".

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: My dragon heart is not to be trifled with.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Do not say anything you will regret.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I, uh, have to wash my scales tonight.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Hey, how about those Green Mushrooms? Very green, aren't they?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Would you like me to take you flying?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I will move the heavens for you!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Might a humble dragon receive a kiss?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Are mortal affections given so freely?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I am sure you say this to all your pets.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Who needs love when you have power?!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: My eyes may be closed, but I have the reflexes of a water dragon!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I was already going to do that.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Perhaps you'll think of a better wish later.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Grawr! It is not my nap time!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I have little need for such things.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I suppose I could use a recharge.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: We mighty dragons have no need for sleep!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: This place is not fit for my great slumber!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I am no cat, content to lie in the sun!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: May I rest upon your lap? This cloud is quite cold.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Oh, the dreams I will have!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Your wish is granted, mortal! Zzzzzz

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: What if I were to eat you in my sleep?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: This area is too loud! My dragon ears are sensitive.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Can't we go battle some monsters?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I JUST drank some dragon coffee!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Allow me to fill in your pitiful knowledge of dragons...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I was once a mere thunder lizard, until I caught this orb.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Do know you how luck you are? Let me tell you.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: If that is what you wish...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I did not descend from the heavens to banter!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Your world is teeming with life.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: My mane is made of the finest spun gold.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I am omnipotent and all powerful, but I do get a little lonely.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Hold on, let me see if I have anything...NO.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why do you waste my power?

string.value: Your enormous head must be quite a burden.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Does this orb make my tail look fat?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: All behold the glory of my master and its silly face!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: My wisdom sounds much better in the original Dragon.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: What do you want to talk about?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Do the powers of the gods so amuse you?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: This show of force is quite exhausting.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Grawr! Look at all these lightning bolts!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My thunder will break the heavens!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: This is no mere trick! This is an event!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I tire of these petty displays.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Have you nothing better to wish for?!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will sink through my cloud if I eat another bite!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I try to say no, but my belly continues to rumble.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: No more, I have much...um...business to attend to.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Truly you are a great chef, master!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Do not look upon me. I am such a fat dragon...

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You will not be my master forever...

string.value: I do not comprehend your ridiculous ways.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I WILL eat you. You are but a worm in my eyes.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Do not curse the commander of lightning!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.value: Why don't you wear a Mermaid suit and try sitting down! Rwarrrrrrr!

string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe...I was daydreaming, so I couldn't hear you...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: tskkkk! you gave me a fright!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I am a Lion and you ain't scaring me! NO!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Tell me baby where did we go wrong? Rwarrrrrrr!!!

string.value: Why not you tell me to take all the blame?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Oh so you think I did something wrong eh?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I know you don't mean it, you don't!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: You're not really mad at me are you? Tskkkkk!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I promise I wont do that again!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do wrong anyway? Which way? Tskkkk!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You are trying to be cool but you are not cool!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I can be resting at Sentosa and not walk around being your pet you know? Tskkkkk!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If you keep doing that, one day I will spit water at your face!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I will take note of it and be careful from now on!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: This I promise you! That I will be good!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: You don't stare at a Merlion like that!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I don't think I have done anything wrong but you are...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I have been in here for so long.. longer than you!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You see! You going all out at me again for nothing! Rwarrrrrrrrr!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You must be bored! No problem, let me spit water in your face!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: So you think you are more clever than me? Really?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Throw me around all you want, I'm just gonna splash you!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: You don't like me? You can leave me here! rwarrrrrr!!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Ok, you win! No more waterworks.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I dare you to NOT take back what you just said! RWARRRRRR!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: It takes one to see one jerkface! tskk tskkk!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: You won't like an angry Merlion! rwarrrrrr!!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: ...I can't believe you said that... rwarrrrrr!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: My heart is like beach glass, it breaks easily, and has been smoothed by the waves of the sea.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Tell me it's not from your heart, or I will spit water in your face!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: YOU HAVE CROSSED THE LINE, YOUNG ONE! RWARRRR!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I give you 60 seconds to take back what you just said!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You broke my heart into a million pieces!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You hurt me once, you hurt me twice! When will this stop?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You'd leave me behind like this? Who do you think you are? RWARRRR!!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I still like you, really! Hehe!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you not love me cause I am cute?

string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c12_f2

string.name: c12_f4
