string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of jealousy like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you felt jealousy of another, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid jealousy, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You will see the firey hand of jealousy!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can make me jealous, we can have a real relationship.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I think I will, thank you.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I'm extra adorable when I sit. Look!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: As you wish! Can I have some ramen now?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Sigh, why are you so bossy?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I think better on my feet.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: All right. I think I deserve a rest.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: A bowl of ramen would make this moment perfect.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sure. Why don't you sit with me?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: What? Here? At least get me a chair.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't want to get my tail dirty.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'll sit here and think about ramen.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My legs are short and cute, but they get tired sometime.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I want to travel, not sit!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I really don't feel like sitting right now.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: You're right. Just 'cause I'm cute doesn't mean I can get away with everything.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: If I let you have my ramen, will you stop scolding me? Please?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You don't know what you're talking about.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Are you TRYING to make me mad?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: If I behave, will you give me some ramen?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: You're going to make me cry!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You still love me, don't you?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: C'mon. You can't scold someone THIS cute.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'll run away, and then you'll regret getting mad at me.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Don't stand so close to me.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: For that, I'll let you scratch my tummy.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Do I look easy to you?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Then shower me with ramen, please!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I always knew I was irresistible.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Not as much as I love myself.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: When you gotta go, you gotta go.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hope you brought along toilet paper!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Such a perfectly round little pelle!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Not right now. I have a headache.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You into that sort of thing?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Does this make me a party POOPer? Get it?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Hey! Are you saying I have a stick up my butt?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Will you sing me a lullaby?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Don't even THINK of using me as a pillow.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: You're not the boss of me.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You can sleep if you want. I'm busy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I hope I dream of ramen.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I count pies and donuts to fall asleep.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Will you pet me until I doze off?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I only sleep on silk sheets.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Last time I slept, someone tied my tail to my ears. Pass!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm refusing just to be rebellious.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I suppose I could afford to take a break.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Hey, I just wanted to tell you that I think you're really... Zzz.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You should rest, too. You can cuddle with me.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Coffee ramen, pizza ramen, donut ramen... Zzz.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Do I LOOK sleepy to you?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: You're so lazy, sometimes you disgust me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I have recipes to create! No time for sleep!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I'm not chubby, I'm big-boned. Just wanted to let you know.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Everybody who meets me, loves me. Didja know that?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Just 'cause I'm cute doesn't mean my life is easy.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Ramen is really good with sugar and honey. Try it!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Go away. I'm sick of your face.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why do you always follow me around?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Ugh, what do you want from me?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My dream is to become the world's best ramen chef!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I think about new ramen recipes all the time. Imagine: deep-fried ramen!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Here's a secret: my parents can transform into human shape.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Do you think red herb ramen would do well in this market?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Don't you have anyone else to pester?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You must be really lonely to be bothering me.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm going to pretend I don't see you.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Don't speak until you're spoken to!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I figure, if I stick with you, I'll get to travel and try all sorts of ramen!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I'm actually a really great dancer. I've got the perfect figure for it.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: People who want to bring me down say I'm fat, but I know it isn't true.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Sometimes people tell me I have no parents. I don't get it. I DO have parents!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Do I LOOK like I'm in the mood?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: We can dance if we want to!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Ah, I'm so adorable when I dance, I want to hug myself.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You love me even more than before I danced, don't you?

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm not here for your amusement.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'll think about it, IF you get me some ramen.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Believe it or not, I'm actually quite shy.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: You ain't never seen nobody as cute as me!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Buy me a mirror so I can admire myself when I dance!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What, and then you'll give me a treat? How demeaning.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I'm on strike until you take me to a new ramen restaurant.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is why I love you.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I could eat ten servings in one sitting!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Mouth...likes. Stomach, not so much. Too full!

string.name: s4
string.value: I can hear you, you know.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Landed too hard. Bruised my butt.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: No thanks. Sometimes when I try to sit, I trip.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Well, I guess I could use a rest.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Would you look at that view! Beautiful world we live in, general.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Sit with me? We can discuss our adventuring strategies, general.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Whew, I guess I am a little tired.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: But we still have a lot further to go!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: To be honest, it's not that easy for me to sit down.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'll just snuggle here next to you, general.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Oh, good. I needed to groom my wings anyway.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: My wings need exercise. They're getting pudgy!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Please don't hit me! Are you going to hit me?

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: No! I'll be good! I promise!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: When I hum to myself, I can't hear you.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I think I'm going to cry!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'm sorry! I'm sorry! Don't hurt me!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You just might make me angry for the first time in my life.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Be nice to me! Please! I'm sorry!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: You... You still love me, don't you?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: But I love CARROTS, not you.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'm so happy I could fly, except I'm scared of heights.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Do you have to say that in such a creepy voice?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Just keep galloping. Just keep galloping.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: You're the strongest, bestest person I know.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Just feed me and don't talk, please.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'd like to be alone right now.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Got any toilet paper? I'm all out.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Oh! I feel much better now! Neigh!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I'll try not to lose my balance and fall in this time.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Hey, it's orange! Just like my favorite food, carrots!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: An adventurer never poops in public!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Whoops, is that a brown speck on my wing?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Does the texture look a little off to you?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Quick! Make sure no one's peeking!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go right now.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: This is how I snore: zzzeigh, zzzeigh.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I could use a quick little nappy nap.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: A true adventurer never rests! Right?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: When I close my eyes, it gets dark, and I'm scared of the dark.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: But what if monsters get me?!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I think you just want an excuse to nap.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I hope I dream of carrots!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Don't let anyone hurt me, mmkay?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: But what if I get nightmares?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You sleep, general. I'll stand guard.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Can you buy me a stuffed carrot to hug?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Keep me secret, keep me safe, general.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Wake me up if anything interesting happens.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I can't keep my eyes open. Zzzzzeigh.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: But I just downed an energy drink!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: No! I want to have an adventure!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Carrots are amazing! They're nutritious, orange, pointy...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I lick my wings to keep them clean, just like a kitten.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: If you have a heart of courage, the world is your carrot!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I want to be alone right now, please.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Sometimes people call me a unicorn, so I tried tying a carrot on my head.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My second favorite thing in the world? Carrots. My first favorite thing? YOU!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I want to be just like you when I grow up!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Where should we adventure to next, general? I can't wait!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: We're too busy to talk right now!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I trip over my own feet sometimes, but I won't let that stop me!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Sometimes, my wings get tangled up in each other and I fall on my face.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Do you think I'm brave, general? I really hope you do.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: What's your favorite? Deep-fried carrot, carrot steak, or carrot stew?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: We should save our energy for our adventures!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm not good at small talk.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: But I want to hear about YOUR adventurers, general!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Heh, not everyone can pull THIS off.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Hold on to your hats, ladies and gents!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm an adventurer, not a circus performer!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Think I deserve a carrot for this, general?

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Let's see a unicorn try to pull this off.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: This comes in real handy for an explorer like me.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do, please.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Hey, I'm a colt, not a pig!

string.name: s2
string.value: General! An adventurer ought to know better!

string.name: s4
string.value: Do you see the disappointment in my eyes, general?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Funny, I was just planning to sit anyway.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I actually look better when I'm sitting.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I shall sit, but NOT because you told me to.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: And why should I listen to you?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I can't hear you . Speak up.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I never tire, I'm just sitting for fun.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I will permit you to sit next to me.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I can neither hear nor see you right now.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Hmph. Fine. I get the point.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: You'll never hear me say this again, but I'm sorry.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I suppose you detest me now.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I KNOW you're not talking to ME.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I'll do you a favor and pretend I didn't hear that.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You have three seconds to take that back.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Fine! Just don't expect an apology.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I don't even know what I did.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: But I'm always up to no good!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I don't even know why I'm saying this, but sorry.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Why are you acting like this?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: How DARE you speak to me like this!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I suppose I ought to say thanks, but instead I'll say: SCRAM.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: You have to do better than that.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: So many fans, so little time to crush all their hearts.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Yes, I'm one of a kind.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Stick around. I might have some use for you.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You're kidding yourself if you think you have a chance with me.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Have you looked in a mirror lately?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Now clean it up. Use your hands.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Consider that a favor. Now you owe me.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Some things you just don't do in public.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You're not even going to bribe me?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I don't know if you can tell, but I'm rolling my eyes.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Don't bother me while I sleep.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Okay, but only because I want to.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: You think you can just tell me what to do?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Maybe if you weren't so NOISY.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I better get something out of this.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Do you have any idea what time it is?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: But I'll have nightmares about your face.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Your stench is too strong. Can't fall asleep.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: You really think you can make me?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I can spend hours thinking of ways to make people cry.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: There's nothing more satisfying than an evil deed done well.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: The weather annoys me. Change it.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I enjoy traveling. Why else do you think I let you hang around?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I enjoy food. So feed me.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sometimes, I wonder where I came from.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Just who do you think you're bossing around?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: If I wanted to talk, I'd talk.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I want to lock all the people I despise into a dark, windowless room.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Big Headward has an awfully large head for such a small brain.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Some creatires are so ugly, I don't know how they can stand to look in the mirror

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: That Wonky the Fairy'll eat anything. I've tested it.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I'm the silent but deadly type.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Well, well. Not bad at all.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Are you blind? Can't you see that I'm full?

string.name: s3
string.value: Try to keep it classy, will you?

string.name: s4
string.value: Mind your manners. You embarrass me.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Pyoo, let's a rest a little!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I'm still up and kicking, ookyu!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Pyoo! I'm going to play more!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Pyoo? Don't we still have a long way to go?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Ookyu? I don't want to rest right now...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Pyoo! Am I sitting down, or laying down?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ookyu, it's the perfect time to rest!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Pyoo! Just for a minute, okay?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ookyu? I don't like being ordered around!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: We can't rest like this everyday!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ookyu, just a couple more steps!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Pyoo? Are you hurt? Why do you keep wanting to rest?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Don't talk to me like that!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Pyoo! Are you really going to keep doing this?!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I said, don't order me around!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Ookyu... I miss the north pole...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Pyoo! I'm going to leave you then!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Sorry... I won't do it again...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Hmph! I told you to treat me nicely!!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Pyoo!! I'm going back to the north pole!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm going to tell on you!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Pyoo! I can be scary too!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Pyoo! I like you better than the north pole.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Pyoo! I'm so lucky to have a master like you!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Pyoo! I love hanging out with you.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Pyoo! I'll be with you forever!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ookyu, did you eat some bad fish?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm a Harp Seal, and you are a human!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Ookyu! You should be ashamed of yourself!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Tell me that AFTER you feed me!!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You can't order me to do everything!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Ookyu! Every day is a healthy day!!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: This is shameful! You'll be hearing from my Harp Lawyers!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: The sun is still shining bright!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Still a long way to go!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I don't think it's time to sleep yet.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You are a sleepyhead, aren't you, master?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I don't want to sleep yet.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I'll sleep when I get sleepy, okie?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Good seals are early to bed, early to rise.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I guess master isn't too healthy...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Why do you always tell me to sleep?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Is this going to make us closer?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Well you know, in the north pole... (It just rambles on)

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I saw this weird animal in the forest... (It won't stop talking)

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Do you know the difference between true seals and fake seals?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I love it here because there aren't any polar bears.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I wish I had some snow to lie on.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I'm all white so I can hide from polar bears in the snow!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Will you protect me from polar bears, master?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'm sure glad for nice people like you, master.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Pigs sure are weird! Why do their bottoms curl up like that?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Ookyu ookyu! Isn't it hard walking on two legs, master?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Where are we going today? Anywhere's fine with me!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: What should we eat for dinner? I want some yummy milk!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I don't feel like opening my mouth... too much work...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I love you, you love me!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Pyoo pyoo pyoo! (It seems to be singing.)

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Ookyu ookyu, pyoo! Ookyu ookyu, pyoo!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: You show me something first, master!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Itsy bitsy seals and penguins, dancing at north pole!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Three seals in a house, daddy seal, mommy seal, and baby seal!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: You want your pet to show its talents?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Pyoo! You sure take good care of me, master!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Don't you think I've gotten a little fat?

string.name: s2
string.value: What goes around, comes around you know?

string.name: s3
string.value: I don't want to be a pottymouth!

string.name: s4
string.value: Words reflect your insides, you know?!!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm a nice lamb that obeys well!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I was going to sit, baa!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I was actually planning to rest, baa!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I'm going to play more, baa!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Baa baa, you should sit down too.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Baa baa? What did you say?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I can't hear you, I can't hear you, baa baa!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I'm going to fly around more, baa baa!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Should we rest a bit? Baa baa.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Baa baa! What a peaceful feeling!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Baa baa? Are you talking to me?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't hear anything, baa baa!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Baa? What's with you all of sudden?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Baah! (It appears to be calling its mother...)

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Baa! Don't do this to me...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Baa... maybe I should change owners.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I don't even wanna hear it...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Baa baa! It's all my fault!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Baa! Did I really mess up that badly?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Baa... I won't do that again...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Hmph, I'll be the bigger ram.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: My patience has limits, baa baa.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Are you going to keep this up, baa?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If only I had a nicer owner...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Why do you always yell at me... *Cries*

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm going to tell my mommy, baa baa...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Wahhhh! You're just mean because you're bigger than me!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I really wish I could just smack you, baa baa.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm gonna call animal protective services!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I can get scary when I'm angry, baa...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Baa baa... THAT does it! (Veins popping.)

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Baa baa! I like, I like!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Baa baa. You aren't supposed to joke around like that.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Treat me well when you have the chance, baa.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Baa! I'm always on your side!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I said... I can't hear you!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Baa Baa! I got it, I got it!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Baa! I love hanging out with you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Baa! Affectionate actions make Pufframs dance!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Baa baa. I already know your feelings.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: So what do you want me to do, baa baa?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I'm shocked, I don't even have words.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: (Little veins are popping out on its forehead.)

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Do you KNOW what you are saying?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Ahhh, that could heat an entire village for a month!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Something needs to go in for something to come out!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Baa baa! Every day is a healthy day!!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: It's not going to come out just because you whine!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Baa... let's have some common sense, shall we?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Baa baa... You want to get smacked?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'll let you off for today...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! I want to play more!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I want to play more, baa baa!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Baa... someday I'll soar higher than a dragon. Baa...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Can't you see that my eyes are still WIDE open?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Baa baa? What are you saying?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm not that lazy, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Baa Baa! So today, I'm going to... (Now it won't stop talking.)

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Are you amazed by flying lambs? So the secret of our race is...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Maple World is a pretty nice place to live, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: When we were living up in the sky, angels mistook us for clouds.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Is it strange that I talk?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Baa? Weren't we talking just a second ago?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Have you every had a Cloud Candy? It's the baaaaa-st.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: If there's one thing I hate, it's wolves.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: We are called Pufframs because we live above the clouds.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Baa baa... just leave me alone...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't want to talk right now, baa.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Mmm... are you hungry for a conversation?

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Baa baa, would it be better to walk or fly?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Baa baa, you want to hear something interesting?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Which one of us do you think can fly faster? Me or the eagle?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: To the Pufframs, the Golden Horn is a symbol of adulthood.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You look bored... too bad I'm not!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: (It appears to be thinking about something.)

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: What if I say no, baa baa?

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: This is the Puffram booty dance!!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Am I in the circus or something, baa baa?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Baa baa... I said, it sounds annoying...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I actually have this super cool trick... but I don't feel like it right now.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: (Jumps up and down.) Baa! Baa! Baa! Baa!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: It's super fun when you do it above the clouds, baa baa.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Can't I just be your pet?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Too hungry... no strength... baa baa.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Baa baa, eating time's my favorite time!!

string.name: s2
string.value: You want to get reported, baa baa?

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm so disappointed in you, baa baa!!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find demon friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hand over wallet, Mr'kuma. You go crazy in your mind.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I come back when you not trying to eat me.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find demon friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I could go for a little power nap on some hot coals.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't destroy any villages without me, okay, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You can go to sleep if you want. I promise not to chew on your nose.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm sitting down. Aren't I obedient?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Well if you want me to sit, then I guess I gotta.

string.value: I don't want to sit around!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I guess I should obey you.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Sorry, I was lightyears away. What's up?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I wanna see more of this!

string.value: I was going to take a break anyway.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I wanna go look around some more.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You think being the master's all there is?!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You're going to be sorry if you don't stop!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Act like a good owner already!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You don't have to sound so ominous...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Maybe getting hit by a shooting star will make you come around!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You ever see an angry star?!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You REALLY want to see me mad!?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm going to find a new owner!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I feel kinda icky when you say that...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Uh, great, let me just go think about that...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Have you been eating strange mushrooms?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: We were destined to be together!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm so happy you're here with me!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'll be by your side until I supernova!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: (Little veins are popping out on its forehead.)

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Ahhh, that could heat an entire village for a month!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Do you think me a savage?!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Like a little golden pile of sunshine!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Why are you laughing at me!?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Come back when you learn some etiquette!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Busy! Doing star business. Come back later.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Play with me! Don't wait till I fall asleep!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Did you know that tiny stars in the sky are bigger than the Earth?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I may be a tiny star now, but I will grow up someday!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You prefer stars or the moon? Or the sun?!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Hold on, I need to catch some rays...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I saw the neon signs in the city the other day. I can totally do that!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I can produce all kinds of light!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm usually sleepy when I see Mr. Moon... Is it just me?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: There are so many stars in the universe that you haven't met!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: You think it's weird that stars have wings? I think it's weird that YOU DON'T.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I heard there was an animal called a starfish that looks like me!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Space is a vast place. You couldn't even imagine!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Starwings dine on Milky Way Essence to become majestic stars!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I sometimes want to be the only star.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'm a little busy now, but I'll tell you something interesting later.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Starwings can spin like this and not get dizzy!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Cool, right? This dance move isn't easy!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Us Starwings dance like this when we're really happy!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: This may look easy, but it isn't!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I hardly have the energy to stand right now...

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I don't think now's a good time.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I want to eat, but I'm just too stuffed...

string.name: s2
string.value: That's not something a human should say...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Master, I will take a seat if you give me a chair!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Oh, no... Do I have to sit?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Growl! It feels so comfortable to sit down.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Growl, I like it so much.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Why don't you take a seat, master?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I want to go for a walk, growl!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Growl! Give me something to eat!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Growl! I don't want to do it!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Growl! Aren't I so tiny and adorable, master?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Like this? Aren't I so cute, master?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ow, I will listen to you from now on! Growl!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Master! I will do anything you want!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Grawr! I don't want to do it!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Grr, I think I have reached puberty.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Grr! If you want a seat, just take one for yourself.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Don't be angry. You are scaring me, master.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Rawr? What did I do wrong?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Grrr! Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, why are doing this to your tiny, cute tiger?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I will be an obedient baby tiger.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I will be a good tiger.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Grr, grr! No, I hate it!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Hehe, I will become an erratic tiger!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Rawr... I regret what I have done.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Oh, please go easy on me this time.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Grawr! Don't get mad. Please just listen to what I have to say! Growl...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: If you give me a piece of rice cake, I won't eat you up!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: This is boring. Let's play something else, master!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Growl! I'm not scared at all!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Grrr! Why are you treating me like this?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How can I do that here? That would be embarrassing! Growl...

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I don't want to go to a bathroom now, growl.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Not here! This would be embarrassing, growl.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Ugh, a baby tiger's poop is used as a medicine whether you believe it or not!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Oh, I feel so much better! Are you going to poop, too?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Grr, I feel so much better!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Grr, it feels so good! Master, please clean this up!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: This place is so dirty! Grr!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Feel free to take a dump and enjoy yourself, master!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Growl, I've been having constipation lately...

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I don't want to go to stool now. Phew...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I feel so much better now, growl!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Grr! Master! Look how big my poop is!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Master, I'm done now! Would you please wipe my butt?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Forget about poo-poo. Let's go for a walk.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I can't do it, because you keep looking at me! Grr.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Grr, grr! No, I hate it!

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Master, master! Aren't I so cute and tiny? Growl?

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I'm happen to be an excellent speaker for a tiger! I also speak a foreign language! Woof, woof!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: My cute tail wags gently. Isn't this adorable?

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: What do you like about me the most, master? Tell me!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Grr! I want to be alone now.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Forget it! Why don't we just go and hunt?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I want to take a dump... Grr...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: In fact, I'm not a baby tiger but a kitty! Meow!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: If you give me a piece of rice cake, I won't eat you up!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Your head is so huge, master!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Growl! You can hunt more easily if you entrust your potions to me.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You must be quiet in places like this. Grr!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Why are you always ordering me around? You play all the time, master? Grr!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Shall we play a word chain? I will go first! Growl! Calcium!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Master, were you born with legs that short?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Tell me something hilarious! You know, a story from a long, long time ago.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Isn't Gaga's face way too long? Growl.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I want to be alone once in a while. Would you please be quiet?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I don't want to do it once you order me, grr!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Why don't we just go to sleep? Zzz...

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Should I go to Henesys Pig Farm? Growl!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Growlie will go to bed now, master.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Growlie will go off to dreamland.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Grr! It's not time to sleep yet!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm too hungry to fall asleep... Give me some meat, master!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Growlie won't sleep in somewhere as noisy as this place!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I don't want to go to bed now, growl!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Growl, I feel really sleepy, master!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I was actually feeling sleepy... You are the best, master!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Master, would you tuck Growlie up in the bed? Growl!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Growlie wants to sleep next to you. Zzz...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You have to at least sing a lullaby to put me to sleep! Grr!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Master, this is not time for you to sleep! Growl!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I just woke up! Why do you want me to fall asleep again? Grr!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I want to go and have fun in Korean Folk Town with you, master!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Have a wonderful dream, master! Dream of having billions of Mesos, growl!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I will go to bed if you want me to, grr!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I will sleep on my pillow, growl.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Master, don't wake Growlie up from now!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I'm dying to eat some meat right now. I can't even fall asleep!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I can't sleep... I miss my mom so much, growl...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You must make a bed for me to sleep! Grr!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Growlie wantsto chat and play with you now, master.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Oh, my! I feel so good!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I really, really like you as well, master!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You have a good eye for tigers, grr!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Not anyone can earn my fondness!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Why don't you give me plenty of food before you say that?

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Oh, I don't know what to say!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I have been in love with you as well, master!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Do you say those things to any person, master?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Grr! That's not what I wanted to hear from you!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Give me a piece of meat rather than a piece of your mind!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Master, what about your significant other?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: This is Growlie who loves you and only you, master!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Can you see hearts coming out from my eyes? Growl.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Growlie feels so great! I feel like I can fly across the sky!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Should I just fly off? Growl!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: If you keep saying that, I will just run away! Grrr!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Never mind! Why don't we go and grab something to eat?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I also want to eat meat. I feel dizzy.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master! Please give me a meat everyday!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Give me a tasty side dish, grr!

string.name: s2
string.value: Grr! What did you just say?

string.name: s3
string.value: Master! You must not say something like that! Grr!

string.name: s4
string.value: Grr! You should use only fair words!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Or we could do something else.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Do you hear yourself? All these commands.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'm going to sleep. Don't touch me.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy. I'm feeling under-utilized here.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Ahh, I'm sleepy. Can't hear you...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I was just minding my own business... then this! Squerch!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Why do you do this? Squerch?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I know squerch kwon do and I WILL use it! Squerch!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You're not really mad, right? Right?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Some masters let their pets have fun...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I looked up other masters. Turns out there are plenty of options.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I promise I'll be good now.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Is there a reason for this or do you just like yelling?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm so used to it, I don't even feel it anymore.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master gets bored, so I get yelled at.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Did you just say what I think you said? Squerch.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I think I love you, too!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: And you just had to tell me?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ah. I thought you were going to say something else.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: That was a good one... haha...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: You're making my gills red, master.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Oh! Oh! Me too! Me too!! Hehe.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Probably should have kept that one to yourself.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You'll have to do better than that.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet. Squerch.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: How can I poop if you don't feed me? Squerch.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for the bathroom. Squerch.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oooh... I almost stepped in it.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: It hasn't been long enough yet, master.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Not really into pooping on command.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: When do I get to tell YOU to poop, master?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Whoa, my breakfast came out just like that.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Phew! Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: You can tell it's been a while! Yowza!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to poop out in the first place!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'm saving it all for one big poop.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I'm tired. I need to sleep. Squerch.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: So sleepy... Let me sleep... Squerch...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: How am I going to sleep if I'm not even tired! Squerch!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: You... come... sleep... with... me... Squerch.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Don't go eat something good while I'm asleep! Squerch.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Master, I just slept! I'm... not... zzzz...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: So you can doodle on my fins? No thanks!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm hungry! Can't sleep! Feed me!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do, master!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Don't ditch me while I'm sleeping.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: How about a treat instead? Squerch.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: The more you go hunting, the better the items you'll find. Squerch.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go somewhere to play! Squerch.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket. Squerch.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Have you ever heard of a chatty shark? Squerch.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say to you. Squerch.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I can't talk to you right now. Squerch.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Master, you'll get me some good food today, right?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Good!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: A lot of people are here, so make sure to be courteous!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Not much goin' on over here.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I just met someone. Maybe we could go on a double date?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head. Hahaha. HUGE!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: This is boring. I need something more exciting.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Why do you keep talking to me? I'm trying to sleep.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: This is my area of expertise. Squerch.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: You won't find a cuter pet anywhere! Squerch.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Whoa, master must have gone nuts.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Master, what do you think? Cute, right? Squerch!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Like this? At least you know a cute act when you see one.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: My friends love it when I do this!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: You think I'll just do whatever you ask... I thought you were smarter.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: How do I put this… No?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Master! Just get me some food! Squerch!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Master, this is so delicious... Squerch!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I am about to blow up... squerch.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is as good as it gets!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Heh heh, this is my favorite!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Are you trying to kill me, master?

string.name: s3
string.value: Squerch! MY precious mouth would never spit those venomous words!

string.name: s4
string.value: Please, no... no words like that... Squerch.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I soft, so I comfy anywhere.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I won't do it! Pinka piii!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I sit. You sing me a song!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'm sleepy, but I can't sleep...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Hee hee... I roll over easy!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I have a surprise for you...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You won't play with me no more?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I feel so comfortable around you.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: It's fantastic hanging out with you.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Scram. I'm not in the mood!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Yawn. I can't be bothered at the moment. Zzzz.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Shower me with all your love! Pinkaaa!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Lurve? Lub? What? Forget it, I'll just sit around and rub my tummy.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You're annoying. I have nothing else to say.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I'm afraid I'll have to reject you. Piinkapiii!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I've been waiting for you to say those words!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: That's so nice! I feel the same way about you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're just as cute as me! I love you!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Don't lie. My little ol' heart will shatter.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm very busy right now. Can we talk about this later?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You can't possibly think I have a good impression of you, can you?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Stop it, stop it, stop it!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Boing boing! Hee hee, keep up!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Leave the lights on! I'm scared of the dark.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I wanna sleep next to you! Zzz...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Let's play a little longer... Pwwease?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Nighty night, master! I lov…vee…ee… Zzzz.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Can you tuck in my blankie if I accidentally kick it off?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No time for sleep! Must xercise! Get strong!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: What do you want to hear? Piinkaaa?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Why am I called a bean? I look more like a mouse.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I can't stay balanced and talk at the same time.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My dream is to be a DJ.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I like beef! Pork's okay, too.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I have many interests. Like knitting.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I like talkies with you! You funny!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I was born with big eyes. Sparkly!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Am I fat? Be honest. I take it.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I'm endangered. Take care of me!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Boing! I do lots of things!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I know how to rock, too!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Can't hear you, can't hear you!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I am a guitar master! Wahnananana!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Look at me! LOOK AT MEEEEEE!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Gonna be rock star! Have a world tour!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I have no idea what you're talking about.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: No tricks. I am a quiet and gentle pet.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Buh? What if I get fat?

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Waahh! I don't want it! I don't!

string.name: s2
string.value: Buh?! I'll remember this! You watch out!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm a nice lamb that obeys well!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I was going to sit, baa!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I was actually planning to rest, baa!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I'm going to play more, baa!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Baa baa, you should sit down too.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Baa baa? What did you say?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I can't hear you, I can't hear you, baa baa!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I'm going to fly around more, baa baa!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Should we rest a bit? Baa baa.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Baa baa! What a peaceful feeling!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Baa baa? Are you talking to me?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't hear anything, baa baa!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Baa? What's with you all of sudden?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Baah! (It appears to be calling its mother...)

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Baa! Don't do this to me...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Baa... maybe I should change owners.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I don't even wanna hear it...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Baa baa! It's all my fault!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Baa! Did I really mess up that badly?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Baa... I won't do that again...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Hmph, I'll be the bigger ram.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: My patience has limits, baa baa.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Are you going to keep this up, baa?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If only I had a nicer owner...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Why do you always yell at me... *Cries*

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm going to tell my mommy, baa baa...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Wahhhh! You're just mean because you're bigger than me!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I really wish I could just smack you, baa baa.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm gonna call animal protective services!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I can get scary when I'm angry, baa...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Baa baa... THAT does it! (Veins popping.)

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Baa baa! I like, I like!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Baa baa. You aren't supposed to joke around like that.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Treat me well when you have the chance, baa.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Baa! I'm always on your side!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I said... I can't hear you!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Baa Baa! I got it, I got it!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Baa! I love hanging out with you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Baa! Affectionate actions make Pufframs dance!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Baa baa. I already know your feelings.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: So what do you want me to do, baa baa?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I'm shocked, I don't even have words.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: (Little veins are popping out on its forehead.)

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Do you KNOW what you are saying?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Something needs to go in for something to come out!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Baa baa! Every day is a healthy day!!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: It's not going to come out just because you whine!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Baa... let's have some common sense, shall we?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Baa baa... You want to get smacked?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'll let you off for today...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! I want to play more!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I want to play more, baa baa!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Baa... someday I'll soar higher than a dragon. Baa...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Can't you see that my eyes are still WIDE open?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Baa baa? What are you saying?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm not that lazy, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Baa Baa! So today, I'm going to... (Now it won't stop talking.)

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Are you amazed by flying lambs? So the secret of our race is...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Maple World is a pretty nice place to live, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: When we were living up in the sky, angels mistook us for clouds.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Is it strange that I talk?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Baa? Weren't we talking just a second ago?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Have you every had a Cloud Candy? It's the baaaaa-st.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: If there's one thing I hate, it's wolves.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: We are called Pufframs because we live above the clouds.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Baa baa... just leave me alone...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't want to talk right now, baa.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Mmm... are you hungry for a conversation?

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Baa baa, would it be better to walk or fly?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Baa baa, you want to hear something interesting?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Which one of us do you think can fly faster? Me or the eagle?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: To the Pufframs, the Golden Horn is a symbol of adulthood.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You look bored... too bad I'm not!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: (It appears to be thinking about something.)

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: What if I say no, baa baa?

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: This is the Puffram booty dance!!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Am I in the circus or something, baa baa?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Baa baa... I said, it sounds annoying...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I actually have this super cool trick... but I don't feel like it right now.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: (Jumps up and down.) Baa! Baa! Baa! Baa!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: It's super fun when you do it above the clouds, baa baa.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Can't I just be your pet?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Too hungry... no strength... baa baa.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Baa baa, eating time's my favorite time!!

string.name: s2
string.value: You want to get reported, baa baa?

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm so disappointed in you, baa baa!!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Are you testing me? Now I'm scared to move.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Happy now? Can we go now?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: La di da... Doo doo doop...

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Don't you care about saving the world?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I'll just pretend I didn't hear that.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: La di da... Doo doo doop...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: La di da... Doo doo doop...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Okay, fine. It was MY fault, okay?!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: It was YOUR fault. You made me do it!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Okay, fine. It was MY fault, okay?!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Do you have it in you to forgive me?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I'll make you regret saying that.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't say it unless you mean it!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: How can you say that to me?!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry, so now you can't be mad anymore.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I won't ever do that again. Promise!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: All words have consequences. Just wait and see.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: When you're least expecting it, I'll get you back...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'm not unhappy you said that.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: You're kind of sweet, I suppose.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'm not quite ready to say it back, but thanks.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I... Well, shucks, I love you, too.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: At least buy me dinner first.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'll just pretend I didn't hear that.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Please tell me no one's watching.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I'm not that kind of dragon.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Don't ask that of me. Please!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: You just don't let up. Oh, very well.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It makes me uncomfortable that you're watching.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: This... This actually feels kind of good.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I, uh, I have a headache.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I'm actually really getting into this.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: You're watching, right? It's not the same if you don't watch.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Don't MY feelings matter to you?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Please. I just want to disappear.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Leave the lights on! I'm scared of the dark.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm fine as I am, thanks very much.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: You go on and mind your own business.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You may go to bed first, if you wish.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: If you weren't so much bigger than me, I wouldn't have to listen to you.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I refuse to go to sleep yet!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Just because you're tired doesn't mean I am.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You'll keep the boogieman away, right?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You're going to have to say that again, and slower.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: But what if the nightmares return? Sniffle.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I come from a line of prestigious dragons, you know.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: My daddy could change colors. He could even turn invisible!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: My daddy could beat up all the other dragon's daddies.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: My daddy's roar would make you go deaf.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I'd like to see you try to make me.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Someday, I'll rule over ALL the dragons.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: What about YOUR heritage? Are you anyone special?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'll tell you a secret. It took me a long time to learn how to fly.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Sometimes, I just don't understand what you want.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Isn't there anyone else you can go bother?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I have no idea what you want.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: When I grow up, I'll be able to turn invisible like my daddy.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Just watch. I'll turn invisible. There, did you see it?!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Hey, what do you think of the Nova?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Can i go play with the other dragons?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I learned this from my daddy.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I don't have any talents, I swear!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I don't know what you want.

string.name: s3
string.value: You are so mean. Don't talk to me.

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm so disappointed in you. So disappointed.
