string.name: c22_f3
string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I learned this from my daddy.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I don't have any talents, I swear!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I don't know what you want.

string.name: s3
string.value: You are so mean. Don't talk to me.

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm so disappointed in you. So disappointed.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I soft, so I comfy anywhere.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I sit now. You sing me song!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'm sleepy, but I can't sleep...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You no play with me no more?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are my favorite! Love you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You just as cute as me! Love you!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: You want love? I want ribs!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: La la la, can't hear you!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Stop it, stop it, stop it!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Boing boing! Hee hee, keep up!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Wanna sleep next to you! Zzz...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No time for sleep! Exercise! Get strong!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Talk about ribs? I wanna rib. Mmm...rib.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You get nice thingies for me?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I like beef. Pork okay, too.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I have many interests. Like knitting.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I like talkies with you! You funny!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I born with big eyes. Sparkly!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Am I fat? Be honest. I take it.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I endangered creature. Take care of me!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Boing! I do lots of things!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I know how to rock, too!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Can't hear you, can't hear you!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Look at me! LOOK AT MEEEEEE!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Gonna be rock star! Have world tour!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I have no idea what you talk about.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: No tricks. I am quiet and gentle pet.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Buh? What if I get fat?

string.name: f3_f
string.value: No more eat! Exercise! Bouncy bouncy!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Waahh! I don't want it! I don't!

string.name: s2
string.value: Buh?! I remember this! You watch out!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I guess I have been working pretty hard.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Will that make the constituents like me more?

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I've got a few bills to review anyway...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I just had these slacks pressed.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: That's no way to win a campaign!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Maybe I need a rocking chair...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: My voters really love when I sit down.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Can we do something else, please?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I don't like to sit down, I like to work!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: It's as easy as fair taxation!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: A good sit helps the mind focus!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I could do this all day.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You repeat yourself quite a bit.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I can't afford to look silly.

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: I suppose I could use some rest.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: That'll give me time to think about my next bill.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I don't know the meaning of the word!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: That's not how you win elections, friend.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I could use a little time off...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Just going to run over my speech a few times...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: My advisors told me to look busy!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: No way, no how, no sirree.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: When I set my mind to something, it happens.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I like that, makes me seem more down-to-earth.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: There are hands to shake somewhere!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I hope I've still got your vote.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Don’t take that out of context.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Don't give up on me yet!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I was wrong about that, and I admit it.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: My opponent is just as bad as me!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I know that wasn't he best result, but I can fix it.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Please don't hit me in front of the cameras...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Why are you blaming me? It was one of my aides!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I suppose we all have to relieve ourselves.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: For the good of the country!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Drinking lots of water is good for you.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I'm feeling a little exposed, but here we go.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Keep it out of the media, okay?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm the boss, I don't have to listen!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I don't know what to say...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I feel pretty strongly about you too.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Don't flip-flop now, I need your vote!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I know a fibber when I hear one.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I don't know if this is the right time...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'll have to run that past my advisors.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: The whole world is going to know!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: This is a scandal just waiting to happen.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Get outta here before the press gets wind of this!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Well, uh, you wanna talk about the economy?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Can you tell that to the reporters?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Really? Because I haven't seen a buffet in weeks.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: No sir, I don't like it.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'm perfectly comfortable where I am.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: What looks better? One leg, or two?

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: In the blink of an eye, I stand.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: We're going to hit the issues!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Look what a perfect candidate I am.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I can walk and talk with the best of them.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I should be working on my speech.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can we get a little food first?

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Let me tell you about my recovery plans.

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: We need to bring our troops home!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: The military isn't strong enough yet.

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: It's time to get real about family values!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: I need some more time to fix this speech.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I don't know what to say...

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: America is the best nation on the planet!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I'm bringing the stars and stripes back!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: What do you know about income tax regulation?

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I need to talk with my advisors first.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I believe in hard work and good people!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: It's good to be on the right side.

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Remember to take care of yourself and your country!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Everything you need to know is on my campaign website.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: The debates aren't for another few days!

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I can be fun, like normal people!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Hard work and no play is un-American.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I can do this all day!

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: There's too much work to do.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: We still need to talk about the important issues!

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Have I shown you my fastball?

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Let's play... With the federal deficit!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: I love a good bit of fun!

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Can't wait to see how fun this looks on the news.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Playing alone is just no fun.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Can't we just watch eagles for a while?

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: You know what's fun? Balanced budgets.

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Come help me find an alternative energy source! Wooo!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I'm going to pretend I'm president already!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: We're running out of games here.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: People aren't going to take us seriously.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: Let me check with my advisors first.

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: I think the people want to see me being more serious.

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: A little shut-eye is good for the complexion.

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Just a little more work, okay?

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: There's no time! I need to prepare a statement.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: I can't let the delegates see me sleeping!

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: I'm not ready to rest! I'm ready to fight!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Time for sweet dreams of my heroes...

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: You're just waiting to get a funny picture of me for the papers.

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: There's a whole lot of meeting and greeting to do!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I should be kissing babies right now!

string.name: c32_f4
string.value: Now's not the time to be slacking off.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: I feel pretty strongly about you too.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: How do you expect a Merlion to sit? On my tail? Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Let me sit in a nice pose like this! Cute? Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It wasn't easy sitting down on my tail but here you go! Pretty me?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: It's never easy to sit on my tail! Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Let's do the Merlion Dance! rwarrrr!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Can we do something else? Like, spitting water?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, rwarrrr!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, I will obstruct the railway station! Rwarrrrrr!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: It was nicely done right? Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sitting was never easy for me, but I did it! Rwarrrrrr!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Why not instead of asking me to sit, you get me some cookies? rwarrrrr!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Let's do the Kallang Wave for fun shall we? rwarrrrrrrrr!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I need to strike a nicer pose to sit! rwarrrrrrr!!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Are you all hopped up on Gummy Bears? I can't understand you!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: It's not easy being the iconic symbol of Singapore!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: It was a piece of cake!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Whaddaya think? It was cute right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Why don't you wear a Mermaid suit and try sitting down! Rwarrrrrrr!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy...let me do something else.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe...I was daydreaming, so I couldn't hear you...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: tskkkk! you gave me a fright!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I am a Lion and you ain't scaring me! NO!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Tell me baby where did we go wrong? Rwarrrrrrr!!!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Why not you tell me to take all the blame?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Oh so you think I did something wrong eh?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I know you don't mean it, you don't!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: You're not really mad at me are you? Tskkkkk!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I promise I wont do that again!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do wrong anyway? Which way? Tskkkk!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You are trying to be cool but you are not cool!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I can be resting at Sentosa and not walk around being your pet you know? Tskkkkk!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If you keep doing that, one day I will spit water at your face!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I will take note of it and be careful from now on!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: This I promise you! That I will be good!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: You don't stare at a Merlion like that!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I don't think I have done anything wrong but you are...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I have been in here for so long.. longer than you!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You see! You going all out at me again for nothing! Rwarrrrrrrrr!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You must be bored! No problem, let me spit water in your face!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: So you think you are more clever than me? Really?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Throw me around all you want, I'm just gonna splash you!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: You don't like me? You can leave me here! rwarrrrrr!!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Ok, you win! No more waterworks.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I dare you to NOT take back what you just said! RWARRRRRR!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: It takes one to see one jerkface! tskk tskkk!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: You won't like an angry Merlion! rwarrrrrr!!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: ...I can't believe you said that... rwarrrrrr!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: My heart is like beach glass, it breaks easily, and has been smoothed by the waves of the sea.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Tell me it's not from your heart, or I will spit water in your face!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: YOU HAVE CROSSED THE LINE, YOUNG ONE! RWARRRR!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I give you 60 seconds to take back what you just said!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You broke my heart into a million pieces!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You hurt me once, you hurt me twice! When will this stop?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You'd leave me behind like this? Who do you think you are? RWARRRR!!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I still like you, really! Hehe!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you not love me cause I am cute?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Say that again and you get a face full of water!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It got stuck at the causeway! Helpppp!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Oh, it smell like durian! Yikes.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Not yet! Not yet time to poop!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I dont want to poop, what can you do to me?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I can't go while you're looking at me.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: No more poops! Too much bad luck!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Oh dear, the smells are coming out!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I'm all out of poop power.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: It's been a while since the poop has flowed so regularly.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Please bear with me while I create the feeling!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I don't want! I don't want!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Do you read the newspaper when you poop?

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhhh! The feeling is sooooo gooood!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I can't believe the buffet I had earlier just came out like that!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: The more I look at my poops, the more they look like you!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I haven't had a poop this good in years!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: There was nothing to come out in the first place!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Errrrr can you bring me to the toilet? I cannot poop here, I am very shy!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You can't force me to poop if I don't have to! RWARRR!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Seek and you will find! Time to go hunt some rare drops!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Let's go for a tan on the beach! I will spit water at you to cool you down!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Sometime I wish someone could cover me with a blanet at night!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How do Merlions talk? They spit water out from their mouth! HAHA!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Very hard to talk to you with this much water in my mouth.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say, nothing!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: The sun is out to play, so are the Merlions!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: The sky and the heavens tell me you will get lucky today!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Bring me some food and I will give you more luck!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Shall we try out something fun today?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Don't say this when you don't mean it!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I have little to say! rwarrrr!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I might be big but you can hold me tight!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Who are you dating? Can I date them?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hey, Have you heard of the Legendary Phantom Thief?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I heard that in a faraway island in a cave, there lives a scary monster with three heads!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Get me some cookies and we shall talk!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't wanna close my eyes! I don't wanna fall asleep!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Man I am so tired, don't feel like talking to people today!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehehe! So shy now, I'm blushing! rwarrrr!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Sure? Ok, I take it as a YES!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: What's up young one? Got cookies?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: ORLY? OK! I LOVE YOU TOO!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I love you too! Really! Rwarrrr!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Really? Haha! I love you too!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: You are very cool! I love you!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Pass me some food like... NOW! NOW! NOW!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: My mind isn't working straight today, I was thinking of something else!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I know you are lying! You ARE!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Whatever goes around, comes around! Right back at ya!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: You are my one and only!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Me too me too ME TOO!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Have you been eating my special Merlion cookies?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Time to give me some food! Like... NOW!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Will you hug me to bed tonight?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I am sleepy, can you give me your arms as my pillow?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: You don't pretend to sleep when you are not! I can read your mind!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: The night is still young! Let's grab some cookies!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: If you sing me a lullaby, I will go to bed!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I know you will run away when I am asleep!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I can't sleep on empty stomach! cookies PLEASE!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Let's go for a ride! Vrooooommm!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: You do it once but not twice alright!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I can't just do it anywhere.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Good thing only last while it last and goes to those who waits!

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: Let's just sit and relax, ok?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I have to stop eating, I am overweight!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: There's a limit to my stomach capacity!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Can I have a 2 piece Fun Meal please?

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Hey, I am REALLY FULL! STOP FEEDING ME!

string.name: s2
string.value: Why are you talking to me in alien language?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Butterflies don't sit! We only fly around! Hehe!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm gonna try sitting! This is something new!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I didn't know sitting down was that easy!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I wanna do something fun, poof!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I wanna do something else, poof!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, poof!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, someone peed on the ground! Pooof!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Can I fly around instead? POOF!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Let me take you for a ride! Poof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: How are butteflies gonna sit?! Huh?!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: It's not easy being a butterfly...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: That was a piece of cake...

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Why don't YOU sit instead? hehe!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I have difficulties sitting down... let's try something else shall we?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe! My mind was blank! I didn't catch what you were talking about...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I got a fright, that was scary!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: It's not cool at all, clickkkk!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Please don't give me a scary face! I am a timid butterfly!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Tell me what went wrong! Clickkkk!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You are ranting at me! Clickkkkk!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything to deserve this! Clickkkk!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I know you don't mean it right? You were just bored aren't you? Clickkkkk!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I am sorry, so sorry! Clicck clickkk!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Are you really mad at me? Clickkk clickkk!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I promise I won't do that again... clickk clickk!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do anyway?! Clickkk!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: That wasn't cool at all! Pooof!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find an obedient pet like me? POOFFF!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If you keep doing that, I may one day get out of here! Clickk Clickkk!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man...I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: ...Things happen in life for a reason...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Man... you are going off on me again for no reason...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You must be bored...treating me like this...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I.. I don't mean that.. pooof!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I don't like hearing that, poooff...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Take back what you just said, pooof!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: ...I can't believe you said that...CLICKKK CLICKKK!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I get hurt when I hear those...CLICKKK!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That was a joke...right? Right? CLICKKK!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You...didn't mean that, right? right? CLICKKK!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Take back what you said! CLICKKK!!!!!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: ...This is not the first time I've heard this, but it still hurts...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You aren't gonna leave me out hanging like this, right?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me??

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...hehe

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: If you keep saying that, I'm gonna get grumpy!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It...it's not coming out well, clickkk!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet, pooooof...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How can I poop if I don't feel like it, poooff!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for bathroom, clickkkk!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to poop when you're looking at me? Clickkkk!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: It hasn't been long since I last pooped... clickkk clickkkk!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to poop yet... pooof!!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: ...I don't feel like pooping yet...clickkk clickkk!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhh...that was good...but it's still embarassing...hehe

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...whoa, my lunch just came out like that...hehe

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Phew! Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Phew! Haven't taken a crap in three days and look at this!! HUATZA!!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to poop out in the first place...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: ...Can I do it later in the dark? I don't wanna do it in public...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: ...How am I gonna take a dump on purpose??

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: The harder you hunt, the better the items you'll find, pooof!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, clickk clickkk!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket, like now?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How do butterflies talk? They click!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm too depressed to talk right now, clickk clickkk!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you... pooof!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: It's awesome day to fly around today! poooofff!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I am on Cloud Nine and more good things are coming our way! Pooooof!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Let's get something nice to eat today shall we? Clickkk clickkk!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Let's go to the garden today for some fun! Poooofff!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: There's nothing for me to say now,! clickkk clickkkk!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I have so little to say!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Are you dating someone? I'm not...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hey, can you beat Pink Bean?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You better play some Gachapon today, cause I'm feeling lucky!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I heard there's something scary in a cave in Leafre!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Let's put the talk aside, it's time to get some food to eat! POOOF!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: You must be really bored aren't you? Pooooofff!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Arrgh...didn't hear a thing...didn't hear a thing...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Sometime butterflies do have our OFF day!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You sure you are not lying?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: That's so sweet! I LOVE YOU TOO! Pooooooof!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Thanks thanks! I love you too! Poooooof!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I guess I am starting to fall in love with you too! Pooooof!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I like you very very much! Poooof!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: That came as a surprise! I am experiencing butterflies in my stomach now!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Catch this cupid's arrow from me to you! Pooooof!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: My heart will go on and on for you, pooooof!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: ORLY? I LOVE YOU TOO! Pooooof!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: You don't really see a butterfly blush don't you? I am blushing now!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Quit playing games with my heart! Poooof!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: You gotta lay off those gummi bears!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Don't say you love me, you don't even know me! clickkk clickkk!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Time to grab some bites! Poooof!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Time to sleep in my cosy leaf bed! Will you hug me to sleep tonight?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Hold me tight in your arms! Clickkk Clickkk!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Don't let the bed bugs bite! Hehe!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Let's go for some late night! I am not sleepy!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Sing me a lullaby and I will go to my wonderland!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Let me dance with the moon and stars tonight!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I can't sleep cause I am dreaming of something...

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Let the power of the butterflies transform!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Time to transform into a Monster Moth!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Can't just do it all the time, you know.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I can't just do it anywhere.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Too much only spoils the fun.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: Let's just sit and relax, shall we?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I have to stop eating now! Arghhh!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: You're really good at it aren't you?

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm too full to eat anymore!

string.name: s2
string.value: Why are you aking me to say that kind of words? Clickkk clickkkkk~

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: My gams could use a break.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Just gonna get my haunches down here... Ahhh...

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: What do I look like? A wombat?!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: That's not easy with a tail like mine.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Lemme take a little load off here.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: My legs are all cramped up!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Let's go on a walkabout instead!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Let's make up and get ourselves a sanger.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I'll try not to be such a dag.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Was I causing too much trouble?

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm not trying to offend you...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Say that when my gloves are on...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Don't think too bad of me!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I don't appreciate that kinda talk.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'll just head back to the wild then...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Aww, I didn't mean anything by it!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You're too strict, but I understand.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Can we just be mates again?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You don't have to be so mad!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Let's just take a minute to cool off.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Mind giving us a turnaround, mate?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Can we get a little brekkie first?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You're just trying to get me in trouble.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: What kinda galah do you think I am?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: There's nothing moving in my britches.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm gonna need a little more fiber.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I've been needin' that, I tell ya.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You must really get a kick out of my backside.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I don't mean to whinge, but no!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Easy way to make a quid.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'd love to take a camping trip.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: How high do you think I can hop?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: How do you feel about koala bears?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: That's just gonna get us fightin'.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: You're just gonna let me loose in the paddock?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Lucky for you, I duxed English!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Sometimes I like to do a little hop, sometimes I like to make it big.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Don't you think you'd be faster if you hopped?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: This joey's got better things to do.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I used to know a bushranger who could talk all day.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I sure miss my mum's pouch. It was so warm.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'm gonna be a big old boomer one day.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Lemme tell you about the time I boxed this fella...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Maybe you should call one of your mates.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why don't we go bail up some monsters instead?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm not in to bodgy talk.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Don't tell anybody about this, mate.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm gobsmacked to get this kind of attention.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Okay, but just to get warm.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Don't think that's the best idea.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I hate to knock your thinking, but...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: All right! I was startin' to think you were a conch!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: We're not within a cooee of that happening.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I think we need to know each other a little better.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Thank goodness, you've been running me ragged.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I could use a little kanga-nap.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Just point me at the matilda.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Let's go catch a flick instead.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: It's the middle of the afternoon... somewhere!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Thanks heaps. I was getting tired.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Just a little bit of shut-eye here...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Don't put anything in my gloves while I'm asleep.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: This seems like a terrible plan.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Can't you find a nice human?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I'll give it a fair go.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: I hate to turn down my mates.

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: That sounds pretty nice, I suppose.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What did I do to deserve this?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Ha! You're such a dag sometimes.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: A dinkum roo like me doesn't do love!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: You're one of the good ones.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I think you're pretty all right.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Let's just take it nice and slow, all right?

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: Can I chuck a sickie on this one, boss?

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: I'm just gonna throw this out there.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: You want the wrecking balls? You got 'em!

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: This is how we do it in the outback!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: I just got my gloves off!

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: And here I thought you were a wowser!

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: I'm gonna give you the good stuff!

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: Is there a copper I can call?

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Seems like a bad plan to me.

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: I need brekkies before I do anything.

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: Why? I don't see anything on the ground.

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: I could do this all day!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I'll put that one on my schedule.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: I don't want everybody to think I'm a show pony.

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: You really know how to barrack up a bloke.

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: That's good to hear from a mate.

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I mean, I LIKE you, but...

string.name: c37_s1
string.value: Well I don't want to big-note myself, but...

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: Yep, the best looking roo this side of... Anywhere!

string.name: c37_s3
string.value: Mum always thought I was a looker.

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: I don't like where this is going.

string.name: c37_f2
string.value: No. Just not going to happen, mate.

string.name: c37_f3
string.value: That's a ripper of a joke!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'm getting a little chunk around the tail.

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: How did you know my legs hurt?

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: Let me know the last time you've seen a reindeer sit.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: Me? Sit here? I'm going to get dirty, then.

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: I can only sit on top of a clean field of snow, you know.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Oh, this is a perfect place to sit!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm going to sit back, relax and enjoy the show.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: So then, you were all like "Sit" and I did it. w00t!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I'm really tired. I think it's a perfect time to sit.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Did you just order me to do something?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I am a revered pet. Don't like it? Get a dog.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I am not like other pets. I sit when I want to!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: My knees are creaking from all that walking. A non-running reindeer is toast!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Good, I felt like sitting down.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: No way! Not on the bare ground!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Hey, I'm the most revered pet in Happyville. Treat me with respect!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: How dare you give me commands.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Thanks. Finally time for some rest.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm soooo tired, I feel like falling asleep.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ahhhh, it's been a loooong day.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Okay, now that I'm sitting down, you got something to tell me?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I don't understand why you'd want me to sit all of a sudden...

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I am not tired, thank you very much.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: What did I do wrong? Why are you so mad at me...

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: I'm the most revered pet in Happyville. Don't yell at me!

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Take a look at yourself in the mirror first.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Why do you keep picking on me...?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong... sniff sniff...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm going to tell Santa what you're doing to me...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Why are you yelling at me? I don't understand what I did wrong.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: This is how you treat me all the time. I don't buy it.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I don't have a problem. I think it's you with a problem.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: What did I do wrong? Tell me... sniff sniff...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You don't need to raise your voice to get your message across... sniff sniff..

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Don't yell at me... you're scaring me...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong. I swear.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: What do you think you're doing yelling at me?

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'm going back to Santa's house... sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Why do you keep picking on me... sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'm the most revered pet in Happyville... why...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Stop talking to me in gibberish!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: What in the world are you saying...?

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: So, wanna hear about the time I gave Santa a noogie?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're trying to do...

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: Since when did I do stuff like that?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: So, wanna hear about the time I gave Santa a hug?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: What are you going to do? You can't stop me!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Don't do anything stupid here. You're embarassing me.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: So, wanna hear about the time I left Santa a present?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I don't feel like doing that.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: No, it adds wrinkles to my face.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: This one time, at reindeer camp, I ate a cookie.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Meh. That guy needs a new haircut.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Ugh. Tell her to get her hair done!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Since when did I do juvenile things like this?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Your desperate attempts for my attention is not working.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: You'll see the REAL me now... ahhh!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: I don't feel like doing anything right now.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Um.. I don't know how to do that.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I'm too tired to do this right now.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Yes yes, I am good at this.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Look closely. This is a momentous occasion, you know.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: What do you want me to do??

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: More than meets the--Oops. Can't say that!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I feel something holy going around here.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Allow me to show you who I really am. Tada!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm too young to do that just yet.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'm too tired to do it. Seriously.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I don't feel like doing anything right now. I'll do it later.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I look awesome right now. I don't need to do that.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Time for me to dust off my go-to move.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Don't you wish you could do this?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Allow me to show you why I'm the most revered pet in Happyville.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I have no idea what you want me to do.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I am a revered pet from Happyville. I do not take any orders from anyone.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Um... excuse me? What did you just say?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I am too hot. Seriously, way too hot.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Don't touch me. I'm not in a mood.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Now that makes me feel great today!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: La la la what a wonderful day!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I think you're the only one feeling good today.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: What makes you feel so good there?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Just thinking about that makes my day.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I hope you have a great day today!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Are you going out with someone?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I had a sweet dream, you know?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Of course I'm happy. I'm with you!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I feel so blessed right now.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Did you do well on the exam? No way.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: With me, you'll never get bored!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I am so happy to hear that!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Don't just say it. Show me!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I don't just love anybody, you know.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I think we're a match made in heaven.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Just look at me. Nobody else, okay?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Keep saying that. I like hearing that.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: You can't just say that. You'll have to show me you love me.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'm sorry, but I have someone else in mind.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I understand that you love me, but I don't think it's time.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Hey, you are already seeing someone anyway!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I will love you til the end of the road.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I am way too popular for my own good.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: What makes you think you're worthy of my love?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: What did you just say? Whoa...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Are you trying to tell me you love me??

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Do you want to hear a story about the Snow Queen? Once upon a time...

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Do you want to hear more? Okay here we go...

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: You like my stories? I ever tell you about the Snow Queen?

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: For some strange reason, I feel at home in El Nath...

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: What exactly do you want me to say?

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I'm too thirsty to say anything right now.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I don't want to talk to humans.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Once upon a time, in a snow castle far, far away...

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Okay so do you want to know where I came from? I'm from the west.

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Passion, vigor, and pride! That's the reindeer way!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: This year, Santa said I could take the holidays off, so here I am!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Today's not the best day to chat.

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I am hungry, and I am tired. Let's talk next time.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I don't feel like saying anything.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: My crystal form is a lot like the Glimmer Man's.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Are you ready for an all-night chat fest?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: You know, I have some funny stories you'll love to hear.

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Okay, then here's a story about the snow castle I used to live in. Way back in the day...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I am the most revered pet in Happyville. I only talk when I feel like talking.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What do you want me to say?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Uh.... What? I don't understand your moonspeak.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Ahh... time to go to bed.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Why do you keep asking me to fall asleep...?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping yet.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: No, I do not feel like it.

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: No, I feel like playing some more.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I'm so hungry, I can't sleep yet.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping right now.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Hmmm... this pillow is so comfortable.

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: I ... am ... so ... tired ... I ... must ... sleep ...

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Thanks. Time for me to go to bed.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: Hey, it's not bed time yet!!

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: A revered pet like me shouldn't waste time sleeping.

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: It's beautiful outside. Why should I sleep right now?

string.value: Why do you keep giving me stuff like this?

string.value: This is better than anything I've had in a while.

string.value: I am really, really hungry. This doesn't cut it.

string.value: Bleh. Are you trying to kill me?

string.value: I soft, so I comfy anywhere.

string.value: I sit now. You sing me song!

string.value: I'm sleepy, but I can't sleep...

string.value: You no play with me no more?

string.value: You are my favorite! Love you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You just as cute as me! Love you!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: You want love? I want ribs!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: La la la, can't hear you!

string.value: Stop it, stop it, stop it!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Boing boing! Hee hee, keep up!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Wanna sleep next to you! Zzz...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Talk about ribs? I wanna rib. Mmm...rib.

string.value: You get nice thingies for me?

string.value: I like beef. Pork okay, too.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I have many interests. Like knitting.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I like talkies with you! You funny!

string.value: I born with big eyes. Sparkly!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Am I fat? Be honest. I take it.

string.value: Can't hear you, can't hear you!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Gonna be rock star! Have world tour!

string.value: I have no idea what you talk about.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Why are you asking me to do that?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: It is against pumpkin law for me to go first.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Makin' squeezin's outta my pumpkin butt!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Which one of these creases is my backside?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I don't have to go right now.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I am on this like black on a bat.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Let's go get some candy instead.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Leave my light on! I'm scared of the dark.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I have gourd business to attend to.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I need to scare some children first!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Not until I see a ghost!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Stop telling me what to do!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Sometimes I dream of turning YOUR head into a lantern.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Sorry, I can't hear you with all the awesome in my brain.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Not until we trick or treat!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I need at least three screaming kids to lull me to sleep.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: First time seeing a talking pumpkin?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Wanna see some pumpkin magic? Gimme your wallet.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: October is obviously the best month.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Do you know when Halloween is? I don't understand the concept of time.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Pumpkin is NOT delicious. Don't eat me.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Don't expect too much from a pumpkin.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You should be more like me... a terror to all humanity.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: If I ever see you eat a pumpkin, I will...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Bats like pumpkins. So let's not be friends with bats.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Pump, pump it up, pump it up!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I like to keep busy with the frightening.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: You ever seen a pumpkin die from indigestion?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: I'm gonna grub it so hard!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I want to go back to the patch...

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Pumpkins don't get mad... we get revenge.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: You can't fake being a pumpkin! Impostor!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: But... this dirt is so crummy...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'm going to put a candle in your head.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: What do you take me for?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I am going to poop in your lunchbox SO much.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Don't do anything you're going to regret when you go to sleep tonight.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't say it unless you mean it!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: How can you do this to me?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You better hope I don't get ahold of your shoes.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I said it won't happen again.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I wish somebody had carved me a mad face.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Want to see an angry pumpkin? Do you?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I've got a lot of laxatives to put into some candy tonight...

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Don't do it! Listen to your pumpkin!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: You're creepy in a good way!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You are the seeds in my brain.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'll be at your side until the day I rot.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Think of me as a child with a misshapen head.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Does it look like my insides?

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Gonna need some more candy wrappers here!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: It's a good thing I bought those candles.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Why are you asking me to do that?

string.name: c13_f4

string.value: If I ever see you eat a pumpkin, I will...

string.value: Pump, pump it up, pump it up!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I like to keep busy with the frightening.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: You ever seen a pumpkin die from indigestion?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: I'm gonna grub it so hard!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I will do as you say.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Scram, my clothes are getting dirty.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Why don't you take a break too?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Hmm. Don't block the path of a rabbit.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Too much dust here. Can't do it.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: These clothes are pricey. I can't just sit down.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: I'm going to put a candle in your head.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: (Little veins are popping out on its forehead.)

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Come at me! I'll take you on.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: It makes me sad that you have to discipline me.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You want to feel the wrath of the rabbit don't you?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: All right... If that's how you want it.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: If I wasn't a pet... I would....

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Blah... I will take the high road here.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You ever feel the punch of a rabbit?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: If I was just a bit younger... I would have taken you on.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I like you a lot too!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I feel the same way too!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Give me some time to think it over.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You are you, and and I am me, and that is all we'll ever be.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I don't know if feeling this good is legal!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: This is the happiest moment of my life!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I will be with you always!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: My insides are nice and clean.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Do you want to get locked up?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Don't talk to me right now.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: It's good to eat right and live well.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Now is not a good time.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I'll get to work on making some.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Stop that nonsense and let's play!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: My digestive system is in full gear.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: It's time to let it go.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: My eyes are closed. I am one with my bowels.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't want to hear that dirty talk.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I am still good to go.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Now is not a good time to sleep.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Now is not the time to sleep.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Sleeping is done on beds. Or hutches.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Do you know what's popular these days?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You are pretty fashionable, I guess.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I only like the designer stuff.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Not all expensive clothes are designer clothes.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: It's important that clothes fit you.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Don't wear it just because everyone else is wearing it.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: My hair is the product of a famous stylist.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You want to go shopping with me?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Be aware of Purty... She is a scary person.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't have such a thing.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: You expect too much from this rabbit.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: I am not leaving any leftovers!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'm so full, I am about to explode!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm tired of getting stuck to the ground.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I'm not sitting because I want to.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: No... Why do I need to listen to you?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I am not sitting because you told me to!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I did what you asked. You should pet me.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Fine, but you better be thankful!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I am not doing this for you!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Nope. Not doing it. Ask your other pets.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: How would it benefit me to listen to you?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Sit? I haven't sat since I was three.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Don't tell me to sit! You sit!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I am not doing this to win favors from you!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I sit because I want to.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I'm only sitting because my legs hurt.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: You should know me by now!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Stop playing with me! I'm mad!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: You think I'm gonna listen? You need to think again!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Why? Cause I tell it like it is?!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I didn't think you had the guts...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: You don't have to get all huffy at me!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: This is making me SO grumpy!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: See how my needles are standing? That means BACK OFF!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Do I seriously have to listen to this?!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Hey, relax! I was just joshing around!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You're in a mood today, huh?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I hate you! You have pierced my heart!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You aren't talking to me, are you? Think it over!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Stop being so mean! Remember all that fun we had?

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'm not crying! It's just raining on my face.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Stop being so mean! I didn't mean to make you mad...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: What is leaking from my face?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You're gonna get stuck if you don't stop!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Oh yeah?! Maybe I'll just stop eating!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Sticks and stones may break my bones, but your face is going I'm going to backflip into your face!

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: I like it when that vein pops out on your forehead.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Can you make your face all red again?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: I don't want to show you!

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: You must enjoy me making fun of you?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Even my tongue is cute... Want to see?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I love seeing you mad! You know that?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Cry! Cry! Cry! You mad? Go cry some more!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Your little games are not fitting for an awesome Hedgehog like me!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I like it when you're bummed out. It's fun for me!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: You should be kissing my spiky butt!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: What? You like my personality? Me too.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I want to see you mad. That vein on your head is hilarious!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: What do you think? Am I cute?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Go get mad! I'm not mad... You mad?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Keep making me do this, and you're gonna be a pincushion!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You thought I was mad? You are such a newb.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Stop talking to me, I'm concentrating.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Why are you staring at me?!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: You go first! I will follow.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I had a LOT of cheese last night.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Cool, keep a look out. I'm gonna wreck shop.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I am not going because you tell me to!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Ahhhh... I feel a thousand pounds lighter.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Eat, sleep... you know the rest.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You want to see me push?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Prepare the paper towels and baggies!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: It's gonna be spiky! I can feel it!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: You're gonna need some good gloves for this one.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Here we go, the great flood cometh.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: What are you making me do? You keep making me mad!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I haven't eaten anything. Nothing comes out!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I will go when I want to! That's how I roll!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Nah, it'll be all sad. Let me save up for a good one.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I am not talking to you because I like you.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: My needles are sharp and pointy. Thank you for the hug.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: You gotta be tough, like me!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: How do you understand what I'm saying?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I don't wanna talk right now! I'm in a bad mood!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why do you make me mad?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: You're not the boss of me! Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I will talk to you. But I won't be faithful to you!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: We have been together a while now. When are we going to form a guild?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I think we can party up for a while.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I like how we're friends, but stop using me to scratch your back.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Ready for a show? I'll show you my ultimate move: ROLLING THUNDER NEEDLE!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Why do you continue to test me?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You go first. Try speaking Hedgehog!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I thank you. You are too kind.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Your thoughts and mine are the same!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Don't expect no love from me!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I am sorry, but ain't nobody have time for that!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I am not mad. You are mad.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: My heart only has space for you!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Why am I mad? I am mad for you!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Wait... I can't be falling for you! But why am I?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I will be nicer to you.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Take that love to the Jr. Reapers!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: You say you like me, but your heart is elsewhere.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: You love me? Go ahead and give me a hug!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: You're less of a newb than I thought.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: You wanna go on some raids with me?

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Okay, let's give this thing a shot.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I will only be mad a little from now on.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I was going to call you master but... Nah, forget it.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I am mad, mad, mad! You stay out of my way!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Be quiet, I am trying to sleep!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: How can I sleep when I am not sleepy?

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: I'm sorry, but I'm going to pass out.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: We have been with each other too long. Even our sleep patterns match!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I'm tired from watching you be mad all day.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Wow, you made me a bed?!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I don't want to sleep! Don't make me!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You don't sleep? I don't sleep.

string.name: c24_f3

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: The words are so sweet, I don't know what to do.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: You can say that 1000 times and I won't get tired of it.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Your words are always so sweet.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Your words are not very convincing.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: That's enough. Let's just drink some juice.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Are you falling in love with me?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: If you tell that to another pet, I'll bite you! Yip!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: How far do your exaggerations go?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I was going to call you master but... Nah, forget it.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: You need to study up on common decency.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Think things through before you tell me what to do!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: You ever heard of common decency?!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Poo Poo... Let's sing about it!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why are you telling me to do this?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Really? You want me to do what?!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: How many times a day do you want me to go?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: This one looks just like me!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: How did you know I had to go?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: My poo is in abundance... Like your love.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I think you like poo way too much! You keep telling me to poo!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I need to pee. Can I pee?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I haven't eaten enough to poop.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I don't know what poop is.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: You should get some rest too.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I don't think it's time to sleep yet.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I want to see you in my dreams, master.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Wake me up when it's chow time!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I want to see you in my dreams, master.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You don't sleep, I don't sleep.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: There's not even a bed! Why do you hate me?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Maybe you need a nap! Yip!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I am going to sleep with master!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You go to sleep too, master.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Enjoy your travels even if I sleep.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Isn't it too early for bed?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I am in no mood to sleep!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I want to play with master! Play I say!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Why are you always telling me what to do?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: The grass fields of Henesys are nice.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Human language is not easy to learn!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I want to chat, but that would be too loud.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: What do you want me to say?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: The falling leaves remind me how lonely I am.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I will not say anything more.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I want to go on a journey with you, master!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I am little tired today. How about you master?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Wish upon a star and it will come true!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Manager Karl in Ludibrium is so kind.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Wish upon a star and it will come true!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Are you bored? Let's got get a facial!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I am enjoying the solitude right now.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I think you are the strongest in the world!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: We have been together a while. Maybe I should call you master now?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I love spending time with you, master.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: My wish is that you become happy.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I want to hear a story, master.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: My throat hurts. I was chatting with a Husky all night.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I have no comment on that question.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: I don't want to be turned into a pig.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I am full and I can't eat anymore!

string.name: s1
string.value: I am not going to listen to you, master.

string.name: s3
string.value: Pretty master, please use pretty words...

string.name: s4
string.value: Stop making me say such things.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find demon friends.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't destroy any villages without me, okay, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.
