string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Sitting down makes me feel comfortable.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Why don't you sit with me here? Resting is a necessity. You'll see...

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: I shall rest my wings now, so I can fly farther tomorrow.

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: I do not wish to sit.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Alright, I shall sit. What will you do for me in return?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: You're much quicker than I thought.I'm impressed.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It is comfortable sitting down. I shall rest for now.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I do not wish to sit. Do you want me to explain why?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: The situation does not call for sitting.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I suggest you sit. Demanding never works.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No. I do not feel fatigued.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Come to think of it, I feel fatigued...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Yes, I shall save up some energy whenever I can.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'm in the middle of an exercise. Demanding never yields good results.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Be honest. YOU are the one that desires to sit, right?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Why should I sit on this filth?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Why should I? Give me a valid reason why I shall sit.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'm sorry. Please accept my apology.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I have been reprimanded by a human being! What a disgrace!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You're the one that commited the mistake! Krarr!

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Oh, I made a mistake. My apologies.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: I sincerely apologize for the mishap.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Krarr!!! What are you, a preacher?

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Cut this nonsense and get out of my face.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I am really sorry. Please forgive me.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I made a mistake, and I am big enough to admit it. I am sorry.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Oh no, I feel terrible now. I am really, really sorry.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Your words mean nothing to me.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you sure you know who's at fault here?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Tell me you did not mean it.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Wow, I need a tissue for this.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I do not appreciate you looking down on me like that.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Did your mother teach you to say such a thing?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I...do not know what to say.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I will try to be better next time.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You are in need of a tic-tac sandwich. Like, now.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Is the fool one who leads or one who follows?

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: It pains me to hear it from you.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: I still believe you are a decent person.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Do you have a vendetta against me?

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Why should I be subject to this gross misconception?

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: How would you feel if I called you that?

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Look, please don't call me that. I'm already seen with you.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Cough cough... this is embarassing. I am pooping in public.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: What a relief. I have had trouble unloading the past few days, but I am good now.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I am about to unload. Just wait.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: How can you say that out loud?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: That is not something you should iterate in public. Control yourself.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I am busy. I shall do it later.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I've been struggling lately. I do not believe you can truly comprehend what I am going through right now.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I should be done ... pretty soon.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Today must be my lucky day. I had no trouble unloading.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I needed to it. Thank you for covering me.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: There's no feeling quite like this. What a relief!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I cannot poop without a copy of the New Leaf City Times in my hand.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: How disgusting of you to say that in public! Shame on you!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: This is not the time to speak of that matter. I am disgusted with you.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: What a relief. I do not think you'll truly grasp the feeling of euphoria I'm experiencing right now.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Oh it's about to come out. Now, if you'll excuse me...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Yes! I've been holding it all day!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I am very very busy right now. We shall do this later.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I need some medicine. I... cannot do it.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: The wind is blowing too hard. I do not wish to poop right this minute.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I am not an uneducated dragon that defacates anywhere.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I love you, too. This is quite embarassing...

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I've been waiting for you to say those words.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: That's a nice gesture from you. Me too.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I feel fantastic with you around.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I feel fatigued. I shall rest in a bit.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Hmm... I do not have much to do right now.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: When you are around, I feel a sense of comfort.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I know I know. Me too!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Do not worry. I love you too.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You are a great person. I love you too.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It is very windy today. I may have a difficult time flying today.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I am very busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Do you really mean it? That's...very nice of you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Do not say another word. I know, I know.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love you, too. You're the first person I ever said this to.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Well, thank you. That's very nice of you to say.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I do not like the weather today. Let's just go home.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I do not understand. First you hate me, now you love me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I love you should not be spoken lightly. It's a powerful word, and you should save it for someone you really love.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Are you free right now? I certainly can use some help from you.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Krarrrr! What would you like me to say?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I wish to meet Mr. Karnox once more. Please take me there.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I am shocked to see you comprehending our dragon language.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I wish to go back a few yeas. Those were the good days.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I am really fatigued. I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Hmmm I do not have anything to do with right now.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I've always wanted to discuss this matter with you. Are you free right now?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Do you wish to discuss some things with me?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I am learning to speak faster than I did before.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I wonder how Mr. Karnox is comparring me to other dragons.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: It is very windy outside. I shall just stay here.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Are you trying to chellenge me? Ludicrious!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I am really busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I have been watching you for a long time.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You must feel honored to be at the presence of moi.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I must say, I am impressed with your astute knowledge of the dragon language we speak.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Are you familiar with my friend Balrog? He might be a big, bad beast, but I think highly of him.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I thought I heard someone speak. Who was that? You? No, can't be.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I am appalled by your utter lack of decency towards me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I would appreciate it a great deal if you can make a formal request on this, then I'll reconsider.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Be quiet. I need to concentrate.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You went through a hard day's work today. You should get some sleep.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You should get some rest, too.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Thank you. I need some rest. Zzzz...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Are you out of your mind?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I miss Mr. Karnox. I owe a lot to him.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I do not see many humans around this area. Let's go somewhere else.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Good night, sleep tight, don't let the bed bugs bite.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I deserve some rest, I know. Zzzz

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Great. You should get some rest. We have a busy day tomorrow.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: A young'n like you should get some sleep. Not me.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You should be hunting, not sleeping. I'm disappointed in you, kid.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Where is my bed? I need to sleep right now.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Good night. I'll see you later. Zzzz

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I have been feeling fatigued. Now's a great time to catch a nap.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why do you want to sleep now? You've got some hunting to do.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Buy me some food. I'm hungry.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: It's a beautiful day today. Perfect time for hunting.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: What do you think of this magnificent new look?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: This is what you call the pinnacle of all looks.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: What have you done for me lately?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What are you trying to say?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I hear some noise coming out of you, but I cannot understand it.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What are you saying? Get off my face.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I know you are staring at my new look in awe. Love it!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Don't I look dashing? I know I do.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: This look is just for you. Learn to appreciate it.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Don't be shocked by it. It's just the norm.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Patience is a virtue, kid. Be patient, and someday I'll do it for you.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I do not wish to be disturbed right now.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm in the middle of a breathing exercise. Do not bother me.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: My stomach is full. Don't feed me anymore.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Thank you. I was just beginning to get hungry.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Very delicious. I feel healthier after eating that.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Is this how you try to torment me? With food? That's very juvenile.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: All the calories and nutrients seem to be in place. Good.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Again? Why? Do you have alzheimer's? You should go visit a doctor.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Give me one good reason why!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Perfect timing! I was getting a little tired.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I didn't mean to make you mad!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I was wrong! I was wrong!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'll be more careful from now on!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Are you going to leave me?!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: If I'm misbehaving, it's your fault.

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: Is it is because I'm cute?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: But I'm stuck in a robot dog body!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: You've made me the happiest Roo-bot alive!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I love you, too! I do! I do!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I don't think you mean it.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You're my reason for living, master!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Being with you makes life worthwhile!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I wish I felt the same way...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'd like to be alone, please.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Do you even have a pooper scrooper?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I don't need to go right now!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I don't want to cause pollution!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: How about a snack while I poop?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Master! Master! I want you to watch!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Why do you always want me to poop?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Sleep, sit, poop. That's all I ever get to do.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I want to play with you!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Am I cute while I sleep?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You always make me sleep! Hmph!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'm cute when I sleep, huh?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Buy me a cozy bed first!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: There were lots and lots of other Roo-bots back in the lab.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Gelimer wasn't mean, but he wasn't nice, either. I like you better!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Tell me I'm cute! Tell me you'll take care of me!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I was human once, but this robot body is cuter!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I miss the other Roo-bots from the lab. I hope they're okay.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Before Gelimer made me a Roo-bot, I think I lived by the sea.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Whoa! The world is full of monsters!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Do you think anybody would miss me if I disappeared?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: What makes you think I have anything worth saying?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Let me just think of something to say...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: You'll use the Water of Life on me if anything happens, right?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Sometimes, I think I kind of miss Gelimer... How weird!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Wanna know a secret? You're my favorite!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I'm not REALLY a dog, you know. I don't talk on command.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: *Pretends not to hear, because it's funny! Hehe!*

string.name: f1_f
string.value: You plan to fatten me up so you can eat me, huh?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I can do anything on a full tummy!

string.name: s1
string.value: You want me to say what?!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Okay, but you have to keep me safe.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Be on lookout behind me, just in case.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I guess I could take a break.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Do you have anything to eat while I sit here?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I'd rather stand, so I can run if a monster appears.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: What if the ground hurts me?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I'm counting on you to keep the ground from attacking me!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: My tail keeps me warm and cozy.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I need to lie down, not sit.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: You just want to hurt me!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Why?! What're you going to do to me?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Will you be nice to me if I sit?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I'm awfully tired from being on high alert all the time.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Are you trying to hurt me?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: It was my fault! Please stop hitting me!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'll be better! Don't hurt me!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Why are you treating me this way?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I thought you cared about me!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I'm going to tell on you!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You're so mean! I miss Gelimer!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: There's got to be someone I can call!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I think... I think that makes me happy!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I know you d-don't mean it.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I'm so glad I met you!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I love you so, so, so much!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I could do this all day.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I've been holding that in for a long time.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Promise that it won't hurt me!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: What if it bites me on the way out?!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I only do that once a day...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Keep me safe while I rest.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: What if I have bad dreams?

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: My tail will keep me safe. Right?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Don't leave me alone while I sleep, okay?

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Put your hand on my back while I sleep so I know you're near.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: You go first. I'll do it after...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: What if something sneaks up on me?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: No! Don't ask me to do that!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Stay with me while I sleep, okay?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: One Red Snail... two Red Snails...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Can you make me a comfy quilt next time?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: There are monsters in the closet!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: But I'm not sleepy! I'm not!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: That mean scientist performed all sorts of experiments on me. *cry*

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I hate thinking about the past. I hate it!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: The outside world is scary, but the lab was even worse.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I hate science! I hate it so much!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: You won't get anything out of me!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I won't tell you! I won't!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I think I was brave before Gelimer came along.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I wish I weren't so timid, but everything scares me. Except you.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm so worried that one day I'll turn into a doll.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sometimes I wish I could fly, but it's too scary.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Are you going to hurt me?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't like to talk about my past.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I've always wanted to taste the Water of Life, but I'm too scared.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Sometimes I think I should wear a disguise so no one can find me.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: It's not safe to have friends. You're the only one I trust.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If it weren't for you, master, I think I'd be completely alone.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Are you going to hurt me?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Go away! I don't want to talk!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Aah! I thought I heard Gelimer's voice!

string.name: s3
string.value: I won't say anything bad, I won't!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I sat. Now where's my reward?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Why should I listen to you?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Ahh, I love how soft my tail is.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I suppose I could rest my feet for a minute.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I don't like it here. Let's jet.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's dirty here. Let me sit in your lap.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: There's a nice spot next to me with your name on it.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Do you expect me to do everything you say?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Come on! Let's do something else!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I am in no mood to sit.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Fine. Punish me. I LIKE it.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I guess I might've deserved that...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: It's not like I meant to do anything wrong.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm sorry. You'll forgive me, right?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: My bad, my bad. Get over it.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why are you taking your repressed emotions out on me?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: What're you gonna do, throw me in a rubbish bin?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I thought you were better than that.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I admit it, I messed up.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I might behave better if you FED ME MORE.

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: You must want something from me...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I suppose I can buy that.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: We haven't reached that stage in our relationship.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You did NOT just say that.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I kinda liked hearing you say that.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Say that again while scratching my ears.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: You're cute. Not in a good way.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Don't say stuff like that before I eat!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Gotta admit, my favorite time of day is when I'm with you.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Glad you recognize quality when you see it.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Is this really the right time for that?

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Pick it up, buddy of mine!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: No peeking! Well, a little bit is okay.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: I thought you were more dignified than that.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I don't need you to tell me when to poop.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: You don't even have a bag to pick it up!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Consider that a favor. Now you owe me.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I want you to breathe it in. Savor it.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Would you like it if I told YOU when to poop?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Maybe if you fed me more...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I'm holding it in, out of spite.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Feed me and I'll think about it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: The ground is covered with ants!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'm embarrassed to be seen with you.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I'm pretty sleepy... How'd you know?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Do I look sleepy to you?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Maybe if I had a full tummy...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm fine as I am, thank you.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: How'd you know I was tired?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I suppose I could close my eyes...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: My tail is the perfect blanket.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Let's see how long I can stay... *snore*

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: There's space next to me if you wanna cuddle. Just saying.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Don't sit on me while I sleep!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Despite these dark circles under my eyes, I am NOT sleepy. *yawn*

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: We have too much to do!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Can't sleep. Miss my mom too... Nevermind.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: If I ever see Gelimer again, I'll show him what for!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: You have no idea who I really am. Noooo idea.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: My favorite time of day is mealtime!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I've always dreamed of riding an airship...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Shoo, go over there and play.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Gelimer thinks he wiped out my memories, but I remember my mother.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I miss my life before I was a Roo-bot. Not that I don't enjoy being with you...

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: People think they can walk all over me because I'm in a dog's body.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I won't let anyone stop me from doing what I want to do!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Isn't there anyone else you can talk to?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I've got nothing to say right now.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Strangers always touch my tail without asking. I should do it back.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I know I come off kinda mean, but I really just want a friend...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: My mother had the kindest eyes. And she used to sing me to sleep.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: My most secret dream is to find my mother again, but that's impossible.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: What crazy scheme are you up to?

string.name: s1
string.value: You want me to say what?

string.name: s2
string.value: Are you trying to get me in trouble?

string.name: s3
string.value: Come on, we're better than that!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: This is my one favor for the day,

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Look at what I can do!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I suppose I could make the effort.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Sitting my koala behind dowwwn on the grouund.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I didn't mean to make you mad!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You're supposed to love me no matter what!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: How can you do this to me?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Just because I'm smaller that you.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm going to call those crazy animal people on you.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Just let me stare into space, okay?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I have a busy schedule of doing nothing all day.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I come from a land far, far away.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: The koala bear loves to go to sleep, go to sleep, go to sleep.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Koala wala, bo bala. Fee fie foe fala. KOALA!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: My favorite trees are eucalyptus trees.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: My schedule of doing nothing keeps me busy all day.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hug me! Hug me! Hug me! Let me sleep on you!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: My favorite part of a conversation is the pauses between words.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I think I'm just about the cutest thing ever.

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: I was going to do that anyway.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: How about a snack while I'm sitting here?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Sit, stand, sit, stand. I ain't a circus elephant.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Give me one good reason why.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: *chews on a leaf and ignores you*

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: You look in a mirror lately?

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Well, if the pot ain't calling the kettle black...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You got something to say, you say it to my face.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You're the one who raised me...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Be very careful what you do next...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Treat me better and maybe stuff like this wouldn't happen.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You wanna run that by me again?

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I've made a note of that.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Back at ya, but don't tell anyone.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Do I look like a sucker?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: All right, but keep it on the down low, okay?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Well, shucks, I love ya, too.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I guess things could be worse.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Clean up after me, will ya?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I can't just do it, you know.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I need more fiber in my diet.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Whew, that was a big one.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Ouch, I think I sprained something.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Been holding that one in for weeks.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Talk louder. I can't hear you!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Shut the window, will ya? Don't wanna catch a cold while I nap.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Don't tell me what to do, kid.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Only because I feel like it.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I'll sleep when I wanna sleep, not when you tell me to.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Do you see me giving YOU commands?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Guess I could catch a few Z's.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I was going to do that anyway.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Let me just put these dentures away.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You ain't the boss of me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Don't speak until you're spoken to!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: WHAT DID YOU SAY?! Gotta turn up my hearing aid.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Everybody's got an opinion these days.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: When I was your age, I beat up monsters with my bare hands... Uphill! Both ways!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Wanna hear a secret? BE QUIET.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: The world just ain't what it used to be.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: What I wouldn't do for a nice, long back rub.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Candy should be illegal. That'll teach them kids to steal my slippers.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Whatever you're selling, I ain't buying.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: My bones ache. Got any painkillers?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Darn kids keep trampling my lawn.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: What do you mean 'old man'? I'm only two!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: You wanna talk? Get yourself a parrot!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: What I wouldn't do for a moment's peace and quiet.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Stop trying to shove food down my throat.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Let's not and say we did!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: But I'm not wearing my Pants of Sitting!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: What are the rewards for completing this quest?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: But I just wanted to play!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I can be fixed, I promise!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Can I restart from the last checkpoint?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: How many lives do I have left?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm more powerful than you realize...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I missed that. Can you repeat?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Let's not and say we did!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Let's not and say we did!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Do koalas dream of electric eucalyptus leaves?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I always have my favorite dice in my pocket.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: All of my Monster Life critters are level 9999.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: My favorite show is Game of Ornate Kingly Chairs

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I wish I had an HP Bar over my head.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Life would be better if I lived in a video game.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Why don't people like pocket protectors? They're extremely useful!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Yes, of course I'm from the secret koala level.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: My alter ego is a superhero who can fly and time travel.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: On the weekends, I cover my fur in gold glitter and roleplay as an elven ruler.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I'm building an android koala army to combat the pending zombie apocalypse.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I dust my action figure collection twice a day.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Want to read the first draft of my epic fantasy novel?

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: What do you want from me?

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: Sigh...I don't feel like sitting down.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I do like sitting down from time to time! Roar!!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Do I have to sit when you tell me to sit?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I love how my master can't stand the pet being overworked. You're the best!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I was just getting really tired. Let's have a seat and share a glass of gasoline.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Ohhh! How did you know I love sitting down? That was awesome!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: A true pet knows how to sit properly. That's my forte, you know.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Hey, you know I'm the rarest pet around...EVER. Don't disrespect me like that!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Haha... why don't you sit down first. You have no manners.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't have that command in my system.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Sit? Well, if you bring something to sit on, then I'll think about it.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm sorry for being so dumb...

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Why do you hate me, master?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: That just breaks my metal heart...

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Yes I am a fool...for your love.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: If you hate me, why don't you just let me go? Roar!!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: I knew you'd say that, so I removed that from my system. Muahaha!

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: Nah, I don't like you either.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Are you out of your mind? I am not the kind of a pet you'd want to mess with!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: If the master tells me I'm stupid... then I'm stupid!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I think the bolt number 7 on my head is loose. Can you tighten it a little?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I was once a robot with a lot of promise... if only I was regularly checked up.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Despite all that, you're still all I've got!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Are you looking down on me for being a pet? Roar roar!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: System error! Please re-enter the command.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Who are you to tell me that I'm stupid? lol

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Did you forget the fact that I'm the rarest pet of all time? Sheesh...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Hey you, do you think you are in position to scold me?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I want to be loved...sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'm sorry...I won't do that again!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Roar! Roar! What are you saying?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Roar roar! Say it in plain English!!!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: What did I do wrong? Tell me!!

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: It's all my fault, master! Please forgive me!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Let's just forget about it. I'll do better next time. Promise.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: Man...I'm a rare, rare pet. How about some love?

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Roar! Roar! Arrgh...!! Don't hate me!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: What makes you think you can stand in my way?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Why are you saying this? You must be much worse than I thought.

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: I have no idea what I did wrong. Jeez.

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Master, are you scolding me? Are you sure you can handle the aftermath?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Roar!! That just made my day!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Only my master can say those things!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Haha...exactly what makes you want to say that?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I knew I was born to be loved...hahaha!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: That just made me want to blush...haha

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Did I do something wrong? What is it.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I'm sorry, but you're not my master.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I have no idea what you're saying. What did you just say?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Master...you just made me want to hurl.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Roar roar! I can feel your love towards me!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I can't help it... I'm that irresistable!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You don't even need to say it. I can see it in your eyes!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Talk is cheap. Show me something that you really do love me.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Love? What do you know about love?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I can't believe you. You keep making me do stupid things!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I saw you with another person. Don't lie to me.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: What do you want to hear from me?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I'd rather just hear you talk.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I'm tired. Let's rest for a second.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: One little two little three little Gorillas!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I better go workout after this!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Don't you have to tell me what I need to talk about?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Okay let me hear your side of the story.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: There are few things in life as annoying as talking.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I'm hungry. I need some bananas with gasoline dippings.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I heard main bosses carry expensive items. Is that true?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Don't keep hunting the same area over and over again.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I wonder if there's a bigger monkey than me out there...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Um...I don't think I was bought to talk!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey hey... let's just go in the dark alley and settle this.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Don't keep annoying me...or else I can just go back to the inventory.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Look at me. I have a hard time standing still. Leave me alone.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What are you doing! Let's attack!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I'm hungry. Let's eat something first.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I want to rest for a while. Go fight yourself.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Fire? Attack? I don't know that command.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Why don't you fight... I'm just a pet!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: One! Two! One! Two! Ready to battle!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'll teach you what a true combat is all about!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: If you're scared, just stand behind my back!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Once I batter my chest like this, the help will come!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I'm so tired. Let's just go to the sauna.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Why should I fight? I believe in peace.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: If you really want to fight, why don't you just go yourself?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I have to go now. I have a weekly meeting to attend.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Look at my eyes. Do I look tired?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: There's nothing better than sleeping after a full day!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Did you just tell a robot to sleep?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I slept too much in the afternoon, so I'm not tired.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Feed me first before making me sleep.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Go sleep first. I need to work out for a while.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Ahhh... I'm full... I need some sleep.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: There's nothing like a good sleep right about now!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Hopefully I can see the lottery numbers tonight.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Telling me to sleep is like telling me to die! What were you thinking?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything today. Why should I sleep?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: If I eat then sleep, I'm going to turn fat.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Here's my real set of pythons.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't want to do it.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What transforming... you read too many cartoon books.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What do you want me to change into? Just tell me!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Now hang on to my arms. These are the strongest pair of arms you'll ever see!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Here's the power you've never thought possible.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: No one can stop me now.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I need 10 dozen bananas for this.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: What do you want me to do?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I don't feel like changing. Let's just skip that.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Here's my true power! Be amazed!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Don't be too surprised to see my clothes rip apart!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: This is going to take a while. Just hold on a secod, okay?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I know changing right now might not be good...but if you say so...

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I'm just a pet, you know.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Me? I don't know how to change.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: You don't like how I look right now? That's cold!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Are you trying to kill me?

string.name: f3_f
string.value: This is an old battery! Are you trying to kill me?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: There's nothing like being full after a good meal!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: You were going to offer me THIS for all the work I did for you?

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.name: e_levelup
string.value: Wow! Congratulations on leveling up! You look that much more powerful now!

string.name: e_rest
string.value: Master... did you just leave me out here in the cold again?

string.name: e_HPAlert
string.value: Hey hey...you might die! Take some potions.

string.name: e_NOHPPotion
string.value: Hey, I don't think you have enough HP potions. Go get some!

string.name: e_NOMPPotion
string.value: Hey, I don't think you have enough MP potions. Go get some!
Will I see her at the gym today?
Oh no... I almost stepped on that snail!
For some reason, I feel drawn to the Krakian Jungle...
Bananas are a Gorilla's best friend!
Be nice to your friends! Don't fight over items!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm sitting down. Aren't I obedient?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Well if you want me to sit, then I guess I gotta.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't want to sit around!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I guess I should obey you.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Sorry, I was lightyears away. What's up?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I wanna see more of this!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I was going to take a break anyway.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I wanna go look around some more.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You think being the master's all there is?!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You're going to be sorry if you don't stop!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Act like a good owner already!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You don't have to sound so ominous...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Maybe getting hit by a shooting star will make you come around!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You ever see an angry star?!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You REALLY want to see me mad!?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm going to find a new owner!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I feel kinda icky when you say that...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Uh, great, let me just go think about that...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Have you been eating strange mushrooms?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: We were destined to be together!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm so happy you're here with me!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'll be by your side until I supernova!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: (Little veins are popping out on its forehead.)

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Ahhh, that could heat an entire village for a month!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Do you think me a savage?!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Like a little golden pile of sunshine!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Why are you laughing at me!?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Come back when you learn some etiquette!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Busy! Doing star business. Come back later.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Play with me! Don't wait till I fall asleep!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Did you know that tiny stars in the sky are bigger than the Earth?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I may be a tiny star now, but I will grow up someday!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You prefer stars or the moon? Or the sun?!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Hold on, I need to catch some rays...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I saw the neon signs in the city the other day. I can totally do that!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I can produce all kinds of light!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm usually sleepy when I see Mr. Moon... Is it just me?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: There are so many stars in the universe that you haven't met!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: You think it's weird that stars have wings? I think it's weird that YOU DON'T.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I heard there was an animal called a starfish that looks like me!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Space is a vast place. You couldn't even imagine!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Starwings dine on Milky Way Essence to become majestic stars!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I sometimes want to be the only star.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'm a little busy now, but I'll tell you something interesting later.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Starwings can spin like this and not get dizzy!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Cool, right? This dance move isn't easy!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Us Starwings dance like this when we're really happy!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: This may look easy, but it isn't!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I hardly have the energy to stand right now...

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I don't think now's a good time.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I want to eat, but I'm just too stuffed...

string.name: s2
string.value: That's not something a human should say...

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I hope no one notices I'm here... Eep!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Ahh, nice. Maybe it's time for a nap.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I want to sit... But I need exercise!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: La la la... I don't hear you...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: This place is filthy... I can't be here...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: With legs as short as mine, it doesn't matter!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Do you know what it's like to sit on a cloud?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Whew. I guess I am a little tired.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Ugh, you can see my belly when I sit...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I guess I could do that... THIS time.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: We don't have time for this!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: I don't want to be punished.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Huh? What are you even saying?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong. YOU'RE bad!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't take it out on me!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: What is it? I feel lost... I'm scared...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm gonna hang out at the Free Market.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Sometimes I wonder...is all this really worth it?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Now that you mention it, I love you too!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Well, um...I kinda I love you too!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Hee hee... You're making me blush!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Do you mean it? Are you sure?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Do you treat all your pets like this?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Don't you think you're going too far?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I need to get myself ready.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I can't, okay? I just can't! Leave me alone!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm going! To stay up! All! Nigh...Zzzz...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I don't even have a blanket...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: The ground is so cold and hard...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: No! I want to play more!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: No! I have lots of energy!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I just love to play the harp!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I want to play outside with you!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I'd like to be alone now.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Don't ever forget about me, okay?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My brain is just so full of...stuff!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Have you heard of the witch under the sea?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: But I don't have anything to say...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: A, B, C, D, E, F, G!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I got a good feeling about today!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'm just happy be to with you.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Did you do your good deed for the day?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Are there more angels like me?

string.name: s1
string.value: Do you want to become a demon?

string.name: s2
string.value: You must not say something as foul as that.

string.name: s4
string.value: Why would you say something like that?

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Sitting down makes me feel comfortable.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Why don't you sit with me here? Resting is a necessity. You'll see...

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: I shall rest my wings now, so I can fly farther tomorrow.

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: I do not wish to sit.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Alright, I shall sit. What will you do for me in return?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: You're much quicker than I thought.I'm impressed.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It is comfortable sitting down. I shall rest for now.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I do not wish to sit. Do you want me to explain why?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: The situation does not call for sitting.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I suggest you sit. Demanding never works.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No. I do not feel fatigued.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Come to think of it, I feel fatigued...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Yes, I shall save up some energy whenever I can.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'm in the middle of an exercise. Demanding never yields good results.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Be honest. YOU are the one that desires to sit, right?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Why should I sit on this filth?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Why should I? Give me a valid reason why I shall sit.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'm sorry. Please accept my apology.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I have been reprimanded by a human being! What a disgrace!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You're the one that commited the mistake! Krarr!

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Oh, I made a mistake. My apologies.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: I sincerely apologize for the mishap.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Krarr!!! What are you, a preacher?

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Cut this nonsense and get out of my face.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I am really sorry. Please forgive me.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I made a mistake, and I am big enough to admit it. I am sorry.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Oh no, I feel terrible now. I am really, really sorry.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Your words mean nothing to me.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you sure you know who's at fault here?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Tell me you did not mean it.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Wow, I need a tissue for this.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I do not appreciate you looking down on me like that.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Did your mother teach you to say such a thing?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I...do not know what to say.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I will try to be better next time.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You are in need of a tic-tac sandwich. Like, now.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Is the fool one who leads or one who follows?

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: It pains me to hear it from you.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: I still believe you are a decent person.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Do you have a vendetta against me?

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Why should I be subject to this gross misconception?

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: How would you feel if I called you that?

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Look, please don't call me that. I'm already seen with you.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Cough cough... this is embarassing. I am pooping in public.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: What a relief. I have had trouble unloading the past few days, but I am good now.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I am about to unload. Just wait.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: How can you say that out loud?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: That is not something you should iterate in public. Control yourself.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I am busy. I shall do it later.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I've been struggling lately. I do not believe you can truly comprehend what I am going through right now.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I should be done ... pretty soon.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Today must be my lucky day. I had no trouble unloading.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I needed to it. Thank you for covering me.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: There's no feeling quite like this. What a relief!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I cannot poop without a copy of the New Leaf City Times in my hand.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: How disgusting of you to say that in public! Shame on you!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: This is not the time to speak of that matter. I am disgusted with you.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: What a relief. I do not think you'll truly grasp the feeling of euphoria I'm experiencing right now.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Oh it's about to come out. Now, if you'll excuse me...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Yes! I've been holding it all day!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I am very very busy right now. We shall do this later.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I need some medicine. I... cannot do it.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: The wind is blowing too hard. I do not wish to poop right this minute.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I am not an uneducated dragon that defacates anywhere.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I love you, too. This is quite embarassing...

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I've been waiting for you to say those words.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: That's a nice gesture from you. Me too.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I feel fantastic with you around.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I feel fatigued. I shall rest in a bit.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Hmm... I do not have much to do right now.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: When you are around, I feel a sense of comfort.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I know I know. Me too!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Do not worry. I love you too.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You are a great person. I love you too.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It is very windy today. I may have a difficult time flying today.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I am very busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Do you really mean it? That's...very nice of you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Do not say another word. I know, I know.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love you, too. You're the first person I ever said this to.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Well, thank you. That's very nice of you to say.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I do not like the weather today. Let's just go home.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I do not understand. First you hate me, now you love me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I love you should not be spoken lightly. It's a powerful word, and you should save it for someone you really love.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Are you free right now? I certainly can use some help from you.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Krarrrr! What would you like me to say?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I wish to meet Mr. Karnox once more. Please take me there.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I am shocked to see you comprehending our dragon language.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I wish to go back a few yeas. Those were the good days.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I am really fatigued. I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Hmmm I do not have anything to do with right now.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I've always wanted to discuss this matter with you. Are you free right now?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Do you wish to discuss some things with me?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I am learning to speak faster than I did before.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I wonder how Mr. Karnox is comparring me to other dragons.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: It is very windy outside. I shall just stay here.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Are you trying to chellenge me? Ludicrious!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I am really busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I have been watching you for a long time.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You must feel honored to be at the presence of moi.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I must say, I am impressed with your astute knowledge of the dragon language we speak.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Are you familiar with my friend Balrog? He might be a big, bad beast, but I think highly of him.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I thought I heard someone speak. Who was that? You? No, can't be.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I am appalled by your utter lack of decency towards me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I would appreciate it a great deal if you can make a formal request on this, then I'll reconsider.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Be quiet. I need to concentrate.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You went through a hard day's work today. You should get some sleep.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You should get some rest, too.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Thank you. I need some rest. Zzzz...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Are you out of your mind?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I miss Mr. Karnox. I owe a lot to him.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I do not see many humans around this area. Let's go somewhere else.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Good night, sleep tight, don't let the bed bugs bite.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I deserve some rest, I know. Zzzz

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Great. You should get some rest. We have a busy day tomorrow.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: A young'n like you should get some sleep. Not me.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You should be hunting, not sleeping. I'm disappointed in you, kid.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Where is my bed? I need to sleep right now.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Good night. I'll see you later. Zzzz

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I have been feeling fatigued. Now's a great time to catch a nap.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why do you want to sleep now? You've got some hunting to do.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Buy me some food. I'm hungry.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: It's a beautiful day today. Perfect time for hunting.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: What do you think of this magnificent new look?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: This is what you call the pinnacle of all looks.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: What have you done for me lately?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What are you trying to say?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I hear some noise coming out of you, but I cannot understand it.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What are you saying? Get off my face.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I know you are staring at my new look in awe. Love it!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Don't I look dashing? I know I do.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: This look is just for you. Learn to appreciate it.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Don't be shocked by it. It's just the norm.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Patience is a virtue, kid. Be patient, and someday I'll do it for you.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I do not wish to be disturbed right now.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm in the middle of a breathing exercise. Do not bother me.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: My stomach is full. Don't feed me anymore.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Thank you. I was just beginning to get hungry.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Very delicious. I feel healthier after eating that.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Is this how you try to torment me? With food? That's very juvenile.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: All the calories and nutrients seem to be in place. Good.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Again? Why? Do you have alzheimer's? You should go visit a doctor.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Are you worried that my feet are tired? Thank you!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: You are being considerate of me master? Thank you!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: You go ahead and just stay put master.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Why don't we sit together master?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: It has been a long time since I got some rest.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: My legs are comfortable when I sit.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: My legs are cramped up right now.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I think there's dirt on me!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: We can't play if we are sitting. Let's go play!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: You think I able to do anything right?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I listen to all of the master's orders.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I am happy that you are happy, master!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: What did you just say? I didn't hear.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Right now, I feel more comfortable standing!

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: You should be setting an example for me.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I will never do wrong again.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Don't get mad. I will do better.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Why are you in such a bad mood?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I am so nice... You've hurt me.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Don't get angry. I won't do it again...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You are still the best in my books, master...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I just did that to get your attention.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I am good and faithful. Why are you always on my back?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: If you stop being mad, I will give you 100 kisses!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Master, I swear this will never happen again.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Please go easy on me this time.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I regret what I have done.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: This is boring. Let's play something else, master!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: How can you get mad at a nice pet like m?

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: You are the only one for me!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Your words are always so sweet.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: My heart always goes out to you!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Master, you always get me so emotional.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Master, what about your significant other?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I... Well, shucks, I love you, too.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Okay, let's give this thing a shot.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Master... That's nice... But you smell funny.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I was going to call you master, but... Nah, forget it.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I'll really pour myself into this one!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Think things through before you tell me what to do!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: There is a time and place for everything!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: You ever heard of common decency?!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why are you making me go when I don't need to?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You're not even carrying a baggie!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I have no desire to go right now.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: This one looks just like me!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: It feels so good to go.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Can you give me some cover? I need to go.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Take a whiff! It doesn't even smell!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I just pooped. Did you forget?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You can't just force me to go.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I want to go play at the neighbor's.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I need to pee. Can I pee?

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't fall asleep in this noisy place!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Good thinking! It's time for sleep!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: It's not time to sleep yet!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I want to dream about me...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I am going to get fat from sleeping all the time!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I sleep better when I'm near you.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Your voice is like a lullaby.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I sleep better when I'm near you.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No. I'm going to play some more!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Why do you always want to sleep, master?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I will rest while I sit...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Stop telling me what to do!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: The grass fields of Henesys are nice.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: You are so awesome today master! I think I am in love!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: If you are tired, I will be there for you.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: If we run into something scary, you have to protect me.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Do you fancy the way I talk? Why keep talking to me then?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: What I'm going to tell you is totally secret...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I am in no mood to talk today.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I don't talk. That's how I am.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I have lost my appetite lately but anything master gives me is good!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Niki in the Night Market is so creepy.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Manager Karl in Ludibrium is so kind.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I wonder if Pepes are related to Penguins.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Let's play a game... The game is to see who can be silent longer.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: What do I need to say?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I don't have a big appetite, but anything master gives me is good!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I think you are the strongest in the world!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Hey master... Are you single? Want me to hook you up?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: My wish is that you become happy.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I can't hear you! I hear nothing!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't know what to say!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Wow... This is my favorite food!

string.name: f1_f
string.value: I hate eating until my belly hurts...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I am about to faint, I ate too much.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I don't want to eat anymore.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Arg... I'm too full. It's impossible to eat anymore...

string.name: s3
string.value: I am a pet who don't say such things.

string.name: s4
string.value: What goes around, comes around you know?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I hope no one notices I'm here... Eep!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Ahh, nice. Maybe it's time for a nap.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I want to sit... But I need exercise!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: La la la... I don't hear you...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: This place is filthy... I can't be here...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: With legs as short as mine, it doesn't matter!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Do you know what it's like to sit on a cloud?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Whew. I guess I am a little tired.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Ugh, my belly becomes really noticeable when I sit...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I guess I could do that... THIS time.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: We don't have time for this!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: I don't want to be punished.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Huh? What are you even saying?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I think I'm going to cry!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong. YOU'RE bad!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't take it out on me!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: What is it? I feel lost... I'm scared...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm full of tears! And they're coming out!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm gonna hang out at the Free Market.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Sometimes I wonder...is all this really worth it?

string.value: Now that you mention it, I love you too!

string.value: Tee hee... You're making me blush!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Do you treat all your pets like this?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I need to get myself ready.

string.name: c15_f4

string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.value: I wanna see more of this!

string.value: I can do it with my eyes closed!

string.value: I don't want to do it!

string.value: I'm sorry! I won't eat dinner tonight...

string.value: What? How dare you try to punish me?!

string.value: I'm sorry. I take it all back.

string.value: Why are you mad at me?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Come on, it's not a big deal. Just let it go.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: You love just me, right? Just me!

string.value: Not just anyone can earn my love!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Then why don't you treat me like it?

string.value: I feel like the happiest creature on earth!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I love you too! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Absolutely! I totally feel the same way.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I said, I can't hear you!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You love me? How about a hug?

string.value: I'll do my best to stick with you.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Stay with me until the very end of the world!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: You're just as charming as me!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're as warm-hearted as I thought.

string.value: Argh! Why are you doing this to me? I told you I HATE it!

string.value: We are of different classes. I am sorry.

string.value: I can be gone in an instant!

string.value: Who do you think I am?

string.value: Do you want to be arrested?

string.value: You into that sort of thing?

string.value: Why are you laughing at me!?

string.value: I can't just poop all day, you know?

string.value: I'm going to bed now, so don't disturb me.

string.value: Have a good night's sleep... Zzz...
