string.value: I'm gonna hang out at the Free Market.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Now that you mention it, I love you too!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: You're the best! The best in the whole wide world!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Tee hee... You're making me blush!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Ha ha ha... What can I say?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I already know how you feel...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Right next to you? Oh, please!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Not here! I'll die of shame!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: *Grunt* It feels like my face is burning.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I had a good one today!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: This is how I snore... Zzzeigh, zzzeigh.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Doot de doo, I can't hear you...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: The ground is so cold and hard...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I don't even have a blanket...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't want to go to bed...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I want to tell you about so many things...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Phew... I don't want to talk about it.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Have you heard of the witch under the sea?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Don't ever forget about me, okay?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: My brain is just so full of...stuff!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: There's nothing for me to say...

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I want to eat some snacks...

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Korean Folk Town sounds like fun. Let's go!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'm jealous of Yeti and Pepe's relationship...

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Everything will be fine as long as you feed me well.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I want some rest... I'm so tired.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Should I train to be a thief? It looks like fun...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: It's so delicious that it brings me to tears...

string.name: s2
string.value: Why did you say that to me?

string.name: s4
string.value: That's not something a human should say...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I will ally with you for now.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I suppose the ground is not so bad.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I like it when you yell at me.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I will do as you say.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: What is your obsession with sitting?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Take me to the blood lake first.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I am a bad queen, yes.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old master destroyed my family. He was a delight.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Will we be visiting the rivers of blood together?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Are you trying to be funny?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I love it when you're angry.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Every time you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: We were meant for each other.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I am not falling for this.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters... and I like it.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Stop trying to make me angry

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Why do you say that so often?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why do you say that so often?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy meals.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Don't crush any dreams without me.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't crush any dreams without me.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I will see you when the blood moon rises.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Prove yourself as evil as myself...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you my pain.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Let's see if this still works.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I'm embarrassed, and I like it.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do a trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I steal your soul instead?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Quiet. I don't want to hear it.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s2
string.value: You want me to amuse you?

string.name: s3
string.value: My old master said that as well.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I hope no one notices I'm here... Eep!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Ahh, nice. Maybe it's time for a nap.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I want to sit... But I need exercise!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: La la la... I don't hear you...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: This place is filthy... I can't be here...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: With legs as short as mine, it doesn't matter!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Do you know what it's like to sit on a cloud?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Whew. I guess I am a little tired.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Ugh, my belly becomes really noticeable when I sit...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I guess I could do that... THIS time.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: We don't have time for this!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: I don't want to be punished.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Huh? What are you even saying?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I think I'm going to cry!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong. YOU'RE bad!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't take it out on me!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: What is it? I feel lost... I'm scared...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm full of tears! And they're coming out!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm gonna hang out at the Free Market.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Sometimes I wonder...is all this really worth it?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Now that you mention it, I love you too!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Well, um...I kinda I love you too!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Tee hee... You're making me blush!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Do you mean it? Are you sure?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Do you treat all your pets like this?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Don't you think you're going too far?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I need to get myself ready.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: *Grunt* It feels like my face is burning.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I can't, okay? I just can't! Leave me alone!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Doot de doo, I can't hear you...

string.value: The ground is so cold and hard...

string.value: No! I want to play more!

string.value: No! I have lots of energy!

string.value: I just love to play the harp!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I want to play outside with you!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I'd like to be alone now.

string.value: Yeti's feeling good~ Yeti's feeling really good~~ Grr

string.value: Yeti is too shy... to sit... GrrGrr~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti today doesn't want to listen~

string.value: Yeti likes to sit, too~ Yeti's legs are feeling better now~

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Yeti sits, and so does the master~ Grrr~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti sits, and Yeti sleeps~ Zzzz

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti feels good~ Yeti likes sitting down~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Yeti does not understand what the master is saying~ Grr~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Grr~!! Yeti feels like rebelling right now~ Grr~!!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Grr~ Yeti is good at following the master's orders~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Yeti is good at doing this and others~ Grrr~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Yeti is sitting down very comfortably right now. GrrGrr~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Did Yeti do alright? Grr~ Yeti loves to be commended~ Grr~

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Yeti needs to go hunting with the master~ Grr~

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Yeti doesn't feel like doing it right now. Yeti will do it later~ Grr~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Yeti does not feel like sitting~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti is scared~ Yeti will be good now~ Grrr

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti does not act angry~ Grr~

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Grr... Yeti is a good Yeti...Grr...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Yeti is sorry~ Yeti won't do it again~ Grr~

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Yeti doesn't want to be scolded~ Grrr~!!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: If the master keeps scolding Yeti, Yeti will run away~ Grrr!!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Yeti is good, but... Yeti feels hurt...Grr~

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Yeti is sorry... Yeti feels bad now...Grr..

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Grr~ If Yeti keeps being scolded, Yeti will feel very lonely~ Grrr...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Yeti will not be bad from here on out~ Grr

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Yeti will leave~ off to El Nath!!! Grrr~

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Yeti gets angry if scolded~ Yeti likes compliments~ Grrr!!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Yeti doesn't like being here. Yeti wants to leave!!! Yeti~ Grr!!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Yeti didn't do anything... Yeti is very angry right now~ Grrr!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master, forgive Yeti~ Yeti has been very bad~ Grr~

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Grr~ Yeti doesn't go against master~ Grr~

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti may be scolded, but Yeti still likes the master~

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Yeti is really feeling awful, and wants to make up for it~ Yeti is really good now!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Master gets angry at Yeti sometimes! Master is very bad!!Grrr!!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Yeti makes mistakes at times, and so does the master~!! Grr!!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Grr~!! If master keeps getting angry at Yeti, Yeti gets angry at master~

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Yeti doesn't need to feel sorry. Yeti will now become Yeti the rebel! Grr!!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Yeti is bouncing! Yeti feels good~

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Grr~ Yeti is a great dancer~ Yeti's great at everything!

string.value: Yeti's legs hurt~ Yeti needs a lot of rest~ Grrr..

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Yeti does not dance in public. Grr~

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Yeti is still a little bit shy~ Grr...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Grr~ Yeti is too depressed to dance today~

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Yeti feels awesome right now, and the moves are coming out~ Grr!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Yeti dances like no one else in this world~ Grrr~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti used to be the number 1 dancer in El Nath~ Grr~

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Yeti will show the master how to dance~ This is exactly how you dance~ Grrr~

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Yeti will not dance now ... Yeti doesn't want to dance...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Yeti is feeling really tired... Yeti is feeling weak.. Grr...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Yeti will bounce bounce bounce~ Yeti will shake shake shake~ and master will bounce and shake~

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, dance with Yeti! Yeti likes dancing with master~ Grr~

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Pepe once said Yeti looks the best when putting the moves on~ Grr~

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Grr~ Yeti loves to dance, and Yeti loves master, too~!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Yeti fought with Pepe today...Grr.. Yeti feels crappy right now..

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Yeti is hungry~ Yeti is feeling tired~ Grr~

string.value: Master should not dance~ Only Yeti dances, and right now, Yeti doesn't want to dance~

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Yeti will not dance~ Yeti will quit dancing now~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti is feeling the pressure~ Grr~

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Yeti is trying hard now~ grrr... Yeti is exhausted now~

string.value: Yeti had been holding back, until now~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti just pooped~ Yeti does not feel like pooping now~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti feels embarassed~ Yeti prefers private pooping~ Grr~

string.value: Grrr~ Yeti's do not poop often~ Grrr~

string.value: Yeti wants to dance~ Yeti doesn't want to poop~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti's poop is smeared all over Yeti's butt~ Grr~

string.value: Master just stepped on Yeti's big old poop~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti wants to talk to Pepe~ Grrr~

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Yeti likes El Nath, but Yeti wants to go to other places, too~ Grr~

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Yeti used to live in El Nath, and there is a frightening monster somewhere in there~ Grr~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Yeti likes fishing with Pepe~ Grr~

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Grr~ Yeti can do everything well~ Grr~

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Yeti does not have anything to say... Grr...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Grr... Yeti will talk when Yeti feels like talking... Grr...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Yeti does not like being told what to do~ Grrr~

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Grr~ Yeti will not talk~ No, Yeti CANNOT talk~ Grrr~

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Grr... Yeti would one day like to revisit El Nath someday~ Grrr~

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Yeti likes to dance~ Yeti used to be the star of El Nath~ Grr~

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Pepe likes Yeti~ Yeti protects Pepe~ Grrr~

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti prefers cold places~ Grr~

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: If the master is bored, master shouldn't be hanging out with Yet; master should be out hunting~ Grr~

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Yeti does not feel like talking today~ Grr~

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Go past El Nath and you'll run into the Dead Mine~ Grrr~

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Yeti heard that there's ice in Leafre, too~ Yeti wants to go there~ Grr~

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Yeti looks a lot like the master~ Yeti looks like the master~ Grrr~

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Yeti knows a lot about the history of El Nath~ Yeti will talk about its history soon~ Grr~

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Is master bored? Yeti's busy~ Grrr~

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Talk to Yeti right now, and Yeti will be very angry~ Grrr!!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Hang out with Yeti and then Yeti will talk~ Right now, Yeti will not talk~ Grrr~

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Yeti won't talk, and won't listen to the master~ Grr~

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Yeti likes being told that Yeti is cute~Grrr~

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Yeti is blushing~ Yeti is red now Grrr~

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Pepe says the same to Yeti a lot~ Grrr~♡

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Yeti is very happy right now~ Yeti likes compliments~ Grrr~

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Yeti is not cute~ Yeti is NOT cute Grrr~

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Yeti is sad. Yeti is feeling too hot to feel happy. Grr

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti won't do it~ Yeti feels lazy~ Grrr~

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Keep doing that, and Yeti will be very mad~ Grr!!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Yeti has always been cute~ Grr~

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti always hears that~ Grr~

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Yeti and Pepe are both adorable~ Grrr~ Yeti and Pepe were the stars of El Nath~ Grr~

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Yeti is a little bit embarassed by the compliments~ Grrr~

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Yeti did not hear that~ Yeti only hears Pepe~ Grr~

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Yeti is angry because Yeti is hungry~!! Grrr!!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti cannot not do that~!!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti will not show the exact reason why Yeti is loved by everyone~ Grr~

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Yeti is ALWAYS cute~ Yeti likes hearing that very much~ Grrr~

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Yeti likes the master complimenting Yeti~ Grr~

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Yeti loves hearing compliments~ Yeti has always been cute~ Grrr~

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Yeti is too hungry to do anything~ Grrr...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Grr.. Yeti is NOT cute! Pepe is cuter~!!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Master lies too much~ Yeti does not lie, though...Grr.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Yeti wants to hear something else at times~!! Grrr!!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Yeti is very much blushing right now~ Grrr♡

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti loves master, too~ Grrr♡

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Yeti feels the same way~ Grrr~

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Grr~? Yeti did not hear the master~ Grrr~

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Yeti has a hard time with human language~ Grrr...

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Yeti does not know how to react~ Grr~

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Yeti has always bee popular~ Grrr~

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Yeti feels that the phrase should not be easily uttered~ Grr~

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Yeti does not like jokes~ Grr~

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Master should not make fun of Yeti!! Grrr!!

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Yeti is sick of hearing that~ GrrGrr~

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Yeti loves the master, too~ Grrr♡

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Yeti is blushing, and wants to hide immediately.~ Grr♡

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Yeti is so happy that Yeti will tell Pepe this~♡

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Master always lies to Yeti~! Grrr!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Yeti does not like the master~ Grr~

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti did not hear that from the master~ Grr~

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: Yeti does not fall for a foolish lie like that~ Grrr~

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Yeti is on its way to dream street~ Grrr~

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Yeti will dance in its dream...Grr....

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: Yeti was just falling asleep... UNTIL NOW~ Grr~

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: Yeti is too hungry to sleep~ Yeti wants a snack~ Grr~

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti thinks this place is too noisy~ Yeti cannot sleep~ Grr~

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Grr~ Yeti will dream something with the master~ Grr~

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Yeti will sleep with the master.... zzzzz....

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Yeti cannot go to bed~ Yeti wants to chill~ Grrr~

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Yeti wants to have fun with the master~ Grr~

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: Yeti cannot sleep because Yeti misses Pepe very much~ Grrr

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Grr.... Just looking at something delicious makes Yeti's day~

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Yeti should stop eating wheh Yeti's full~ Grr~

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master, eat with Yeti~ Yeti loves this rice~ Grr~

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Master is a bad person... And Yeti is very full.. Grr...

string.name: s2
string.value: Grrr...Yeti doesn not know that word.

string.name: s3
string.value: Yeti wants the master not to say that. Grr~

string.name: s4
string.value: Master never orders me to do that.Grr...

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Sitting makes me feel like a tree again.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I feel free again, thanks to you!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I will bow before your power.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: How dare you speak to me that way?!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Why must I listen to you?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I will comply. You have proven yourself to me.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: How is it? My attempt to be closer to you?

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: I have no reason to put up with this!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Your face is scarier than mine...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please do not get out the chisel.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Shall I return to Shadow Veil Forest?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Who are you to tell me what to do?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: How many apology sculptures must I make?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I cannot live if I do not have your favor.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: My ears are made of stone. I hear nothing.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I thought you were finished hitting me.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Is that what you think of me?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Yes, it was all my fault.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Befriending humans can be difficult, please understand.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: But I thought it would please you...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: If you forgive me, I'll blow you 100 kisses! Mmhmm!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You purified my heart, please purify yours.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm just gonna head to bed.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Fine, I'll just smash you in your sleep...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: My heart aches to hear you say that...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Really? Is that how you feel?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I don't like what you're saying...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I have more wisdom than you in my knee pebbles.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I'm so mad, I'm going to crumble.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Take those words back, or else...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm not in the mood for jokes!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I will grind you into rubble!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Your words are full of pain.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: What can I do to purify your heart?

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: There is no reason to hate me.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I will be your friend, no matter what.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You are the one who is that word you said.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Clearly I'm smart! You are wrong.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I don't like your arrogant attitude.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I don't want to be friends with you anymore!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: It has been done, though a little privacy would be nice next time.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Not now. It is all dust and chaff down there.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Where I come from, we are particular about where we go.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: The bowels of stone do not move so readily.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Look at it! I sculpted it to look like you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Look at it! I sculpted it to look like you.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Look at it! I sculpted it to look like you.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: An excellent suggestion. My cavern is full.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I do not understand your poop obsession.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: You cannot force the mountain to move.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: You told me only to do that on your neighbor's yard.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Please turn your head, and plug your nose.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: This may be my finest sculpture yet.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Let's go give this to the neighbor's puppy.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I must be fed to create waste.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Do not project your own needs on me.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I am not sure why you believe I should do that.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Only if I can go on your head.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: You are quite the talker today.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: The world revolves, and I am part of the world.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I hear a scary dragon lives nearby... Shall I pay it a visit?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Why is the sky so blue? It makes me homesick.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: The falling leaves remind me how lonely I am.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I was not created to talk...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I was not created to talk...

string.value: I will feel the power in my legs once more.

string.value: No. The earth does not move at your whim.

string.value: I will bow before your power.

string.value: I will feel the power in my legs once more.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: No. The earth does not move at your whim.

string.value: I will admit to some feelings of adoration.

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: I will comply. You have proven yourself to me.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Things move slower where I come from.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: You and I are not meant to be!

string.value: Things move slower where I come from.
