string.name: f3_s
string.value: Is this going to give me saddlebags?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Your knack for finding me food is amazing.

string.name: s2
string.value: Why must I say such ridiculous things?

string.name: s3
string.value: I do not say words such as that.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I'm not sitting because I want to.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Why should I listen to you?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: This is a piece of cake!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: You should sit and relax, too.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Frankly, everything you want me to do is too much of a hassle.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I was going to take a break anyway.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I don't want to do it right now.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I am unaware of this concept.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Who do you think you are?

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: You're the one that should be punished!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Don't take your aggression out on me!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Would you please cut me some slack?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: It's you who needs to be punished!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't blame me. It's your fault!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I won't do it again. Give me a chance.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Can't you see my tears? Please, have a heart...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Stop it before I'll make you!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I may be quiet, but I haven't forgiven you.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I accept, but understand that I don't feel the same way.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: So many fans, so little time to crush all their hearts.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Yes, I'm one of a kind.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I'm not going to throw that away.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I expect you to clean after me?

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Don't talk to me right now.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I'll get to work on making some.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Just who do you think you're bossing around?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: It's time to let it go.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: My digestive system is in full gear.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Okay, but only because I want to.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: It's much too early for that!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't ditch me while I'm sleeping.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I also sleep during the daytime.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I better get something out of this.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Who do you think you are, kid?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I don't want to talk right now.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Never mind... I will tell you tomorrow.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Can't you just let me rest?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: What do you want me to say?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Can you defeat Zakum? I don't think you can...

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: You'd better feed me on time. Or I'll run away!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I guess having a big head doesn't mean that person's smart...

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Why are you always ordering me around?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I said I don't want to talk!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Do you want to fight me?

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Well, well. Not bad at all.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: I don't want to eat alone.

string.name: s2
string.value: This is abuse! I'll have you locked up!

string.name: s3
string.value: You kiss your mom with that mouth?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm fully aware that I have short legs...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Ahh, nice. Maybe it's time for a nap.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: This place is filthy... I can't be here...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I just don't want to do it anymore...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Not really... I'm not doing this for you!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: With legs as short as mine, it doesn't matter!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: No, you're going to make fun of me because I'm just as short standing as sitting!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I think I heard someone saying something...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Sitting makes my buttocks get bigger.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I guess I could do that... THIS time.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ugh, my belly becomes really noticeable when I sit...

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I'm never going to do it.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I guess I should stay quiet.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Huh? What are you even saying?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Don't take it out on me!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm full of tears! And they're coming out!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm going to find a new owner!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Now that you mention it, I love you too!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Are you saying you love me?

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I guess I love you, too?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Well, um...I kinda I love you too!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: That was a good one... ha ha...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ha ha ha... What can I say?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I already know how you feel...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I-I'm just a little bit shy...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Not here! I'll die of shame!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I feel like everyone is looking at me.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let you off for today...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Doot de doo, I can't hear you...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm sorry to interrupt you, but I can't keep my eyes open...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I don't even have a blanket...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: The ground is so cold and hard...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I don't want to go to bed...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I want to tell you about so many things...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I want octopus balls... And fried noodles...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I feel too shy to talk.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I don't want to talk about it.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Have you heard of the witch under the sea?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Don't ever forget about me, okay?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: My brain is just so full of...stuff!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I'm going to bed. I'm full, I said...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: There's nothing for me to say... I don't want to talk.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I'm jealous of Yeti and Pepe's relationship...

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Everything will be fine as long as you feed me well.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: It's so delicious that it brings me to tears...

string.name: s1
string.value: I'll remember this! You watch out!

string.name: s2
string.value: Even we Demons know not to cross the line.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Am I good? Gimme a treat!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: You should give me a complement for this sit.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Good idea. My legs were feeling a bit tired.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: My legs are cramped up right now.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: My legs aren't even hurting... do I really have to sit?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I practice every day, just for you!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: There's nothing I can't do if I'm with you, master!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Master! I will do anything you want!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I will sit when you sit!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Right now, I feel more comfortable standing!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Master, you need to learn how to enunciate.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: You should be setting an example for me.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: *Whimper* Please don't yell at me like that. I like you.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'll do what you tell me...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Stop looking at me with that scary face... You'll make me sad.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Did something bad happen at your school today?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: You are still the best in my books, master...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Please don't be mad. It's hard for me to have my only family mad at me.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I am good and faithful. Why are you always on my back?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: It's hard to understand your words!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Hearing that makes me so sad.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Master...I'm sorry for hurting your feelings...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please forgive me, just this once.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I hate it when you get mad for no reason.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: This is boring. Let's play something else, master!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Your words are always so sweet.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: The words are so sweet, I don't know what to do.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I can't stop thinking about you, master!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You can say that a hundred times and I won't get tired of it.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Yip? Of course you do! I'm adorable!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Tell me that ten times every day!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: If you tell that to another pet, I'll bite you! Yip!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I was going to call you master, but... Nah, forget it.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: You're okay, except that you're too easy.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Master... That's nice... But you smell funny.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: You need to study up on common decency.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Think things through before you tell me what to do!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: There is a time and place for everything!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I feel lighter after I went.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Poo Poo... Let's sing about it!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: How many times a day do you want me to go?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Why are you telling me to do this?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: How did you know I had to go?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Would you play with me when I'm done?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I want to go play at the neighbor's.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I just pooped. Did you forget?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I don't know what poop is.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Aren't you sleeping? You look tired.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: It's not time for bed yet.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I want to see you in my dreams, master.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Good thinking! It's time for sleep!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can't I just sleep when I want to?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Master, this is not time for you to sleep!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Master, don't wake me up anytime soon!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I wanted to play some more, but okay.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You go to sleep too, master.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You're sleepy, too? Come lay down next to me.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Putting me to bed without food? You are an awful master!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I will rest while I sit...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Where do you plan on going after I fall asleep? Take me with you!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: What do you like about me the most, master? Tell me!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: If we run into something scary, you have to protect me.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You hunt. I'll feed you potions.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: What I'm going to tell you is totally secret...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: What do you want me to say?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You and I are intellectually incompatable for any kind of productive conversation.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Are you wondering what noises real penguins make?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I'm slumming it just by being seen with you.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Pets all speak different languages. A yeti and a white tiger can’t speak to each other.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am little tired today. How about you, master?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Manager Karl in Ludibrium is so kind.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Are you bored? Let's got get a facial!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I don't have a big appetite, but anything master gives me is good!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Watching snow makes me want to see Grandpa Cliff.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: There's a statue that looks just like me at the Floating Market.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I think you are the strongest in the world!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I want to hear a story, master.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't know what to say!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Master, this is so delicious... Squerch!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I am about to faint, I ate too much.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I don't want to eat anymore.

string.name: s1
string.value: Aren't you supposed to talk nicely?

string.name: s3
string.value: What goes around, comes around you know?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm a good boy, right? Gimme a treat! Yip yip!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Yip, yip! I'm an independent Husky!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Yip, sometimes I want to be rebellious.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can't do it!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: You sit down too, master! Yip!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: You're taking it easy on me 'cause you care. Right, master? Yip!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Yip! Sorry master, but I can't!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Yip! My legs are numb. I can't move...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Yip! There's nothing I can't do if I'm with you, master!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I practice every day, just for you!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Master! Master! Look at me! Yip!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Am I doing good, master? Am I? Yip!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can't, my butt hurts!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: This is boring. Let's try something harder! Yip!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I can't. Why? I don't know... Yip...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Yip. I'll do what you tell me...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Yip! I didn't do anything bad!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Yip! I thought you liked me!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Sorry. I'll be good! Yip yip!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: It was a mistake! Forgive me! Yip!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Yip! It was just one mistake!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: It's just a tiny mistake. Yip!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I don't wanna be in trouble. Yip!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Yip, yip! I'm a smart Husky!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Yip! I am too a smart doggy!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Yip! Takes one to know one!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Yip! I am smart! I am!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: But you still like me, right? Right?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I still like you, master. Yip!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Yip! I'm tired of this joke.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I know you don't mean it. Yip!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Let's talk about something else. Yip!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Well, I think you're the bee's knees! Yip!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Is this a new game? Yip! Idiot! Mutt! Bad master!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I know you don't mean it. Yip!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: No! Yip! I'm a big strong doggy!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I thought I was constipated, but...nope! Yip!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Yip! But I already did! Yip!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Yip! I need a bag for my poop!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Yip! This one looks just like me! Yip!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Yip! Yip! Okay, now clean it up!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Watch out! I pooped there! Yip!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I can't just poop all day, you know? Yip!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Yip... I think I'm constipated... Grr...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'm trying, but there's nothing to poo.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master, bathrooms are where poop goes!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Yip! It doesn't smell bad, does it?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! Be careful! I dumped it right next to you.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I can't go right now. Yip yip!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I like waking up early! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: You're my favorite! If anyone else likes you, I'll bite 'em! Yip!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Yip! Let's do a quest! Wanna do a quest? Let's do a quest!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: When I look into your eyes, it's like I can read your mind. Yip!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I wanna be quiet right now. Yip yip yip yip yip!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: *Whimper* It's so cloudy today. I wish the sun was out.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I got nothing special to say. Yip!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Admins never ask for your password! Yip! What's a password?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I could look at you all day. Yip yip!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Is there really a scary dragon living in Leafre? Yip!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Yip! What do you like most about me, master? Yip yip!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Yip! Woah, I'm so out of it right now.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I tried to look up my horoscope, but I can't read. Yip!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Yip! Yip yip! My back ITCHES!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can read your miiiind!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Thanks to all the treats, I got a tummy! Yip!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'm not scared of no monsters! Just gimme potions. Yip!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You look JUST like me, master. Yip!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tail's wagging! Look at it go!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'm hungry. Gimme a snack. Yip!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Let's get on a boat! Yip!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Yip. What do you want me to say?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Yip yip yip! Tell me a joke!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Don't I look cool? Yip! Yip!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I can do this all by myself! Yip!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tummy's on the ground.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Yip! Does this make my butt look big?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Gimme more time to practice. Yip! Yip!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Aren't I good? Gimme a treat! Yip!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Yip! I can do ANYTHING! Yip yip!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Ugh, my stomach. It hurts to crawl. Yip yip!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm still working on it. Teach me to do it better! Yip.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Yip? Yip? I'm a good Husky, am I not?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I'm a useful Husky, am I not?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'd even get you the stars from the sky if you ask me, master. Yip!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Sitting down is more comfy. Yip!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: *Whimper*My back huuurts. Someone hit me yesterday!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! This is too hard.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Wow, I can do it too! Yip!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Yip! Yip! My back was sore, but now it feels better.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: That was hard, but I did it! Yip yip!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: This makes my legs look even shorter! Yip!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm too out of shape... Yip! Yip!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Yip! Yip! Now I need to learn how to walk like this!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Yip yip yip! You're still taller than me.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I'm doing it! I'm doing it! I'm the best dog EVER!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Don't wanna. Feed me first! Yip!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: It's scary! I might fall! Yip!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: You're mean! I don't wanna! Yip!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Yip yip yip! I'm so happy!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: You're not talking to me, right? I am a dog. Yip!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I pooped in your slippers this morning. Yip!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: You're the best master in the whole wide world!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Yip? Of course you do! I'm adorable!

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Don't you have someone better to say that to? Yip!

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you SO much! Yip yip!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: If you tell that to another pet, I'll bite you! Yip!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Yip, yip! I must be the happiest Husky in the world~♡

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I don't think I know this one... Yip?

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Yip yip! Am I doing it right?

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: *Whimper* There's a thorn in my paw...

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Yip yip! Huskies don't have hands to shake, silly.

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: There's nothing a Husky can't do! Yip yip!

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: Yip yip! I'm tired of this. Just shake my tail or something.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: How did you know I'm hungry? Yip?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is so good! SO GOOD!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master... You're fattening me up... Yip!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Yip yip! It's SO good. Gimme more!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I-I don't wanna turn into a pig. I'm a dog! Yip yip!

string.name: s3
string.value: Don't put icky words in my mouth!

string.name: s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! Bad word is bad!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: 끼이익~ 난 가만히 있는 거 싫어 한다구~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: 이런 건 하나도 재미 없어~ 끼익~!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: 여기에 앉아 있으면 발록이 어흥! 할지도!! 끼이익!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: 끼익~ 재미있는 거 하자~ 그건 재미없다구!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: 주인님 머리 위에 앉으면 더 편할 것 같아요~ 끼이익!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: 앉는 일은 바나나 100개 먹는 것 만큼 쉽다구요~ 끼익~

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: 바보~ 내가 싫어하는 일만 하라 그래!! 끽끽!!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: 쉬는 게 어떤 거야? 먹는 거야? 끼익?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: 히힛~ 쉬라고 하는 주인님은 최고~ 끼이!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: 나 몸이 근질근질 하다구~ 얼른 놀러가자~끼익!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: 나 배가 나와서... 운동할 거야~ 끼익!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: 역시 주인님은 내 마음을 잘 알아! 끼익!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: 쉴 때엔 쉬고~ 놀 때엔 노는 게 모범 원숭이지~끼이익!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: 주인님~ 나랑 같이 붙어 있고 싶었구나? 끼익!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: 주인님 살 빼야죠~ 쉬면 안 돼요!! 끼익!!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: You're not the nice master I knew... Ook...

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I'm going to scold you too! Ook!!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Don't you know how I feel? Ook!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Did I do something wrong? Ook!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I don't want to write an apology! Ook!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Ook! You don't like me anymore or something?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Ook! Don't hate me! It's sad...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Ook! Why are you mad all of a sudden!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ook! I'm going to be mad with you! Hmph!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: If you keep scolding me, I'm not gonna eat anymore! Ook!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: 한 번만 봐 주세요~ 네에? 끼익?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: 나... 이제 너랑 말 안 해!! 끼익!!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: 끼익~ 내 응가는 귀엽기도 하지요~ 끼익~

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: 응가란 말은 너무 좋아~ 응가응가~ 끼익!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: 앗~ 내 응가 밟을 뻔 했다...히힛~ 끼익~

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: 주인님~ 제 응가 좀 보세요~ 어때요? 끼익?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: 끼익...할 수 없는 건 할 수 없어!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: 뻥쟁이~ 내가 속을 줄 알았지? 끼익?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: 끼익~ 우린 서로 사랑할 수 없어~!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: 끼이익... 난 이미 좋아하는 원숭이가 있다구...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: 미안... 네 마음을 아직 받아줄 수 없다구~! 끼익!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: 끼익~ 너무 기뻐서 하늘로 날아갈 것 같아~ 끼이익!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: 끼익~ 매일 거짓말만 하고...나 상처 입었어...

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: 딴 사람한테 이런 말 하면 안돼요! 질투 할꺼야! 끼익!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: 전 주인님에 대한 사랑이 식었어요...흥! 끼익!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: 변덕쟁이 말은 믿을 수 없어! 끼익!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: 다리 아파~ 얼른 호~~ 해줘~ 끼익!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: 히힛~ 내 귀여운 꼬리가 잘 보여~ 끼이익!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: 너무 쉬워서 눈 감고도 할 수 있다구~ 끼익~

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: 하기 싫은데... 다른 거 하자~ 재미 없다구! 끼익!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: 다리가 튼튼하니까 이런 것도 잘해~ 끼익!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: 주인님 말 오늘은 안 들을 거야~ 끼이익~

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: 끼익~ 내 매력포인트는 바로 귀여운 꼬리라구~

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: 혼테일은 내가 한 방에 없앨 수 있는데..끽끽~

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: 밥 안주는 사람과 이야기하기 싫어~ 끼익~

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: 돼지는 밥을 많이 먹어...킥킥~ 그래서 돼지인가봐! 끽끽~

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: 끼익~ 바닷속 깊은 곳에 마녀가 살고 있다던데...

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: 난 빨리 재미있는 놀이를 하고 싶어~ 끼익!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: 요새 외로운 것 같아... 나도 외롭다구~ 끼익!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Let's just go to bed quickly...Zzzz

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: 흥~ 하라고 하면 하기 싫어져~ 킥킥

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: 플로팅마켓에 가면 나같이 생긴 돌이 있어요! 끼익!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: 주인님 머리 크기랑 내 머리 크기랑 똑같애~ 끼익!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: 우리 주인님은 세계 최강이야~ 그렇죠? 끼이익?

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: 끼이익~ 심심해서 온 몸이 근질근질 하다구~!

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: 재미있는 거라도 알고 있는 거야? 끼익?

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: 숨바꼭질 하자~! 난 숨는 거 자신있다고! 끼익!

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: 난 노는 게 제일 좋아~♡ 끼익♡

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: 끼익~ 놀자고 하면 놀기 싫어~ 키킥

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: 주인님이랑 노는 거에요? 재미 있겠다♡ 끼익~

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: 오늘은 새로운 장소에 가서 놀아봐요~ 끼익!

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: 매일 놀기만 하면~ 사냥은 언제해요? 끼익?

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: 끽~~ 메롱하는 건 너무 재미 있어~!

string.name: c32_f4
string.value: 끼익... 난 시키면 괜히 하기 싫다구~ 킥킥~

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: 전 주인님을 놀릴 수 없어요~ 끼이익~

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: 자는 동안 도망가려고~~!! 흥~ 안 잘거야~ 끽끽~

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: 나 자는 동안 내 얼굴에 낙서할려구 그렇지? 끼익...

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: You're good to me sometimes. Ook, oook!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It's great to sit down. Ook!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Oook. Why don't you take a seat next to me?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I think I've heard of this. Maybe not. Ook!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Oook. I know you feel more comfortable standing, too!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: How did you know my legs were tired? Oook!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Heh heh, I needed this. Oook!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Come on, take a seat and have a chat. Oook?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Do you really think I want to sit in this nasty place, master? Ook?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Oh, you're so funny. Ook, oook!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: How many days has it been since I came to this world? Ook?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Frankly, everything you want me to do is too much of a hassle. Ook!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Let's shake our tails in... Oook? Oh, you have no tail.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I love sitting and looking up the sky. Oook!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I'm full and the weather is lovely. And you're even lovelier. Oook, oook!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I'm old enough not to listen to you. Ook.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Tell me, would you sit on this nasty spot if I asked you? Ook?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: ...Did a monkey just yelp? Or I might have heard something wrong. Oook.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I'm starving and you still want me to sit... I hope someone will give a banana. Ook.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Why do I want to cry? Ooook...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I can't believe you're angry with me for such a little thing. Oook!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Y-you're not really angry with me, are you? Ook?

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I only did it because I like you... Ooook...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: How dare you yell at me? Ook!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Don't take your aggression out on me! Ooook!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm not going to cry! I'm not going to give you the satisfaction! Ooook!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I will be more careful in the future. I promise. Ooook...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Do you think I'll care if you get mad at me like that? *Sob* Ook...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I don't like you when you're angry. Ooook...

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I'm the one who should be angry, not you! Ooook!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You were talking behind my back, weren't you? I heard it all! Ooook!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm not crying because you yelled at me. *Sob* I got something in my eyes... Ooook...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: How can you be so angry with me? You're so cruel... *Sob* Oook...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: It wasn't such a big deal... Ooook...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: You said you liked me. Ooook... Were you lying to me?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Can't I eat first? What kind of rule is this? Ooook!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm telling you, it wasn't me... Why won't you believe me? Oook!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Who are you to punish me? I'm way older than you!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Did you just say I'm like a monkey? I'm not! Ook!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Hah. Hah. Hah. Oh, you're funny. Ook?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Gosh, are you out of your mind? I can't do that in here. Ook!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I'll pretend you didn't just say that. Ooook...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Take a look around before you ask me that. Ook.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I'm embarrassed, but if that's what you want... Ook!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: You know, regular poops are important for your health, right? Ook!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Oook... I did it. I did it! Oh, no, this is embarrassing!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Keep an eye out for me, will you? Ook.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I haven't eaten anything. What did you expect? Ook?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You're not a monkey. How could you say that? Ook...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I didn't know you were so rude. Ooook...

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Ook? Ook? Did something get in my ears? I think I heard something weird.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Ook, how did you know I've been wanting to go?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Do you have your eyes closed? Don't open them, all right? Ook?

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'm going to go with pride. I'm not embarrassed! Well, maybe, a little bit. Ooook!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You've secured a place for me. It'll be rude of me not to use it. Ook!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I'm not low-leveled anymore. You can't tell me what to do. Ook...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Crude monkeys expose themselves in public. I'm not like them. Ook...

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: No way. I have to think of my reputation. Ook.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I've lived over 500 years, and I've never pooped out in the open. Ook...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I-I'm not happy to hear that. Hmpf! Oook...

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I know you're lying! Do you mean it? Oook!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Oook! I can't keep myself still!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Ook? That one thing you just said... You didn't say it to me, right?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Why are you staring at me like that? Ook.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Are you serious? You have quite peculiar taste. Ook...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I'm kind of happy. Heh. Ook.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Ook, stop it. You're making me blush.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I can't lie... It's all true! Ook!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Cut it out. It's not funny. Ook.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: What kind of answer do you want from me? Ook!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'd like to think I'm tough. Ook.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'm tired of people telling me that. Ook.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Just so you know, I do this when I'm angry. I'm serious. Hee hee.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Really? You really think so? Heh heh heh! Ahem, well, I've heard that many times. Ook?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Ook? I'm really not happy, but I can't stop my tail...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I-I didn't hear what you just said. Ooook! I didn't!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Please, I'm done with compliments. Ook.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: S-sure, you're cute too. That's what you wanted to hear, right?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Oook? I'm hungry. I need food, not empty compliments.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm grateful that you care for me, but sometimes you're too clingy. Oook.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Ugh! What was that? My heart just skipped a beat. Ook.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Ook? Something's wrong with my heart. What is it?

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Oook... I think I'm in love...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Thanks... Though I'm having a hard time believing what's happening. Ook.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: So, what do you want from me? Ook, oook!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Oook... I knew how you felt about me, but hearing it makes me happy just the same.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I-is this what you call love? Ook?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Ooook... Did you just confess your love to me? I think I'm happy...

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I like you so much, I can't contain myself. Oook!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Enough with your love. I need food. Ook.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Ook? Aren't you tired of saying that?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: If you're lonely, find someone else. I'm tired of you hitting on me. Ook.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: D-don't think what you just said made me happy. If you're seeing hearts, you're hallucinating! Ook!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: You dummy! You shouldn't say that so loud...others can hear you! Ooook!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Y-you're making me blush... Of course I'm happy. Ook.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Oook... I can't move... Maybe I'm too happy.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You've been saying that so much, now I don't know if I should trust you.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Stop talking nonsense and go away. Ook.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Ook... I understand you're lonely, but c'mon.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Please don't compare me to other monkeys. Ook.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: The Happy Valley is a nice neighborhood, though not as nice as my hometown. Ook.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Oook, 500 years ago, I was strong enough to bring down a Yeti with one blow.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Ook! Don't ask me how pet feed tastes. Taste it yourself.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say. Ook.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Ook...? Speak? You want me to speak? I can't speak!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm not in the mood to talk. Ooook... You talk.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Ook... I'm so hungry, I can't talk. Feed me.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I hate being turned into a doll. Ook. I would rather get locked up in jail.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Ook, oook! Don't you want to play with my tail? Careful, it has a mind of its own!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I hate being hungry. I hate being punished. But I hate being alone more than anything. Ook.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Oook... I can't talk to other pets. They just don't speak the same language.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: You talk first, then I might. Ook.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I thought you didn't want me to talk because I'm too loud. Ook?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Are you that bored? I'm a pet, not a human. Ook?

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Ook. How do I shapeshift? Well, I could tell you, but you wouldn't understand.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Want to know how I can ride on a cloud? Monster Riding is not the only skill! Oook!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Others pets have no style. Ook. I mean, even a hairpin can make a huge difference.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I had friends before. An oddball water ghost and a swine monster. What were their names?

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What do you want to talk about? Ook?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: We should keep quiet in public. Ook. We're not barbarians.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Talk! There, are you happy? Ook?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: But I don't have anything to say... Plus, we are not so close. Are we? Ook.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: It's already time for sleep. Oook...

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: I love sleeping on my cloud... Ook...

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Ook... Aren't you sleeping? You look tired.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I won't sleep until you feed me! Ooook!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: It's too early to sleep. Ook?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Ook? I can't believe you want me to sleep on the floor.

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: ...Ook... I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Wake me up in the morning... Oook.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: I'm not tired yet. Why are you forcing me to sleep? What's your game? Ooook!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Ook! I don't have time for sleep, let alone for my shapeshifting practice.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: How do you expect me to sleep on an empty stomach? Ook!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Ook... Sweet dreams to you, master!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Ook... I'm tired of sleeping... Zzz...

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Ook? Good, I've been awake for too long...

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: I'm challenging myself! I will stay awake as long as possible! Ooook!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: You're going to abandon me when I'm asleep. No! Ooook!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I'm not sleepy. I'm starving! Ook!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: *Spin* Did you see how I shapeshift? Ook?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Ook! Keep your eyes peeled, or you're going to miss it.

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Stop asking me to shapeshift. Do you know how hard it is? Oook.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Ooook... Stop asking me to shapeshift. You can't even do it yourself!

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I can't shapeshift when I'm hungry. Ooook!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: I practice every day, just for you! Ooook!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Oook, this is my specialty! Watch me!

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Promise me you won't sell me to the Free Market after seeing my transformation. Ook?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: You don't even look. Why do you want me to shapeshift all the time? Ook!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Oook... No, you said I looked funny in my other form.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Oook, food! Ooh, I can't remember when I last ate!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Stop disrupting my diet plan. Ook.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Ooook! If I eat a lot, then maybe I can use magic again.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Ook... Yuck... Don't you have something else?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Oook, anything you give me is good!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I hate eating until my belly hurts... Oook...

string.name: s2
string.value: You kiss your mom with that mouth? I'd never say something like that. Oook!

string.name: s3
string.value: Why do you always want to force such a strange word out of my mouth? Ook?

string.name: s4
string.value: I don't want to say such things. Kind words are better.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't sit on the street!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Unless you give me something to eat!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Why don't you take a seat too? Oink?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I am losing so my weight nowadays! Oink...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Oink! I took a seat. Give me food?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Oink oink oink! I'm a loyal Golden Pig.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Oink! Sitting down is so comfortable.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ah... I feel so lazy today. Oink!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I bring luck to you! Oink!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'm cuter when I am sitting down, aren't I?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: You want me to sit down? Oink?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Now I sat. Buy me some delicious food!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Won't give you any luck if you stay mad all the time!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Are you making fun of me?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: What did I do this time? Oink?

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Don't be angry. You are scaring me, master.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'm sorry! You'll still feed me, right? Oink?

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm sorry! I won't eat dinner tonight... Oink!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why am I getting punished? Oink?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: What did you say, oink? I was busy eating!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I eat a lot, but I'm not a bad piggy! Oink!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Just don't hit me please... Oooink...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Oink... I don't eat that much... Oink!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Because I'm a PIG! Did you forget? OINK!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: OINK! That won't even make me blink! OINK!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Oink oink oink... So yummy. Want some too?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I won't do it again, master. Oink?

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Don't be mad. Forgive me? Oink?

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I can't just make golden poop anytime you want!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I not a pooping pig! OINK!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I am not full enough to take a dump!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Not ready to take a dump yet, master. Oink!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: If you collect golden waste, it will bring you luck!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: My poop is golden poop... O...ink!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: OINK! I am not ready to go yet!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Do you want my golden poop? Oink?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Gimme more yummy food, so I can poop!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Oink. My poop is golden poop!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Look at my shy golden poop!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I feel great! Now I can eat some snack!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Forget about poo-poo. Let's go for a walk.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Oink... I wanna play with a ball.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I don't feel like pooping right now. Oink.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: NO! Let's go eat something delicious! Oink?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I feel dizzy after taking a dump.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: My golden poop will bring you luck!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I-I feel so skinny after taking a dump!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: First thing's first. Please feed me!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I need to get some rest today... Oink...

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Oh, I want a cup of yummy icy cold Power Elixir! Oink!

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Oink! I want something delicious today!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I see some good items coming your way today, master.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I am the Golden Pig and I bring luck to my master!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Oink, oink. Look at my charming tail!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Always hungry! I miss food already!!!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Not ready to take a dump yet, master. Oink!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: How about some more hunting if you got time to chat with me? Oink?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Go east, you'll meet a nobleman...

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Go west, you'll get something very valuable...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Master, how about a nice dinner party after hunting today?

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: If you collect golden waste, it will bring you luck!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I might die of hunger... o...i...n...k

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I lost my appetite lately... Oink...

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Oink... Need to sit down now.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Grandma Yeon's favorite Shrimp Meat is so yummy! Oink!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Is Dry Treat really that yummy?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Have you seen a speaking pig? Oink?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I got hungry so I ate. I ate and now gotta go to the bathroom! Oink!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Oink! Gotta level up! No sleep for you tonight!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Gotta get some rare items! Wake up, master!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Wanna go get some Red Potion from the General Store in Henesys?

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Oink. I was very sleepy anyway...zZZ

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Dream sweet dreams of me, master!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Oink... Gotta go to bed. Zzz

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I am too hungry to sleep! Oink!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why don't we go hunt? Oink?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I don't want to go to bed now, OINK!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Can I sleep with you? Oink?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I am gonna have pretty dreams! Oink.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You should go to bed too. Oink...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Buy me a decent bed or something, jeez... Oink

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: When is Mrs. Ming Ming's party going to end? Oink!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I want some delicious Dry Treat. Oink!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Good night to you too! Oink!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Time for bed. Good night! Oink.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I am so sleepy. Sweet dreams, master! Oink...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: It's time for piggy to go to bed. Zzz

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Well, that's enough. Let' go eat something!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am so, so, so happy!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Okay. Who should I tell that, oink?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Give me food. Then I believe you!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I have been in love with you as well, master!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: What I need is some snacks!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What? Can't really hear you... oink!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I am so hungry... I feel like I'm gonna pass out! Oink!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about some White Potion first? OINK?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I can't perform at the drop of a hat...

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Can I just have a day off? OINK?

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: One, two, one, two! Oink oink!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I'll do it just for you! Oink!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Trick? What is it? Can I eat it?

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: I'll do it a little later!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Golden Coin Chocolate is the best!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Great sense of balance comes from my perfect S-shaped body! Oink!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Look, master! I can do this!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Sure! Anytime for you, master! One, two, one, two!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Way better than Dry Treat! Oink!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: So delicious, I might cry! Oink!

string.name: s4
string.value: Oink oink! No luck if you use bad words!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Why don't we sit together master?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I'm so nice, listening to your every need.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I don't just sit on the street.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: What's that? Is that something I can eat?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: How does Ducky look right now?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Hey, don't you order me around.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Uh, where's my cushion? I won't sit without it!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Ducky don't want to do it right now.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Ducky is very scared of you now.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Is Ducky being yelled at right now?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Ducky don't understand why you're mad.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Ducky's scared when you get mad.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: It hurt Ducky's feelings when you're being mean.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Ducky won't do that EVER again.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Ducky won't do it again. Give me a chance.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Can't you see my tears? Please, have a heart... Ducky...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: If you keep punishing Ducky, Ducky will turn BAD!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You strange. You keep punishing Ducky without feeding Ducky!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Ducky will call police if you keep harassing Ducky! QUACK!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You do that one more time, you see Ducky no more!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I'm so happy. Say it again, please?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Quack... Put more emotion into it next time.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Sorry but I'm taken. Find another duck.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Master, I'm serious. Snap out of it.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Love... Is this feeling love? I think I'm falling for you, master.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: This little duck loves you too!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Quack!! Your words are not very convincing.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I'm so happy you're my master, quack!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Tell me that ten times every day!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I hope you never, ever change!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: It's not you, it's me... I'm a duck, quack. Give up.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Do you even know what love means?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Meh... I'm not feeling it... Quack...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I love you like a family, too!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I think I'm going to have a wonderful dream tonight, quack!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You can sleep right next to me, quack!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: How did you know ducky was sleepy?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: It's much too early for that! Quack!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: You want me to sleep all day long? Quack!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I'm already falling into sleep. Quack...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I'm going to take a short nap.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You are telling me to sleep at a place like this. Master, you are mean!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Are you planning a party for after I fall asleep?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: It's no time for sleeping, you must level up!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: My snuggly pillow is making me...fall..asleep...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Stand by me while I sleep, please?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Lately, the more I sleep, the sleepier I get...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I just wanna sleep all day long!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Why are you forcing me to sleep? You're suspicious....

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Are you plotting to abandon me when I fall asleep?! I won't fall for that!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I will sleep when I sleep. Bug off!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: No, no... I won't let you get something yummy while I fall asleep! Never!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I am talented at talking, I know.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Nice weather out. How about taking me for a stroll in the Strolling Path?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Have you not seen a talking duck before?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I don't want to talk right now.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: What do you think about this red muffler? I'm a fashionista!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I just wanna talk with you all day long!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Anything you wanna hear from me?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Don't wanna talk. Why don't you talk?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: You don't have any friends, do you?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I am enjoying the solitude right now.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Scuba Pepe and I are nothing. It's not what you think. Quack!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: This is a secret, but I can transform...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I love spending time with you, master.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Once upon a time there was a duck named Ducky...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I talked too much today. Let's talk again tomorrow.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Are ya bored, master? Go hunt more!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: This is the dance that'll make you move!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Everybody! Dance, with, me. Oh yeah.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Shake it, shake, shake it. Boom boom boom.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Dance? I need some music, please!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Why don't you give it a try first? Quack!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I dance til the end of night! Quack, quack, quack!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Compliment me, and I shall dance more!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Look at this crazy steps I'm doing!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: My dancing is so good you might fall in love with me!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: You're gonna make fun of me, aren't you?!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Dancing is not my thing. Nope. Nada.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: That doesn't just happen out of nowhere!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What are you going to do for me?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I can only do it when no one's around...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'm too sleepy to do that... Quack.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: This is a once in a lifetime event!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I practiced every day for this moment!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: You might just fall in love with my transformed self!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I don't feel like it. Quack...

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Quack, quack. You're not even looking at me. I'm pooped...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: You give best food, master! Quack!

string.name: s2
string.value: Quack! How could you say that?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Master, I will take a seat if you give me a chair!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Oh, no... Do I have to sit?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Growl! It feels so comfortable to sit down.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Growl, I like it so much.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Why don't you take a seat, master?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I want to go for a walk, growl!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Growl! Give me something to eat!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Growl! I don't want to do it!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Growl! Aren't I so tiny and adorable, master?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Like this? Aren't I so cute, master?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ow, I will listen to you from now on! Growl!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Master! I will do anything you want!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Grawr! I don't want to do it!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Grr, I think I have reached puberty.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Grr! If you want a seat, just take one for yourself.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Don't be angry. You are scaring me, master.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Rawr? What did I do wrong?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Grrr! Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, why are doing this to your tiny, cute tiger?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I will be an obedient baby tiger.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I will be a good tiger.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Grr, grr! No, I hate it!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Hehe, I will become an erratic tiger!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Rawr... I regret what I have done.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Oh, please go easy on me this time.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Grawr! Don't get mad. Please just listen to what I have to say! Growl...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: If you give me a piece of cake, I won't eat you up!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: This is boring. Let's play something else, master!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Growl! I'm not scared at all!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Grrr! Why are you treating me like this?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How can I do that here? That would be embarrassing! Growl...

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I don't want to go to a bathroom now, growl.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Not here! This would be embarrassing, growl.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Ugh, a baby tiger's poop is used as a medicine whether you believe it or not!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Oh, I feel so much better! Are you going to poop, too?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Grr, I feel so much better!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Grr, it feels so good! Master, please clean this up!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: This place is so dirty! Grr!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Feel free to take a dump and enjoy yourself, master!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Growl, I've been having constipation lately...

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I don't want to go to stool now. Phew...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I feel so much better now, growl!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Grr! Master! Look how big my poop is!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Master, I'm done now! Would you please wipe my butt?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Forget about poo-poo. Let's go for a walk.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I can't do it, because you keep looking at me! Grr.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Grr, grr! No, I hate it!

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Master, master! Aren't I so cute and tiny? Growl?

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I'm happen to be an excellent speaker for a tiger! I also speak a foreign language! Woof, woof!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: My cute tail wags gently. Isn't this adorable?

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: What do you like about me the most, master? Tell me!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Grr! I want to be alone now.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Forget it! Why don't we just go and hunt?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: In fact, I'm not a baby tiger but a kitty! Meow!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: If you give me a piece of cake, I won't eat you up!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Your head is so huge, master!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Growl! You can hunt more easily if you entrust your potions to me.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You must be quiet in places like this. Grr!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Why are you always ordering me around? You play all the time, master? Grr!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Shall we play a word chain? I will go first! Growl! Calcium!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Master, were you born with legs that short?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Tell me something hilarious! You know, a story from a long, long time ago.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Isn't Gaga's face way too long? Growl.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I want to be alone once in a while. Would you please be quiet?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I don't want to do it once you order me, grr!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Why don't we just go to sleep? Zzz...

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Should I go to Henesys Pig Farm? Growl!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Growlie will go to bed now, master.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Growlie will go off to dreamland.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Grr! It's not time to sleep yet!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm too hungry to fall asleep... Give me some meat, master!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Growlie won't sleep in somewhere as noisy as this place!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I don't want to go to bed now, growl!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Growl, I feel really sleepy, master!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I was actually feeling sleepy... You are the best, master!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Master, would you tuck Growlie up in the bed? Growl!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Growlie wants to sleep next to you. Zzz...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You have to at least sing a lullaby to put me to sleep! Grr!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Master, this is not time for you to sleep! Growl!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I just woke up! Why do you want me to fall asleep again? Grr!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I want to go and have fun in Korean Folk Town with you, master!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Have a wonderful dream, master! Dream of having billions of Mesos, growl!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I will go to bed if you want me to, grr!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I will sleep on my pillow, growl.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Master, don't wake Growlie up from now!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I'm dying to eat some meat right now. I can't even fall asleep!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I can't sleep... I miss my mom so much, growl...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You must make a bed for me to sleep! Grr!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Growlie wantsto chat and play with you now, master.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Oh, my! I feel so good!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I really, really like you as well, master!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You have a good eye for tigers, grr!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Not just anyone can earn my love!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Why don't you give me plenty of food before you say that?

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Oh, I don't know what to say!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I have been in love with you as well, master!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Do you say those things to any person, master?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Grr! That's not what I wanted to hear from you!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Give me a piece of meat rather than a piece of your mind!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Master, what about your significant other?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: This is Growlie who loves you and only you, master!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Can you see hearts coming out from my eyes? Growl.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Growlie feels so great! I feel like I can fly across the sky!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Should I just fly off? Growl!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: If you keep saying that, I will just run away! Grrr!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Never mind! Why don't we go and grab something to eat?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I also want to eat meat. I feel dizzy.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master! Please give me a meat everyday!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Give me a tasty side dish, grr!

string.name: s2
string.value: Grr! What did you just say?

string.name: s3
string.value: Master! You must not say something like that! Grr!

string.name: s4
string.value: Grr! You should use only fair words!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: With legs as short as mine, it doesn't matter!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Shall we rest a bit? Did you pack any sandwiches?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Good idea. My legs were feeling a bit tired.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: No, you're going to make fun of me because I'm just as short standing as sitting!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't order me around like that! Toot!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Toot. I don't sit in places like this.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: A nice, leisurely rest would be nice!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Some weather, huh? Let's relax for a while, master. Toot!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Anything for you master... Toot toot!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Poot. Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You can't always get what you want, master.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Do I look like easy? Sniff...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I won't do it again. Toot...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Why are you doing this? Toot?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: What have I done wrong? Toot toot!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Toot... Why are you in such a bad mood?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Please cut me some slack. Toot.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry! Forgive me! Forgive me!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: H-how can you yell at me like that?!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why are you taking it out on me? toot!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Sniff! I didn't do anything wrong. Bad master!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry! I won't do it again. Sniff...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You're not enjoying this, are you?

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Are you really abandoning me? Toot toot...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: You know what I'm gonna say!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Liar! I don't believe you! Toot...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Say it again! Say it again! Mew!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Sniff... You know I'm a skunk, right?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I didn't know skunks were your type, master.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Toot... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm happy to follow you around. Tooot!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'm the luckiest fart angel in the whole wide world!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're the best master. I'll follow you forever!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I already have a Skunk partner, hmph!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Argh! Why are you doing this to me? I told you I HATE it!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Love is fine, but I'm hungry!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Ah! Shh, someone will hear you!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This is not a restroom! Sniff, sniff!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Can you get me some toilet paper, master?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Ugh... It's not coming out... Fart.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why are you telling me to do this?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Really? You want me to do what?!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: No one's watching, right? Keep a look out. Toot!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I made you a gift, master!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go! Do you, master?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Sniff. What am I suppose to do here?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Sniff! Everyone's watching! I can't do it here!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Maybe a little cat nap would be good.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Sniff. It's not time for bed yet.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Sniff! The sun's still high in the sky!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Are you sleepy, master? I'm not sleepy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Nothing beats sleeping on a soft pillow.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Don't let anyone wake me up. Toots!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can't I just sleep when I want to? Toot...?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why are you putting me to bed? It's too early!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I still want to play! Toot toot!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: This was a such a long day.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I feel like sleeping for three days. Toot!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Sweet dreams. Dream about this fart angel!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I told you, I don't want to sleep! Sniff!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Isn't it too early for bed?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Why do you always want to sleep, master?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: What do you want me to say? Huh? Toot!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Not all skunks are gassy... Toot.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Have you seen such a pretty skunk before?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: What shall we talk about? Toot toot.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Sniff sniff, animals don't talk, silly.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm thirsty. Can I have a red potion?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: It's your turn to talk, master.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I hope this conversation never ends!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Have you ever had a Power Elixir? How did it taste? I want one!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm glad you're my master, master.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Who's your favorite pet? Me, right?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Why do you keep saying that? Sniff!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: What are you talking to me for? Bored?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You can't talk me into liking you more, master.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You are truly skilled at bothering your pets.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: What's your wish? My wish is to be your kitty forever.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Please watch this beautiful fart angel grow!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: First comes health, and then comes health again. You're okay, right?

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: No, thank you. Talking to you makes me mad.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why talk when we could eat instead? Sniff sniff!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Don't you have any other friends?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'd rather talk to a wall.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Don't be surprised when I'm gone. Poot!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Be careful not to fall into my clear blue eyes!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Why don't we go hunting? Poot!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I can't perform at the drop of a hat...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I'll be expecting a heartfelt applause. Toot!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Well? Not many pets can do this!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I'll do what I want! Sniff!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll think about it if you beg on your hands and knees.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I don't want to eat anymore. Toot!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Don't you have something different? Sniff sniff.

string.name: s2
string.value: Sniff sniff! I hate bad words.

string.name: s3
string.value: Sniff sniff! How can you talk to me like that...?

string.name: s4
string.value: Sniff sniff! Are you a bad person, master?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I hope no one notices I'm here... Eep!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Ahh, nice. Maybe it's time for a nap.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I want to sit... But I need exercise!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I'm going to sit down. Do you mind?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: La la la... I don't hear you...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: This place is filthy... I can't be here...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: With legs as short as mine, it doesn't matter!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Whew. I guess I am a little tired.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Ugh, my belly becomes really noticeable when I sit...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I guess I could do that... THIS time.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Forget it! I'm not doing anything you say!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Huh? What are you even saying?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I think I'm going to cry!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong. YOU'RE bad!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't take it out on me!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: What is it? I feel lost... I'm scared...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm full of tears! And they're coming out!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm gonna hang out at the Free Market.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Sometimes I wonder...is all this really worth it?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Now that you mention it, I love you too!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Well, um...I kinda I love you too!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Tee hee... You're making me blush!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I already know how you feel...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: *Grunt* It feels like my face is burning.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'll let you off for today...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Doot de doo, I can't hear you...

string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I don't even have a blanket...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: The ground is so cold and hard...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I want to tell you about so many things...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I want octopus balls... And fried noodles...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I'd like to be alone now.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Don't ever forget about me, okay?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My brain is just so full of...stuff!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Have you heard of the witch under the sea?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: But I don't have anything to say...

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Korean Folk Town sounds like fun. Let's go!

string.value: Who do you think you are, kid?

string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.value: You need to be quiet here!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Never mind... I will tell you tomorrow.

string.value: I guess having a big head doesn't mean that person's smart...

string.value: Can you defeat Zakum? I don't think you can...

string.value: Do you want to fight me?

string.value: Can't I just stay like this?

string.value: Why don't we sit together master?

string.value: I love sitting on soft ground.

string.value: Okay. Rock, paper, scissors. Loser sits.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I can't. Hm, I wonder why.

string.value: How did you know I wanted some rest?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Are you hurt? Why do you keep wanting to rest?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: If you want a seat, just take one for yourself.

string.value: You should be setting an example for me.

string.value: *Whimper* Please don't yell at me like that. I like you.

string.value: Why are you doing this to your cute pet?

string.value: Did something bad happen at your school today?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: There's been a misunderstanding, I'm telling you!

string.value: I feel bad as it is.

string.value: I love you and I am sorry.

string.value: It's hard to understand your words!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Dummy! You are a big dummy, master!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Don't say it unless you mean it!

string.value: I feel bad as it is. Please forgive me.

string.value: Master...I'm sorry for hurting your feelings...

string.value: Why are you so upset with me?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: This is not unusual, and you're just overreacting.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master, you always have such bad thoughts of me...

string.value: I like you today. I'll like you more tomorrow.

string.value: My heart always goes out to you!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I love you! I love you!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Yip? Of course you do! I'm adorable!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: That's enough. Let's just drink some juice.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'm happy that you're my master.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: You're okay, except that you're too easy.

string.value: There is a time and place for everything!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: You ever heard of common decency?!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: You need to study up on common decency.

string.value: I feel lighter after I went.

string.value: Why are you making me go when I don't need to?

string.value: I'm embarrassed, but if that's what you want... Ook!

string.value: Take a whiff! It doesn't even smell!

string.value: My poo is in abundance... Like your love.

string.value: I need to pee. Can I pee?

string.value: Maybe a little catnap would be good.

string.value: I feel exhausted from moving around all day. Ah, I think I'm going to pass out.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: We have been with each other too long. Even our sleep patterns match!

string.value: I am going to get fat from sleeping all the time!

string.value: I want to go and have fun in Korean Folk Town with you, master!

string.value: You have to at least sing a lullaby to put me to sleep!

string.value: I want to sleep on your lap...

string.value: I am going to sleep with master!

string.value: You go to sleep too, master.

string.value: Isn't it too early for bed?

string.value: I am in no mood to sleep!

string.value: I want to chat and play with you now, master.

string.value: I told you, I don't want to sleep!

string.value: Nothing beats good food and me in the master's arms.

string.value: Human language is not easy to learn!
