string.value: If we run into something scary, you have to protect me.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You hunt. I'll feed you potions.

string.value: I am in no mood to talk today.

string.value: I want to chat, but that would be too loud.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I will not say anything more.

string.value: Why is the sky so blue? I makes me sad.

string.value: Niki in the Night Market is so creepy.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I'm slumming it just by being seen with you.

string.value: Pets all speak different languages. A yeti and a white tiger can’t speak to each other.

string.value: I like your outfit today, master!

string.value: My throat hurts. Can I have a cup of tea?

string.value: I'd rather listen to you talk.

string.value: Tell me what you want to say first.

string.value: Everyone will want to come and talk to me if I sit.

string.value: I wish I could eat like this.

string.value: This place looks nasty. Let me clean it first.

string.value: I don't want to sit. Sitting makes me look shorter.

string.value: I'll do it if you feed me. I'm hungry.

string.value: Let me lie down. It's more comfortable as I get older.

string.value: Sitting is also a good workout sometimes!

string.value: The ground feels like it's going to give under my butt.

string.value: Sitting makes my belly look fat.

string.value: I'm in no mood to sit.

string.value: I always knew I was irresistible.

string.value: Are we going to stay together? Forever?

string.value: Some pets are scared of me. Do I look scary?

string.value: I hate being hungry. I hate being punished. But what I hate most of all is being alone.

string.value: Why do you make me suffer?

string.value: Let's play a little longer... Please?

string.value: I sleep whenever I want. It has nothing to do with you.

string.value: Now is not the time to sleep.

string.value: Sitting makes me tired, but. Ru ~~

string.value: This looks like a nice spot. Ru ~~

string.value: You are too old to be mumbling? Ru?

string.value: If mama could see me now. Ru ~

string.value: Only because you asked me to. Ru.

string.value: I hope I get a treat for this. Ru ~

string.value: You say sit. I say how long. Ru ~

string.value: I'll try to be better. Ru.

string.value: Wow, someone doesn't like me. Ru!

string.value: I didn't do anything! WHAT, ru!

string.value: Master! You don't understand my heart, ru ~

string.value: Master, what exactly did I do wrong? Ru!

string.value: Hey, I followed all your orders, ru!

string.value: I was just sitting there, ru!

string.value: Did I do something wrong, again?

string.value: Please tell me you didn't mean it, ru?

string.value: Master...this is not the first time I've heard this, but it still hurts.

string.value: Hey, I still think you're a good person.

string.value: Do you really not like me??

string.value: I don't feel like it, ru!

string.value: I must be REALLY good, right?

string.value: The view is amazing from up here.

string.value: Standing up is sooo easy now.

string.value: No, I don't feel like it.

string.value: Still a long way from coming out.

string.value: You expect me to poop in public?? Ru!

string.value: Wanna light it on fire? Ru!

string.value: Ahhhhhh, please don't look. It's embarassing.

string.value: Make sure you don't get ripped off when buying off other users, alright?

string.value: If you starve me, I may just crawl back into my home!

string.value: You ever heard of a talking Rudolph? Me neither, ru.

string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Ru.

string.value: I'm not in a good mood. Ru.

string.value: Will you show me the world? Ru!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Isn't it boring playing by yourself? I like hanging out with others. Ru.

string.value: Be nice to everyone around you, because people talk!

string.value: I heard there's this place called Happyville. Have you? Ru.

string.value: I have nothing to say, ru.

string.value: I feel like crap, don't talk to me, ru!

string.value: What's the matter? Did you not get enough attention as a child?

string.value: I'm not in the mood, ru!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I can sit! I really can sit!!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Give me something harder to do.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Wait til I turn back into a doll... then I'll sit.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Look, I'm fat, and it's hard for me to sit.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: And what are you trying to say? WEK!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Umm... you're no different than me. WEK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do! WEK!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I won't do that again... WEK... WEK....

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Okay now ... calm down ... WEK WEK..

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I get it. I'll be a good penguin now.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What do you want me to do? WEK!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Did I do anything wrong? WEK?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: My heart's been torn to pieces... sigh...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: What can I do to make you feel better?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Hey, you're the one that started!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Seriously, I didn't do anything wrong.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Don't look! This is embarassing. WEK

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Long way to go before I poop. WEK

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I don't feel like pooping. WEK.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Hah, I ate a lil too much last night. WEK

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Sorry. It's going to reak here. WEK.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I don't want anyone seeing this. WEK

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I haven't felt it, yet. WEK.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Hey, don't look. It's not a pretty sight.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Ahhh, this is quite a relief.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You must really like the smell of poop.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I can't poop now. I held on to it for too long.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I can't poop what I never ate.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Can you force yourself to poop?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Of course, the penguins must stand tall... WEK.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: So I stand and sit, then stant and sit. WEK!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I don't want to do it, WEK!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: This is a piece of cake, WEK.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I'm good, right? Give me something harder to do, WEK.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Can I do something else? I'm tired, WEK.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do, okay? WEK!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I can do it. I'm the bomb, right?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: What other penguin can stand so beautifully like this?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: If I keep practicing, I may be able to run one of these days.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Don't repeat the same thing over and over again.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: The weather's beautiful today, perfect for a chit chat, WEK.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: If you find somethng delicious, give me some, WEK.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Do you want to kiss me on the cheek? WEK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I can help you out, WEK!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What? Who said I was fat? WEK!!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Have you ever seen a talking penguin? WEK.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Any good movie to watch, WEK?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Tell me you love me the most, WEK.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Treat others just the way you want to be treated, WEK.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Take me to a seafood store, WEK.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking right now, WEK.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: If I ever turn back into a doll, please get me a water of life so I can keep hanging out with you.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'll help you gather up some items on the ground.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I see a lot of elves these days. I heard they were very hard-working.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Don't tell others your ID and password.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: And what exactly do you want from me?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Don't bother me. I'm just chillin here.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Now you gotta kiss me! WEK

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Hehe, give me a warm hug. WEK

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm too heavy for you to hug, WEK.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I've been in need of some love these days... WEK.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: You can hug me as long as you want, WEK!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: NO! You haven't showered in days! WEK!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I got no time for you, WEK!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Don't hug me too hard. I can't breathe.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Awwww, it's embarassing though. Hug me when no one's looking.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: No, I wanna do something fun! WEK!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Look, it's well into the morning right now, WEK.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping here, WEK.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Master, you sleep here with me. WEK.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I was about to sleep anyway.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: You need to wake me up later.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: It's not time to sleep yet.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I feel fine, I don't feel like sleeping.

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Liar. I don't like you, WEK.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Really? I don't think you do, though. WEK.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Do you really mean that, WEK?

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: You know how I feel about this, right? WEK~

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! WEK!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Yay, I'm being loved by my master~ WEK!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: And what do you want from me? WEK.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What? I didn't hear you. WEK.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I know you say that to others, too. WEK.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I love you too, master! Yay!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: We penguins don't take that phrase "I love you" lightly.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you don't mean that, that I don't think you should say it.

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: So I should just stick it out like this? WEK..

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: You know I'm the bomb, WEK.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: No way, I'm too tired. WEK.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to do this. WEK.

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Heavy, isn't it? I can't fly with these, though.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Is it fluffy? It feels good, right? This is fuuuun!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Ugh, this is quite a chore.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: What am I, a dog? I'm a penguin, you know!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Make sure not to leave a hole on my cheek!

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Um... do you know exactly where we are right now?

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: No way, I don't wanna do it.

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: Don't do it for too long, though. Yay!

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: Who in the right mind would wanna kiss you?

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: You ain't doing this for free.

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Tell me that was a joke.

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: I deserve a trophy for this performance!

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: I believe I can fly!!! WEK WEK!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Um...don't I look a litttttle hefty for that?

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: Hey, have you ever seen a flying penguin?

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: You must have lost your mind.

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Show me another penguin that can fly like me.

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: No need to waste time. Here we go!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I suggest you study a little on penguin's anatomy.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: Um, have you heard of Law of Gravity? Hello!!

string.name: c36_s1
string.value: I'm at a loss for words...WEK!

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: It's hard to find a penguin as cute-looking as me! WEK!

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: Hey, I've been cute for quite some time, you know! WEK!

string.name: c36_s4
string.value: Really? You're not kidding, right? WEK!

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I'm not CUTE. I'm DASHING. WEK!!!

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: I NEED SOME TRUTH AROUND HERE! WEK!

string.name: c36_f4
string.value: What do you want me to say in return, WEK?

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: You won't find a penguin quite like me. Enjoy it!

string.name: c37_s3
string.value: I can never get enough of your compliments!

string.name: c37_s4
string.value: Thanks for your kind words! I really appreciate that!

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: Since when did we compliment each other anyway...

string.name: c37_f4
string.value: Feed me instead of waxing stupid poetics like that.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I can't eat no more. WEK.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Ugh, I feel like throwing up. WEK.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I need to be on a diet.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I hope no one notices I'm here... Eep!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Ahh, nice. Maybe it's time for a nap.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I don't want to sit... I want to lay down.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I'm going to sit down. Do you mind?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: La la la... I don't hear you...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: My legs are so short, it's like I'm sitting already!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Whew. I guess I am a little tired.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Ugh, my belly becomes really noticeable when I sit...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Okay. See? I'm a good kid!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Huh? What are you even saying?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I don't think I'm a bad bear...

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't take it out on me!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: What is it? I feel lost... I'm scared...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You're worse than the bad circus people!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Hee hee... You're making me blush!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You're making me feel all weird.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm going! To stay up! All! Nigh...Zzzz...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I don't even have a blanket...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: The ground is so cold and hard...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I bet I could lift a ZILLION pounds!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I wonder what Arby's up to...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I want my alone time now.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You're gonna be my friend forever and ever, right?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I'm busy thinking. Ugh... It hurts...

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: If it's food, it's good. Wait, that doesn't rhyme...

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Want to go fishing at Aqua Road?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You gotta feed me, you know. It's the law.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: This looks yummy! Oh, but so does that!

string.name: s2
string.value: Oh, my poor little bear ears!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I can't believe you're making me do this.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Hey boss, why don't you sit with me?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Take a break with me, boss.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I can't hear you! Speak LOUDER!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: You're the one that should be punished!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I said, don't order me around!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I can't believe I'm following YOU...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'll pretend that didn't just happen.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Yeah! Show me your angry face!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I said, mind your own business!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Have I ever smacked you before?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: If you really mean it, give me something to eat.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Don't do this right before I eat!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Do you like to see me suffer?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: So many fans, so little time to crush all their hearts.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Play with fire, and you're gonna get burned.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I love 'em and leave 'em, you know.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Now is not a good time.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I'll pretend you didn't just say that.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: My pipes are too backed up, boss.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Hey, I'm not the one with bags under their eyes.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I can sleep when I'm dead.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Okay, but only because I want to.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Nah. You sleep, I'm too buzzed.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I'll sleep when I'm good and ready.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Who do you think you are, kid?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: You really think you can keep up?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: My secrets are too rad for you.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You'd better feed me on time. Or else.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I guess having a big head doesn't mean that person's smart...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Shoo, or I'll bite your face!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Why don't you just keep...doing what you do?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Why are you always ordering me around?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s2
string.value: This is abuse! I'll have you locked up!

string.name: s3
string.value: You kiss your mama with that mouth?

string.name: s4
string.value: I'd never say that. Not in a million years.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Can you defeat Zakum? I don't think you can...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: No cracks about my short legs, got it?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Who made you boss of me?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Sitting, standing, what's the difference in the end?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Ugh, sitting really shows of my paunch...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Sometimes it pays to be a good kitty.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: You aren't the boss of me!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: You don't like me anymore? Waaaah!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Huh? What are you even saying?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You're mean and not nice and I hate you!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm running away to the Free Market!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I don't know what to say!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I had a good one today!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: But everyone will look at me...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I've got too good a buzz going.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I know a real good seafood place near here.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: What do you want to talk about?

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'm more the quiet, thoughtful type.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: No time to talk. Must play!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My fur's coming out in clumps. That can't be good...

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: You and me will be pals forever, right?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: My brain is just so full of...stuff!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Eka's the brains! Lai's the muscle! Fort's the...stomach!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: There are two keys to a healthy body: eating and pooping.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: C'mon, adventure! Fun! Magic! No time for talking!
